story:
The Respo mask has been co-developed by a group of industry leading companies to ensure it's performance is as good as it can be. The focus has been on simplicity and quality to create a product that is easily manufactured and cost effective for the end user. It's fair to say we have exceeded all expectations.

The Respo mask offers an advanced solution that is far more capable than other masks on the market. If you are wearing a mask for any period of time you are really going to notice the difference.

The graphic above shows the inadequacies of some more common mask types, especially those with valves that allow the spread of small particles.

Stretch Goal

If we are able to hit an ambitious target of £90,000 of funding from our awesome customers we will make an exciting range of colors available to you. 

The Respo mask is available in a range of sizes. The mask has a soft sealing component, called an oronasal, This creates a comfortable seal to the face but it is important that the correct size is selected. A simple way to check this is to measure from the bridge of the nose to underneath the chin, as shown in the graphic below. Needless to say, if the wrong size is selected we can replace your mask with the correct fit.

We are offering a range of reward packages all with 10 replaceable filter cartridges. Your product will be delivered in a box with a carry bag to keep your mask clean when it's not being worn.

Respo is also making available large batch orders at extra competitive prices. This can be purchased for yourself or offered as a charitable donation. Just let us know where you would like them sent. 

Over the last 12 weeks the team at Respo have worked tirelessly to bring to market a face mask that sits between the low cost disposable face masks and heavy duty respirators. We have developed a patented filter system capable of capturing and blocking nano particles. It’s manufactured entirely in the UK to pre-empt potential supply chain issues and comes as a full face or half face solution. All at a price point below the cheapest disposable masks. 

Risks and challenges

We are at an advanced stage in the design process and  now investing in production tooling to validate our design. This has to be done prior to certification as in order to achieve CE conformity to EN1827 our mask must be made using production techniques. This is a costly process, so the impact of failing the testing is high. We may experience delays if we don't get certified first time. That said, we have done lots of simulation and have budget to re tool elements of the mask if required.

story:
Time is everything, and we are committed to crafting the absolute best with it. All our timepieces have been created for those who pursue passion in their daily life and strive to make a difference.

 

 

Over the past seven years, CIGA Design has acquired more than 40 patents and accomplished a large array of design awards, including:

CIGADesign is driven by its passion to reinvent the hollow design into a unique concept that originates refined yet affordable timepieces, to allow each wearer to live his dream.

 

 

 

 

The CIGADesign X Series integrates a patented automated mechanism embedded into a unique X-shaped skeleton – the core of the utmost sophisticated experience.

The X Series displays a self-winding movement that recharges automatically as you wear it. With a power reserve of approximately 40 hours and a movement frequency of 21600 times/hour, the X Series proudly features the most compact and steady automatic movement ever created.

 

 

The dual-shell structure, equipped with a high-performance sport utility vehicle suspension system, includes a four-angle spring distribution to unveil the all-new CIGADesign anti-vibration capability.

This feature minimizes the impact of external forces on the watch movement, with stunning shock absorption that protects the mechanism and optimizes the X Series flawless functioning.

 

 

Crafted in Titanium Grade 2, with excellent biocompatibility, the X Series Titanium is designed specifically for sport and the outdoors, boasting excellent durability even for the most extreme action.

 

 

The Titanium & Gold(DLC Coating) has both DLC and Gold coating. The Diamond-like Carbon makes this version an unmistakable finish with supreme resistance to daily wear. Plus the 18k gold coating adding a luxury element to this distinctive timepiece.

 

 

A single glance is enough to recognize that the CIGADesign X series is not just a transparent timekeeper. Every detail, component, and the mechanical part of CIGADesign was designed with absolute purity in mind.

 

 

Everything you see, Super-LumiNova® will make it brighter.

A powerful look and even more stunning at nighttime, X Series Super-LumiNova is where your senses come awake. 

*Note 1: In order to enhance the natural brightness of pure silver, CIGA Design does not offer Super-LumiNova feature on the watches from its Silver collection.

*Note 2: Black & Purple version's luminosity brightness is 50% as  Black & Orange version's.

 

 

We have designed a completely timeless creation. Everything – each line and corner – helped us to forge perfection.

 

 

The X Series is a timepiece that combines tradition with cutting-edge ideas. We plated the crown interior in a vivid red color to mark the contrast with the stainless steel of the outer case.

This reminds us of our mission to create the world's most unique mechanical miracle.

 

 

The inner mechanism is showcased by the transparency of the sapphire front glass, which features 1800 Vickers (9 Mohs) hardness, making the X Series highly resistant to scratches.

 

 

Every luxury wristwatch is a unique piece that cannot be repeated.

With this idea in mind, X Series has been beautifully handcrafted to be much more than a magnificent timekeeper. It is a CIGA Design watchmaking heritage.

 

 

Less costly than leather, more durable than nylon and, unlike metal, scratch-resistant, the versatile silicone strap wristwatch keeps you ready for any adventure!

 

 

 

 

The X Series has already reached many corners of the world, where our backers have appreciated its value and cherished its style.

 

 

CIGADesign Product Box – A package, a gift, an artwork. A wonderful journey.

A good design is like a good book – You read it, you feel it, you live it. Furthermore, a design timepiece will bring you to the beginning of a new, unforgettable journey.

 

 

 

 

CIGA Design is committed to creating simple and innovative designs that define wristwatches as an artistic item. We aspire to authentically express the perspective of the wearer through sophisticated and refined attire.

 

Over the past seven years, CIGA Design has acquired more than 40 patents and accomplished a large array of design awards, including:

 

 

 

 

If you like to find out more about CIGADesign products, innovation and company vision, please feel free to contact us anytime with your queries and feedback. Your opinion counts!

story:
Ida Sports launched its nearly sold-out, outdoor football boot in February 2020, and we’re back to launch our next product: the world’s comfiest futsal/indoor soccer shoe for women.

We started on the back of a GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS ™ title to highlight gender inequality in sport and we are committed to improving conditions, including equipment, for female athletes. We reject the "shrink it and pink it" model that treats women as simply small men.

YOU ARE NOT AN AFTERTHOUGHT TO US. 

In the short history of our company, we’ve made a huge difference to female footballers’ lives; making blisters, sore feet, and black toes a thing of the past.

Now we want to bring the positive impact of our boots from the grass pitches to the futsal court.

By supporting us, you’ll not only be doing your feet a favour, you’ll be helping us expand the impact we’re having in women’s football!

Thanks for taking the next step with us (terrible pun intended).  

 

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

We are looking to raise $5,000AUD (~$3800USD) to be able to bring the futsal shoe directly to your feet. 

These funds will help us cover mould and production costs, and ultimately get these boots from our manufacturers to you.

We obviously want to reward our earliest backers, which is why you’ll be getting these beauties for the best price available. The earlier you take the leap, the more you’ll save!

  • First 10 pairs = 50% off
  • Next 20 pairs = 40% off
  • Next 50 pairs = 30% off
  • All of our amazing early birds after that = 25% off

Plus a special discount and sock bundle if you buy for the whole 5 a side team!

If we don’t reach our goal, you will be refunded the amount you paid and we will find another way to bring Ida to the court.

THE IMPACT

Just like with our outdoor firm ground boot, this futsal shoe ensures that more female athletes have a better experience playing the game that they love.

We were blown away by the response to our outdoor boot, and we can’t wait to see the difference this shoe makes to futsal players across the globe.

Whether you are backing this for performance or just want one of the most comfortable pairs of shoes you’ve ever worn, we are sure you won’t be disappointed. 

So are men's and women's feet really that different? Short answer... yes!

The differences are small but have a huge impact on comfort, fit, and injury prevention. Women’s feet tend to be smaller, have a different length to width ratio in the toes, and are narrower at the heel. We have done extensive research with athletes, physiotherapists, and podiatrists to construct our cleats, and now a futsal boot, that accommodate the higher arch, wider hips, and unique pressure loads that women have compared to men.

 

PROVEN SUCCESS

We’ve seen an amazing response to our outdoor boots, and now we want to bring this impact to the futsal courts and indoor turf!

 

IN THE NEWS

'We've done something crazy': the football boots designed for women'

‘As a child I dreamt of boots designed just for women – now I have them’

No more ‘pink it and shrink it’ as women get boots made for women’s feet at last

Women's sports combatting a surprising barrier to entry: gear designed with men in mind

Without Compromise Podcast with Laura Youngson

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

We know that this product isn’t for everyone! But your help is always so appreciated, and we love when all genders support what we are doing. Here’s some other ways you can help us reach our goals:

  • Share this campaign with any female footballers you know.
  • Tell 3 women you know who play sport about our work.
  • Grab yourself an Ida Boot Bag and training socks via the Supporters Club perk.
  • Tweet a journalist who writes about women’s sport to share the news!

  

 

SIZING AND OTHER FAQS

If you've been following us from day one, you'll be excited to see our expanded range of sizes available for the Futsal shoe! Check out the guide below to get an idea of your size need, and then scroll up to the FAQ section for the answers to all your company, shipping, and logistics questions.

* NOTE: we also have size 43 available (not shown when selecting in the perks section). Click on size 35 and send us a message for size 43! We'll handle it behind the scenes.

 

PRODUCTION & DELIVERY TIMELINE

We plan on shipping the shoes within 14 days of the campaign ending.

 

RETURNS & EXCHANGES

We are more than happy to organise free returns and size exchange if the boots aren’t quite a good fit.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Having (successfully) launched our first boot in the middle of a global pandemic, we’ve seen that things don’t always go to plan!

With the leaps we’ve made in our supply chain this past year though, we’re pretty confident you’ll be able to receive your boots within a month of the campaign ending.

However, Covid-19 has impacted many manufacturers around the world and so sometimes there are delays we cannot control. We would ask that in the event of this you remain patient.

 

STILL HAVE A QUESTION?

Check out the full list of FAQS at the top of the page. Still have a question after that? Email us at hello@idasports.co. 

Thanks for reading a bit more about our campaign and we look forward to going on to bigger and better things in 2021 and beyond!



 

www.idasports.com

 

VIDEO CREDITS

For Equal Playing Field: Dana Roesiger, Matthew Pendergast, Kevin Blankenship
For Monash University: Kero Sun

story:
Hey! It's The Pholosopher here. I am excited to announce this month's Pholosopher's Market products: 3 new NEVER SURRENDER gun patches.

Products

In this offering, I have 2 AMAZING 3-inch square patches promoting the right to bear arms: one with a 2011 and one with a pistol-caliber carbine, each sporting the "Never Surrender" rallying cry. I also have a shotgun patch that is 3 inches by 2.44 inches.

They are 100% embroidered with hook and loop backing for easy placement on backpacks and totes.

Production

I have already produced the products and they are ready to ship once the campaign closes fully, so you can back with confidence.

​Shipping

Due to increased shipping costs and difficulties, we are currently unable to ship product internationally or to Hawaii or Alaska. We can only ship to the continental US. We do hope to be able to provide service to those areas in the future. If you support from one of those areas, we will refund your contribution in full.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you don't have change to spare, you can share the campaign to let others know that there are some AWESOME patches available, the purchase of which helps me produce more content educating others on the right to bear arms and human freedom!

So thank you for your support!

~Pho ^^

story:
Since we started out with just an idea in 2015 we have set out on a journey to reinvent the world of sunglasses. We have made it our goal to create a style of shades for every individual, wooden for the ones close to nature, carbon fiber for the adventurous ones and titanium aviators for the ones  looking for a more classic and luxurious style.

We have thought long and hard about how to present our new collection. One choice would be to realese them directly on our web shop. However, since we love the idea of crowdfunding and the more personal connection to backers and fans we have gained from it, we decided to grant you the opportunity to get them first at a reduced price.

So, the time has now come for us to introduce our brand new collection of colorful sunglasses that anyone can afford and that we believe will soon become your new favourite accessory in all of your upcoming adventures. 

We believe that great design and quality doesn´t have to be as expensive as many of the big brands wants you to believe. With hard work, big ideas  and great people to work with we are certain that we can make a statement that will be hard to deny. We all love stories about the underdog taking on the champion and we are dead set on climbing the ladder until we get what we came for - to bring you great products without overcharging and to give back to the people who believes in us and supports us along the way.

As we take this new collection to life we have put our focus on both comfort and design. We wanted to make a pair of sunglasses that would feel as a part of you, as light and soft as we could and with a splash of color that wouldn´t over do it. We feel that we have succeeded with just that, bringing you five different models that we´re sure will match your mood perfectly. 

 

 

 

 

 

You should know that the five models we now present you is just a couple of models that we have in mind as we take you on our MOO:D journey. If we do reach the goal we set out here on Indiegogo and if we feel that we have as many of you awesome backers behind us, we know that we can reach the skies together. And what better way to do it than with a pair of Zerpico shades close at hand:) 

If there´s something we have plenty of it is ideas, and we can assure you that this is just the beginning of something great. So become a part of our adventures to come. And let us be a part of yours.

 

As we always try or best in finding the best solution for our sunglasses we came to the conclusion that the best way to go for our adventure oriented MOO:D collection is a TR90 polycarbonate frame and scratch resistant, polarized lenses that gives you superior glare reduction and 100% UV protection.

We all know how important it is with good packaging and how happy we get when we recieve a gift where the package feels at least as exclusive as the content. That´s why every pair of our MOO:D sunglasses comes with a specially designed box, together with a sticker, puch and a wiping cloth.

 

 

We would't be what we are if it wasn't for crowdfunding and the fans we have recieved because of it. We have built lasting bonds through medias like these and are grateful for being able to bring ideas into reality and to live in an age where this is possible.

We are on a mission to show you all that there is more than the big corporations out there. That you don't have to pay such high prizes just because they are established brands. We try our best to promote and provide our products at a fair price and by selling directly to consumers through social media and our own website we can accomplish just that. 

This campaign is yet another steppingstone and on this road we have come in contact with a lot of awesome people that were happy to work with us and together make something we all can be proud of. This project wouldn't be what it is today if it wasn't for them.

 

If you´re interested in knowing more about us and what we have accomplished so far you are more than welcome to check out our social media channels! And of course you can always find us at www.zerpico.com

 

Risks and challenges

This is not our first crowdfunding project. We have always kept the timeline perfectly. We have carefully chosen the best factories, and can garantee that the process will run as smoothly as possible.

Of course there can always be unforeseen problems that we cannot control. But if a problem comes up, we will do everything we can to fix it as fast as possible.

We will always keep you updated on any crucial information about the production and shipping of products.

Thank you for believing in us!

So become a part of our adventures to come. And let us be a part of yours. As we always try or best in finding the best solution for our sunglasses we came to the conclusion that the best way to go for our adventure oriented MOO:D collection is a TR90 polycarbonate frame and scratch resistant, polarized lenses that gives you superior glare reduction and 100% UV protection.We all know how important it is with good packaging and how happy we get when we recieve a gift where the package feels at least as exclusive as the content. That´s why every pair of our MOO:D sunglasses comes with a specially designed box, together with a sticker, puch and a wiping cloth.  We would't be what we are if it wasn't for crowdfunding and the fans we have recieved because of it. We have built lasting bonds through medias like these and are grateful for being able to bring ideas into reality and to live in an age where this is possible.We are on a mission to show you all that there is more than the big corporations out there. That you don't have to pay such high prizes just because they are established brands. We try our best to promote and provide our products at a fair price and by selling directly to consumers through social media and our own website we can accomplish just that. This campaign is yet another steppingstone and on this road we have come in contact with a lot of awesome people that were happy to work with us and together make something we all can be proud of. This project wouldn't be what it is today if it wasn't for them. If you´re interested in knowing more about us and what we have accomplished so far you are more than welcome to check out our social media channels! And of course you can always find us at www.zerpico.com Risks and challengesThis is not our first crowdfunding project. We have always kept the timeline perfectly. We have carefully chosen the best factories, and can garantee that the process will run as smoothly as possible.Of course there can always be unforeseen problems that we cannot control. But if a problem comes up, we will do everything we can to fix it as fast as possible.We will always keep you updated on any crucial information about the production and shipping of products.Thank you for believing in us!

Our filters have been independently tested by https://www.sgs.com/

Our filter composition matches the filtration standard of N99 and FFP3 filters.

Many states are manadating the use of masks without valves. This is to keep other people safe.
 
With the MoD S2 - you can turn the valve on or off with our 'valve cap'. Making the S2 the most versatile mask on the market. There are times when you want the valve cap off, for example, if you are travelling through highly polluted areas, there are times when you want it on, for example when you see your grandparents.
 

Each order of 1 Mask comes with everything you need to get you started. If you're not travelling on planes, trains or in busy environments, 10 filters will last you many weeks. 
 
We recommend changing filters when you have entered a high risk area.
 
If you go to the shops twice per week, change weekly. 
 
 

 
Standard shipping with Indiegogo takes 3 to 8 weeks depending where on Earth you live. Currently, we are experiencing delays in the US due to a USPS slow down. If you live in the US, and you need your mask fast, please purchase expedited shipping for an additional 29,50$ when choosing your add-ons with BackerKit. 
 

FITTING GUIDE
 
No mask can fit everyface. Some users experience some issues with a bit of leakage near the nose. Please study this face fitting guide, and if you have questions, just ask.
Some customer photos can be seen on modppe.com
 

We have done our best to develop a one size fits all solution. This does not fit very large, or very small faces.
 
 
 

Filters have been testd by SGS Labs & Nelson Labs - view our certification on MODPPE.com
Tested to FFP3/N99 Standards.
 

Once you have completed checkout with Indiegogo, we will send you a survey from "BackerKit" - here you can choose your colours, add filters & change address.
 
 

 
Choose your add-ons, extra masks, extra filters and expedited shipping after you back this campaign. Each Friday we will send a survey from BackerKit. 
Look our for this email, if you don't complete the survery and confirm your address, we cannot ship to you.

story:
Republic Services Boots© - Hybrid Workman Utility 1080©.

Hi I'm Ray, Founder and Creative Director Of the Republic Services Boots© brand, and I will like to share with you a wonderful opportunity into giving back to yourself and your community by supporting a brand built by the people, for the people.

I'm a designer located in the wonderful city of Las Vegas, NV and I've owned multiple retail businesses over the past 6 years here. In 2019 pre Covid-19 I was finishing up my second retail location for our clothing brand Milk Money Limited. After a successful 6 months of opening Covid-19 hit us hard causing us to close our shop in definitely. With our backs against the wall, I went to work rebranding our business and focusing on E-commerce and creating a more presence online building our community for the months to come. 

After Months of designing and sketching and working on our brands, I started to have multiple conversations with friends and supporters who kept asking about a pair of boots that I had posted on our social media platform. From that feedback I went and started to focus on Republic Services Boots©. After so many conversations I realized the community wanted to HELP us but needed a product that could not only serve as support but could benefit the community equally!

We’ve come to understand that our communities across the globe face new and complex challenges, and we believe it’s all of our responsibility to do more. Republic Services Boots© is the answer to our communities voices that have asked for quality, utility, and durability as well as stylish multi-purpose boots. Our Footwear journey begins with our durable Hybrid Workman Utility 1080©.

This boot has taken us over 10 months developing with multiple terrain tests and multi weather tests, leading us to put together quality materials to make up our Hybrid Workman Utility 1080©. 

However our boots are not just another pair of boots, we are not just another shoe manufacturer, Republic Services© stands with brands like TOMS© as a One for One company! Our mission is to be in the business of changing lives, as a community we intend to give a pair of shoes for every pair of boots we sell! Republic Services© at it's inception is a for-profit business with "Giving" at its core! 

Our overall goal is to invest in a team of domestic and international development, health, and nonprofit professionals, over the next 10 years, to help develop relationships with over 200 non-governmental and humanitarian organizations in about 80 countries worldwide.

Working hand-in-hand with these organizations, Republic Services© could better understand the needs of the communities being served. We could also help meet these needs by integrating Republic Services© resources into existing programs, like those supporting health, education, and economic community development within our community. We feel as though all the wealth and resources of our company should be re invested back into the people who support us the most! 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Republic Services Boots© is looking to raise 70k in 60 days! Our goal of 250 Pairs sold in 30 days at a retail price of $280.00 usd  is a formidable challenge that we've taken head on! And with help from our community we believe anything is possible if we do it together!

This initial funding round will allow us to set up our distribution warehouse and begin the hiring process for our business, it also will allow us to have an opportunity to set up potential distribution relationships with other businesses who can purchase our boots wholesale from us! Our goal is to build trust and long term business relationships with well known distribution outlets as well as factory and government outlets!

Unlike other shoe brands we deliver the BIGGEST perk of all...the gift of giving! With the one for one model you have a opportunity to not only own a new brand of stylish innovative hybrid boots, but you get to do so at the expense of another human being less fortunate having the ability to have a pair of shoes that he or she probably wouldn't have without your support! WIN WIN!

Unfortunately we are absolutely realistic, goals, especially BIG goals face challenges, and ours is a mountain! Being a independent black owned footwear company comes with multiple challenges and not every goal is met, we intend to put all the funds raised back into the business with NO salaries being taken within the first year until we reach our goals and become profitable! That is our pledge to our community as we look for you to help support this brand!

Our Boot Technology

 

 

The Impact

Our Impact is based on the communities willingness to come together! And we love that statement! In the day and age of popularity, brands that aren't apart of the social norm can go neglected, not only does this happen so often, but the community apart helps the RICH stay RICH by willingly taking money from the community and into the pockets of those who don't re invest resources and money back into them! Republic Services Boots© is the complete opposite! We are one of the first creative and futuristic brands of its kind, built with the sole intentions on reinvesting money jobs and resources back into the community! This alone will be impactful, this concept is going to be an example for our children and their children on how to break the strong hold on us mentally from the BIG POWER brands, and take our money and reinvest it back into ourselves! This is Extremely Valuable for us all.

Like our other brand, Milk Money Limited, we set out to inspire our community and bring all creatives together, and after 6 long years of creating, designing, and building up our community, we are proud to say that we have been responsible in assisting and helping well over 30 brands get started and producing products! Many of whom have become well known, and now hundreds of more being developed everyday! With a healthy track record of building a brand with its community we intend to make Republic Services Boots© EVEN BIGGER!

Risks & Challenges

Everyone who has great ideas and ambitions will face risks and challenges, ours started with manufacturing a quality boot, that could pass significant health and factory codes as well as government codes all while being cool and stylish and futuristic! Challenge taken, challenge defeated! Our next challenge will be promoting and marketing our Fund Raise and so we would ask even if you can't purchase a pair today please share this link with a friend or a stranger! And post it on your social media accounts, help us raise awareness because we will really appreciate ANYTHING you can do!

This alone will be impactful, this concept is going to be an example for our children and their children on how to break the strong hold on us mentally from the BIG POWER brands, and take our money and reinvest it back into ourselves! This is Extremely Valuable for us all.
Like our other brand, Milk Money Limited, we set out to inspire our community and bring all creatives together, and after 6 long years of creating, designing, and building up our community, we are proud to say that we have been responsible in assisting and helping well over 30 brands get started and producing products! Many of whom have become well known, and now hundreds of more being developed everyday! With a healthy track record of building a brand with its community we intend to make Republic Services Boots© EVEN BIGGER!

Risks & Challenges
Everyone who has great ideas and ambitions will face risks and challenges, ours started with manufacturing a quality boot, that could pass significant health and factory codes as well as government codes all while being cool and stylish and futuristic! Challenge taken, challenge defeated! Our next challenge will be promoting and marketing our Fund Raise and so we would ask even if you can't purchase a pair today please share this link with a friend or a stranger! And post it on your social media accounts, help us raise awareness because we will really appreciate ANYTHING you can do!

story:
Let me introduce the F16 fighting falcon inspired watch, that honor the plane and all the people that keep the plane safe, on its wings day and night.

The watch case is made in brushed Titanium grade 5 alloy, same material that's used in the aviation industry.

My name is Thomas and I'm a former aircraft mechanic in the Danish Airforce and the civil aviation industry. 

Together with a freelance designer, that also love watches and airplanes, and another product developer, we been working on this watch the last nine months because we love watches and airplanes, and we really want to make a special watch for watch lovers and all the people involved around the F16, whether you are a pilot, aircraft mechanic, fuel service staff, ammunition team, office administration - all the people that would want a piece of memory for their time in service working with the F16.

We have developed the watch and designed 2D sketches, 3D parts, 3D print models and 3D video and are now ready to order the prototype that we are going to use for the main crowdfunding campaign of 300 pcs.

We have a manufacturer partner to produce the prototype and we need your help to fund the prototype.

In return of your help, we gonna offer a huge discount on the first 40 watches, 75% discount of expected retail price $1133 - so you can get this amazing watch for only $283 if you are really fast.

We dont ask much for putting the prototype into production, we need to reach $6000 in fundings, that will cover the prototype moulds and manufacture of one piece watch.

For that amount we offer 40 F16 watches with a huge discount of 86% if you help to get this watch into production.

When we have the prototype we gonna make pro photo shoot, video and marketing and launch the main campaign with 50% discount of expected retail price.

The first 40 that help with the protype will get a big discount on watch and a special designed T-shirt from Pitotwatches with a special thank you for make this project come true.

We have had amazing feedback on this watch on both instagram and other social media and people love the design and are ready to buy from the 2D sketches alone since such a different and unique watch in airplane materials - if the campaign is not fully funded, we will return your money - but we believe in this, along with many other fans and we know we have developed a very unique watch that come in airplane quality.

The watch

  1. Strap 20mm:  Inspired from the pilot PCU 15 harness in material,colors and sewings, (20mm lugs). Buckle in Titanium grade 2 with name(Pitot).
  2. Outer top case: Antenna inspired pattern from just in front of the canopy on the nose section.
  3. Watch case: Titanium grade 5 aircraft alloy, 42x54x13mm
  4. Dial:  Inspired from the airframe structure,Spars, longeron and stringer - 3D frames in plast molded with metal plating aluminium look. Lower dial made of copper with black sunburst.
  5. Top of dial: a print inspired from the PFD (primary flight display).
  6. Subdials: Green print on 3x rotating plast discs inspired from the cockpit.
  7. Fan: Static rotor in the airintake.
  8. Airintake:  The famous F16 air intake below dial, and with fan.
  9. Sidefins: On watch case, Inspired from the wing signature.
  10. Push buttons: inspired from nose cowling.
  11. Crown: Stainless 316 - inspired from fan and engine inlet.
  12. Back case: Stainless steel 316 with laser engraving.
  13. Movement: Swiss made Ronda 5030.D Quartz chronograph - Battery life 54 months
  14. Glass: Double curved with AR coating in sapphir glass

​

 

Our inspiration

Timeline

The team

Linnea: Product technologist - Area: Product development, video and PA
Daron: Watch designer - Area: Sketch, 2D and 3D
Thomas: Stainless smith, flight mechanic, multimedia design, product technologist - Area: Owner, Idea and product development, marketing, 3D and project leader

Together as a team we can cover a wide range of challenges with product development through our past job experience and we are well educated to face any obstacles.

Instagram for more pictures and comments on watch

Instagram account: @pitotwatches
website: pitotwatches.com

PR/News

https://kea.dk/om-kea/nyheder/ur-inspireret-af-f16-kampfly

 

Company details

Pitotwatches
by Thomas Clausen
Byvolden 2, 1.TH
4000 Roskilde
Denmark
VAT/CVR. 27170579
Website: pitotwatches.com
Instagram: instagram.com/pitotwatches

story:
About

Hi, my name is Levi Mukuna, I am the CEO and Founder of LVNGTN Watches Inc. My background is Congolese from the Democratic Republic of Congo, born in France and raised in Canada. My love for watches started with my father, as a young boy I admired his watch collection and my first watch was given to me by him. I’ve always had an appreciation for watches as they are a reminder of my father and the many sacrifices he made for our family to have opportunities to succeed in life. We want LVNGTN Watches to be a symbol of the many opportunities that young people are capable of achieving.

LVNGTN Watches Inc. as a company has already made history in being the first black-owned Canadian watch company and the vision continues to grow as we continue to work towards our goals. By donating to this crowdfunding campaign you are contributing towards building not only a luxury brand but also supporting underprivileged children in the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC).

The Impact

At LVNGTN Watches we believe that our watches are a symbol of the many opportunities for success that have been created for and by our clientele. This is why we believe it’s important to pay it forward and create opportunities for the upcoming generation.

LVNGTN Watches through its BEYOND WATCHES initiative which helps support and contribute to the education of children living in impoverished cities in the Democratic Republic of Congo. We have partnered with the Malaika Foundation https://malaika.org/ which helps to support the education of girls, the start-up of small businesses, and other community uplifting projects in the DRC. With each watch purchase, 10% of our profits will go towards helping to support the Malaika Foundation.

Financial Breakdown:

  • We need $40,000, those funds will be used for payment of the first mass order of the watches for both models and fees that will be incurred for shipping. 
  • Along with this campaign are perks for your funds donated. We have bags, discounts, special offers for the future, and Zoom meetings for the highest donors, and an opportunity for them to highlight a charity of their choice on our social media page.
  • If we do not reach our goal of $40,000, we will utilize what we will have raised for a down payment and use pre-orders to cover the difference as much as we can.

 

Perk Breakdown

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a monetary contribution, here are some other ways to help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools & repost to your social media pages (remember to tag us).
  • Share with friends and family who would like to contribute to a startup watch brand.

Our Team

story:
We have developed a high-quality product range with an amazing design and produced it with the best low-polluting materials. We are very proud to say that AVALON are the best sunglasses you will ever find at an accessible price point. 

Where style and function meet sustainability.
 

However, things are starting to change. Thanks to brands like AVALON, that are offering identical quality products at a groundbreaking accessible price point. In AVALON we produce, distribute and sell on our own. This allows us to reduce the costs that come with working with intermediaries and more importantly, it allows us to do things our own way.

 

 

All of them are produced in the best high-quality recycled materials. Each one of them comes in 4 different colorways and we have to warn you: Choosing only one is not an easy task! (Scroll down if you can't wait to see the full collection)

Our frames are made from Italian high resistance recycled polycarbonate, an ultra-lightweight material that is extremely tough and flexible at the same time, and offers resistance to impact and high temperatures. 

Our lenses, on the other hand, are produced in German TAC, also known as Cellulose Triacetate. They are polarised, category 3 UV400, and will protect you against 100% of the sun's UV rays. Using the best filters in the market was a crucial matter to us, as we want to make sure that your eyes are completely protected while you are enjoying your favourite activities.

 

We were inspired by iconic styles, but also by trendy and groundbreaking contemporary designs. The final result is a balanced, clean, timeless and comfortable collection.

 

 

 

Our goal is to find a balance between fashion and sustainability. 

More than 1000 kg of plastic ends up in the ocean every five seconds. As a result, 40% of the earth’s ocean areas have already been taken over by plastic. Even if we are still not able to truly know what the long term consequences will be, we must take responsibility and start changing this disastrous situation. 

We love our planet, nature and the ocean. That is why we promised to pick up 1 kilo of plastic from the ocean for each backer that supported us on our Kickstarter Campaign. Our campaign finished at 8831 backers, and we couldn't be happier. However, we were not expecting such a big success and we know we have a big task ahead of us. 

For this campaign, we will be focusing all of our efforts into recycling one plastic water bottle for each one of our backers.

Guess how? We will use rPET, a material made out of used plastic bottles for our packaging!

 

We have said many times already that we want to keep improving our  product into a more sustainable one, and your amazing support has  allowed us to do so. We are super proud to share with you that we will officially be making all of the cloth pouches and cleaning cloths out of 100% recycled plastics! And that worldwide brands such as Patagonia and  Timberland, have been using for years. But what does that mean?
 

  • Recycled polyester gives a second life to a material that’s not  biodegradable and would otherwise end up in landfill or the ocean
  • Performance and durability, including high strength and functional versatility of recycled polyester is the same than traditional  polyester, but with a lower environmental impact.
  • Producing rPET requires 59% less energy compared to virgin polyester.
  • It doesn’t require new petroleum to create, lowering the demand  for new petroleum extraction and reducing our overall carbon footprint  as it creates 75% less CO2 emissions than virgin polyester.

This means that for each pair of sunglasses we produce, we will be  recycling 1 plastic bottle, and therefore avoiding that they end up in  landfills or the ocean.

 Take a look on rPET's manufacturing process here: 

*AVALON's Lifetime Warranty is applicable to any products that after going through our quality check present manufacturing issues once purchased.

 

We want you to enjoy your AVALON sunglasses anywhere in the world, that is why we offer worldwide shipping. We promise we will do everything in our hands to produce as soon as possible once our campaign finishes so you can take your AVALON sunglasses with you in your next adventure!  

 

 

This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $250MM through crowdfunding.
story_txt:
We have developed a high-quality product range with an amazing design and produced it with the best low-polluting materials. We are very proud to say that AVALON are the best sunglasses you will ever find at an accessible price point. Where style and function meet sustainability. 
 
Nowadays, 90% of the sunglasses industry is monopolised by 3 main multinational companies. Therefore they have complete control of pricing and take advantage of the situation, making sunglasses a luxury product.However, things are starting to change. Thanks to brands like AVALON, that are offering identical quality products at a groundbreaking accessible price point. In AVALON we produce, distribute and sell on our own. This allows us to reduce the costs that come with working with intermediaries and more importantly, it allows us to do things our own way. 
 
  
We have developed a collection of 3 unisex styles: Kendall, Denver and Arizona.
All of them are produced in the best high-quality recycled materials. Each one of them comes in 4 different colorways and we have to warn you: Choosing only one is not an easy task! (Scroll down if you can't wait to see the full collection)


 
 


 
 


 
 

As we said, AVALON sunglasses are made from eco-friendly materials. 
Our frames are made from Italian high resistance recycled polycarbonate, an ultra-lightweight material that is extremely tough and flexible at the same time, and offers resistance to impact and high temperatures. 
Our lenses, on the other hand, are produced in German TAC, also known as Cellulose Triacetate. They are polarised, category 3 UV400, and will protect you against 100% of the sun's UV rays. Using the best filters in the market was a crucial matter to us, as we want to make sure that your eyes are completely protected while you are enjoying your favourite activities.
 

 

  


We have spent many hours working in each one of our designs, making sure there is something for every face shape and every fashion preference.
We were inspired by iconic styles, but also by trendy and groundbreaking contemporary designs. The final result is a balanced, clean, timeless and comfortable collection.
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 
Avalon sunglasses are produced with recycled material, which makes them very respectful with the environment, moreover, our factories are audited, and have ISO9000, ISO14000 and SEDEX certifications. Which gives them the quality certificates in health and safety for their workers, freedom of association, right to collective bargaining, remuneration and working hours according to the laws. 
 

 

 
Our goal is to find a balance between fashion and sustainability. 
More than 1000 kg of plastic ends up in the ocean every five seconds. As a result, 40% of the earth’s ocean areas have already been taken over by plastic. Even if we are still not able to truly know what the long term consequences will be, we must take responsibility and start changing this disastrous situation. 
We love our planet, nature and the ocean. That is why we promised to pick up 1 kilo of plastic from the ocean for each backer that supported us on our Kickstarter Campaign. Our campaign finished at 8831 backers, and we couldn't be happier. However, we were not expecting such a big success and we know we have a big task ahead of us. 
For this campaign, we will be focusing all of our efforts into recycling one plastic water bottle for each one of our backers.
Guess how? We will use rPET, a material made out of used plastic bottles for our packaging!
 

 

 

 

 
We have said many times already that we want to keep improving our  product into a more sustainable one, and your amazing support has  allowed us to do so. We are super proud to share with you that we will officially be making all of the cloth pouches and cleaning cloths out of 100% recycled plastics! And that worldwide brands such as Patagonia and  Timberland, have been using for years. But what does that mean? 

Recycled polyester gives a second life to a material that’s not  biodegradable and would otherwise end up in landfill or the ocean
Performance and durability, including high strength and functional versatility of recycled polyester is the same than traditional  polyester, but with a lower environmental impact.
Producing rPET requires 59% less energy compared to virgin polyester.
It doesn’t require new petroleum to create, lowering the demand  for new petroleum extraction and reducing our overall carbon footprint  as it creates 75% less CO2 emissions than virgin polyester.

This means that for each pair of sunglasses we produce, we will be  recycling 1 plastic bottle, and therefore avoiding that they end up in  landfills or the ocean.
 Take a look on rPET's manufacturing process here: 

 
 

 
 

All of our backers will receive their AVALON sunglasses together with a beautiful re-usable box, a microfiber pouch to take on the go, and a matching cloth to keep your sunglasses looking fresh.

 

 
 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 
 

 

We truly believe in our products, and in the high-quality materials that we use to produce them. That is why we offer lifetime warranty* to all of our backers during this initial phase.
*AVALON's Lifetime Warranty is applicable to any products that after going through our quality check present manufacturing issues once purchased.
 

 

We want you to enjoy your AVALON sunglasses anywhere in the world, that is why we offer worldwide shipping. We promise we will do everything in our hands to produce as soon as possible once our campaign finishes so you can take your AVALON sunglasses with you in your next adventure!  
 
 

 
 
Make sure to take a look at our timeline below!

 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $250MM through crowdfunding.

story:
OVERVIEW

Flexsee Glasses are made of robust materials and bring smart solutions to conventional problems. Chic design and practicality in usage are the basics of our genetic code.

  

Smart Case

Usage of our magical magnetic power technology is not limited to our frames. We use it in our cases too, so their function is not only to protect your frame but also to ease your life. 

 

Flexsee Magnetic launch collection comes with two different shapes, plus six different color & texture options. Smart cases also have six different color options. 

The smart cases enable you to use your phone’s camera and your navigation holder without detaching the case from your phone. 

 

                                

Durable

When durability tests guaranteed us ten years of everyday use, we were dismayed. But we keep faith that your dog will chewup a few pairs, and that will keep us in the market.

                               

Magnetic Hinge Design

With no-screw temples our magic power snaps the frame into a very thin shape. Storing the frame in the case will help to retain the folded shape.

Adjustable Temple Tips

Our “Adjustable Temple Tip” is a must for a “One size fits all” frame. If Flexsee magnetic does not fit your face, you are a truly unique person, which is not such a bad thing after all.

UV 400 Protection 

All Flexsee lenses protect you from UV400 by blocking the UV lights. The UV protection is built into the lenses,so it won't fade or disappear over time.

 

 

Frame Design & Colors

We have two shapes for our launch collection available in red, black, navy-blue, green solid colors and also brown tortoise, black marble texture options. Don’t  worry one will definitely look great on you.

 

We use top quality lenses with UV400 protection, anti-reflective, scratch resistant  and blue-block options to fulfill your needs. 

Monofocal Lenses: These are the most common lenses to maximize your angle of vision. If your presbyopia has different powers, no worries, you can always buy two pairs and easily change the lenses by yourself and chip in to our retirement yacht.

Bifocal lenses:   The lower parts of these lenses are designed to correct near vision, while the upper parts are designed not to disturb your far vision when you look up from reading. That means you do not have to slide down the frame and peer over the top. Though this can help to make you appear authoritative. So continue to do so as needed.

Blue-Block Lenses: Not all colors of light have the same effect. Blue wavelengths, which are good during daylight, because they boost attention, reaction times, and mood happens to be the most disruptive at night time. And the proliferation of electronics with screens, is increasing our exposure to blue wavelengths, especially after sundown. While light of any kind can suppress the secretion of melatonin, blue light at night does so even more. A rare chance to fool our brain rather than being fooled by it, as we regularly are! Do not miss this opportunity to get even and sleep well.

Sunglasses lenses: High quality UV 400 lenses with aesthetic colors ensures clear vision and high protection from harmful sunbeam and his/her partners rage when we peep through them.

 

 

Gift Package

Your experience with Flexsee is very important for us. So we sent you all of the glasses in cool packages. Our packages combines elements of art, aesthetic, practicality and flexibility.

 

Our Indiegogo Goals

Our Indigogo goal is to make our new product Flexsee Magnetic’s launching to the  “new normal world” not through our conventional worldwide distribution web but through covid-19 free cool digital platform. It will allow us to communicate heart -to-heart with our users. 

 

Campaign Start and Delivery Times

 

 

Worldwide Shipping

We have been producing and selling Flexsee reading glasses to over 45 countries since 2014. From our distribution hubs in Barcelona and Atlanta we can ship to anywhere, even the South-Pole if you are willing to pay.

 

Full Collection

 

                                                                     Magnetic 01-Square       Magnetic 02-Ellipse

You may check your power with link below; https://drive.google.com/file/d/1amjJBeMGIkwCKp...

story:
How does it work in a nutshell?

  • Day mode: It vibrates during the day (you decide how often), reminding you to perform a reality check (using the power of Pavlovian Conditioning proven scientific theory). Since you're not in a dream, nothing happens. 
  • Night mode: It accurately detects your REM phases during the night, vibrating at the best moment of your dream (you decide how strongly) to instantly trigger a lucid dream by activating the conditioning. Since you are in a dream, you will realize that you are dreaming and be able to take full control instantly, allowing you to experience whatever you want to. 

But that's not all...

 
 
 
 

Unlike other lucid dreaming solutions, InstaDreamer is a comfortable and discrete band that you can wear with anything. InstaDreamer won’t disrupt your sleep like eye masks, electrode stickers, or light and sound that other products use.

With InstaDreamer, we want you to have a restful slumber all while conditioning yourself to have the wildest dreams imaginable. Our VibraSmart™ technology sends subtle vibrations to your band that allows you to check if you are dreaming or not. It also tracks your body’s vitals to help learn the best time to wake you, so you always wake up feeling refreshed.

The InstaDreamer is not connected during the night. You don't need to have any Bluetooth/WiFi on: It is a 100% standalone device (offline) and will upload the data to your phone as soon as it detects a network that your phone can access (your phone will automatically share the WiFi credentials with the bracelet). 

Many people look at lucid dreaming as an unattainable skill and don’t know where to start, but conditioning your brain to recognize when you’re dreaming can be just as easy as conditioning your muscles to be stronger.

VibraSmart™ conditioning technology, inspired by Pavlovian Conditioning, sends gentle vibrations to your wrist that condition you to check whether or not you’re dreaming throughout the day and night.

You’ll feel your arm vibrate inside your dream, which will propel you, instantly, into a lucid dream. 

Unlike other lucid dreaming solutions, the InstaDreamer bracelet does not use light or sound, which would disturb you or your partner throughout the night and decrease your chances of achieving lucid dreaming.

Simply wear the adjustable band just as you would wear your fitness tracker. 

There are no electrodes, wires or uncomfortable headbands involved.

Simply wear the bracelet on your wrist throughout the day and night, and enjoy your lucid dreams. It’s that easy. 

 

The band measures and sends your body’s vitals back to the InstaDreamer app to give you insight into your sleep cycle throughout the night.

The InstaDreamer band records your body temperature, pulse and movements to vibrate and launch you into a lucid dream just when the time is right. 

 

Wake up fully refreshed because InstaDreamer analyzes your sleep cycle and wakes you up during your lightest sleep of your desired wake-up period.

The silent alarm also allows you to wake up without disturbing your partner.

We have been interested in lucid dreaming for a years and tried every product on the market that promises to help you lucid dream. Surprise! None of them worked and many were very uncomfortable or irritating, especially the eye masks or the ones that used light and sound.

Lucid dreaming is a skill we really wanted to master, so we decided to make our own lucid dreaming conditioning device. We want to make lucid dreaming possible for everyone, which resulted in the discrete InstaDreamer wristband. It is comfortable to wear, and it will help propel you towards controlling your dreams. 

Below, you can see the very first working prototype that we started producing in September 2017 with the VibraSmart™ Technology alarm in action. On the final product, vibration strength is set by user.

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make InstaDreamer a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase an InstaDreamer, if you’re a supporter of InstaDreamer, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

story:
I'm Sav!

I'm a southern girl working to make her dreams come true! I just graduated with a BA in Marketing Management and am taking the next step to open a business. This campaign is beyond important to me because it's something I've been dreaming of and working towards since I was 14. These contributions will help me legally file my LLC, prepare a working space, and OPEN!! 

What I Need & What You Get: 

I need $5,000 to truly launch my business with good standing. Legally filing a business, purchasing shipping supplies, obtaining initial merchandise, etc. isn't cheap - which is where you come in!! 

Any contributor will receive a logo sticker once my logo is finalized! 

Any contribution of $5 or more will get you recognized in my next youtube video! Channel: Savsreality 

Any contribution of $20 or higher will get a product named after you once the website launches! 

All funds will go straight to the preparation and operation of the boutique regardless of if we hit the full goal or not. 

Qualifications: 

BA in Marketing Management

Starting Grad school in the Fall 

I have written a business plan specifically for the venture. 

I have made multiple Marketing Plans for other businesses. 

I have made websites for other businesses.  

4+ years retail experience

Customer service QUEEN. 

I understand that every business presents its own risks, but I am prepared to face and conquer those. Failure is not an option. 

Other Ways You Can Help

All help is good help! 

Follow my socials that will be used to promote the business 

Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCctbXB2os2Sdwc...

Instagram - instagram.com/savsreality 

Twitter - savsreality 

Prayers!! 

Email me encouragement - savsreality@gmail.com

Share on Indiegogo

Contribute to my Amazon list: https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/2K98FETDT...

story:
About

We at Pollix have dedicated ourselves to making better health & fitness possible through Advanced Pollix AI Technology. Our Ecosystem includes Smart- Watch, Tracker, Scale, Bottle, and more; connected with Pollix App based on AI tech. 

Aiming to make better fitness possible, the Pollix Watch features AI technology with GPS, ECG, HR&HRV, SPO2, blood pressure,  17+ Workouts, and 10+ days battery life.

 

Our fitness smart watch will get you in shape and keep you there! Pollix Watch tracks your hourly activity, and your resting time, your steps, your distance, your sleep quality, your sleep hours, your calories burned, your distance climbed, your workout quality, your heart rate, we also engineered ECG, atrial fibrillation, SPO2 oxygen, Fatigue Index, ai blood pressure monitoring,  – everything you need to know to thrive! 

 
 

Designed and engineered by Pollix to help you understand yourself more clearly and accurately.  Our AI technology & ecosystem will be there to support you every step of the way along your journey.  

For your convenience, we’ve also designed the AI Pollix App, which helps you monitor your weight and stay fit. Your personal data will be also protected by European GDPR.

 

Keep your friends updates on your progress to hold yourself accountable, remain up-to-date on your stats, read AI suggestions, and receive all the alerts you set in one user-friendly interface. Set your goals and actually reach them! Pollix App links up with your device (or devices) to sync your information, and you can also sync it with third-party apps, including Strava, MyFitnessPall, Health App, and S-Health.

 

Our intelligence system will calculate and analyze the statistics that comprise your daily activity, helping you to plan your meals and your workout strategy so that you can achieve all your goals efficiently. Our AI considers any and all details in your life in order to make suggestions upon which you can build your ideal day. We store all the fitness tracker data in a database, where the App will regularly deploy new algorithms, becoming more accurate the more that you use it. Pollix does it all!

 

This is it – the only fitness smartwatch you will ever need. Our system includes automatic workout detection, yoga workouts, hiking workouts, advanced running features (like cadence and pace alerts), and up to five metrics simultaneously. Take charge of your health with Pollix!

 

17+ Goal-Based Exercise Modes - Mix it up a little! You can select any of more than 17 workouts that includes running, biking, swimming, practicing yoga, and circuit training. Figure out your goals in each activity and try to reach them (or exceed them!).

 

Automatic Exercise Recognition - Pollix Watch does everything for you, recognizing when you are running, swimming, riding an elliptical, or playing sports so that you never need to change anything manually. All your records will appear in the Pollix App automatically.

 

Built-In GPS - Sparing no expense, we have built GPS Chips, GLONASS, and BEIDOU three-position system into our fitness watch. This way, you can keep an accurate record of your pace, distance, and other key stats any time you climb, cycle, or run. Check your split times and map your route too!

 

Swimproof & Tracks Swims up to 50M - Get in the pool and start working out! Whether you are swimming or jogging in the rain, you can count on Pollix Watch to remain functional, counting your stats and keeping track of your progress.

 

24/7 Heart Rate & Heart Rate Zones - You can always stay informed regarding your heart rate when you are using Pollix Watch. Our 24/7 heart rate will determine your calorie burn, workout, and health trend goals, and our real-time dynamic heart rate zone will tell you when you are in a fat burn, aerobic, or extreme zone so that you can modify your workouts appropriately.

 

Keep a close eye on your ECG – right from your own wrist. Pollix Watch will notify you if your heart rate dips or spikes, and it will also pick up on irregular rhythms. From fall detection to emergency SOS alerts, our smartwatch keeps you safe and healthy.

 

This Watch goes beyond workouts: Normal Sinus Rhythm (NSR) and Atrial Fibrillation (AFib) are just a peek away using our always-on ECG. This Watch recognizes more than ten different arrhythmia symptoms, including tachycardia, bradycardia, and tachyarrhythmia.

 

Keeping you alive, your blood deserves your respect. You can watch your blood pressure closely, reading your numbers accurately through a high sampling frequency made possible by Pollix Watch.

 

Those who do it swear it by it, and it can change your life. Breathing naturally and with awareness for one minute, you can enter a meditative state, and Pollix will be there right beside you, keeping tracking of your HRV values to put a score on your meditation.

 

Without sleep, nothing else matters. Pollix Watch will determine your sleep quality, recording your deep sleep, light sleep, and waking times to figure out how much rest you need.

 

Don't catch yourself running on empty! Pollix Watch will tell you when you are fatigued and need to sit down or sleep for a while.

 
 

Motivation to Succeed - Nothing will set you up for success like a little healthy competition. Share your activities with your friends, organize coaching, set up challenges, and earn awards. Our smartwatch lets you know – it's time to be your best!

 

 

Track your full activity - with Pollix Widgets you can check your steps, distance, standing, energy, workout, heart rate, sleep stats, and more

 

 

Your Pollix Watch will fit any normal-size 20mm band, including sports brand designed for movement and breathability, stylish woven bands, and premium leather bands.

We have designed Pollix Watch to help you achieve excellence, integrating a GPS, optical heart sensor, electrical heart sensor, and more into an aluminum grade case with a Gorilla Glass Screen and a long battery life.

 

Our fitness activity tracker will keep you updated on anything and everything you need to know regarding your physical progress. This includes 24/7 heart rate monitoring, an ECG, result-oriented workouts, swim-proof and waterproof protection, sleep tracking and quality improvement, push notifications, a long-lasting battery, and a full touch color IPS display.

 

Always know your weight – with Pollix Scale. Using Pollix Scale, your weight, body fat percentage, BMI, and lean mass readings are only a tap away.

 

 
 

Partnering with capable, world-class designers and engineers, we have developed Pollix Watch to stand apart in the modern world. We have let no detail fall by the wayside, optimizing style and function at every step. Nothing but perfect is acceptable for Pollix Watch.

 

 

Our team includes AI experts, software engineers, hardware engineers, mechanical engineers, product developers, designers, project managers, investors, and marketers. We bring to the table a full stack of skills, and we are all eager to introduce the world to our AI-driven fitness plans. Talented and enthusiastic, we will stop at nothing to put our plans into practice.

 

WHY KICKSTARTER?

 

When we launched the first Pollix product in 2016, we could hardly believe the positive reception across Europe, hitting our 10,000-unit sales goal well ahead of schedule. Eager to continue to grow, we listened to our customers, improving our products based on their feedback. We are ready to turn Pollix into a world-class brand, one that stands for quality and change above all else.

We have chosen to launch a Kickstarter campaign so that we can involve our customers in our continued growth and development. As we move toward a more expansive platform that integrates AI into fitness, we are paying close attention to what all our users think about our ideas and our products. We believe that your input is critical to our success, which is why we invite you to continue to challenge us relentlessly. Together, we can build Pollix into something special.

Ways to Contact Us

1. Back our campaign and leave a comment on our Kickstarter page.

2. Send a direct message to us on Kickstarter.

3. For further support, contact box@pollix.com

4. Follow us on our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/pollix.at/

5. Join our referral program to win Pollix Watch merchandise!

 

Risks and challenges

As we continue to collaborate with our partners and third-party vendors, we understand that the risk of delay is real. Because we have chosen to use lithium batteries for our products, shipping poses a unique difficulty, and prices and timing may differ from one place to another, especially in certain countries. As confident as we are in our supply chain – which is years in the making – we are realistic about the challenges we are facing. We promise to keep all our contributors up to date regarding all the progress that we make.

Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ
story_txt:
About

We at Pollix have dedicated ourselves to making better health & fitness possible through Advanced Pollix AI Technology. Our Ecosystem includes Smart- Watch, Tracker, Scale, Bottle, and more; connected with Pollix App based on AI tech. 

 

 
Aiming to make better fitness possible, the Pollix Watch features AI technology with GPS, ECG, HR&HRV, SPO2, blood pressure,  17+ Workouts, and 10+ days battery life.

Engineered last and to withstand all your adventures ahead, Pollix Watch is made from strong, lightweight, aerospace-grade antibacterial aluminum. The fitness smartwatch comes in a smooth-flush, IP68 waterproof 46mm case, 10+ days battery life and the IPS Display is made from Corning Gorilla Glass, which is rugged and crack-resistant.
 

 

 
Our fitness smart watch will get you in shape and keep you there! Pollix Watch tracks your hourly activity, and your resting time, your steps, your distance, your sleep quality, your sleep hours, your calories burned, your distance climbed, your workout quality, your heart rate, we also engineered ECG, atrial fibrillation, SPO2 oxygen, Fatigue Index, ai blood pressure monitoring,  – everything you need to know to thrive! 

 
 
The style is casual, and it is comfortable enough to wear all day long.
 

 

 

 
Designed and engineered by Pollix to help you understand yourself more clearly and accurately.  Our AI technology & ecosystem will be there to support you every step of the way along your journey.  

 
Our intuitive dashboard features your daily statistics, AI communications, alerts, goals, and progress tracking in one platform.
 
For your convenience, we’ve also designed the AI Pollix App, which helps you monitor your weight and stay fit. Your personal data will be also protected by European GDPR.
 

You can make your dashboard into whatever you want it to be.
 
Keep your friends updates on your progress to hold yourself accountable, remain up-to-date on your stats, read AI suggestions, and receive all the alerts you set in one user-friendly interface. Set your goals and actually reach them! Pollix App links up with your device (or devices) to sync your information, and you can also sync it with third-party apps, including Strava, MyFitnessPall, Health App, and S-Health.
 

It is time to step up and step toward your goals! You can do anything, and our AI can help you along the way.
 
Our intelligence system will calculate and analyze the statistics that comprise your daily activity, helping you to plan your meals and your workout strategy so that you can achieve all your goals efficiently. Our AI considers any and all details in your life in order to make suggestions upon which you can build your ideal day. We store all the fitness tracker data in a database, where the App will regularly deploy new algorithms, becoming more accurate the more that you use it. Pollix does it all!
 

 

This is it – the only fitness smartwatch you will ever need.
 
This is it – the only fitness smartwatch you will ever need. Our system includes automatic workout detection, yoga workouts, hiking workouts, advanced running features (like cadence and pace alerts), and up to five metrics simultaneously. Take charge of your health with Pollix!  

 
17+ Goal-Based Exercise Modes - Mix it up a little! You can select any of more than 17 workouts that includes running, biking, swimming, practicing yoga, and circuit training. Figure out your goals in each activity and try to reach them (or exceed them!).
 
Automatic Exercise Recognition - Pollix Watch does everything for you, recognizing when you are running, swimming, riding an elliptical, or playing sports so that you never need to change anything manually. All your records will appear in the Pollix App automatically.

Swimproof & Tracks Swims up to 50M - Get in the pool and start working out! Whether you are swimming or jogging in the rain, you can count on Pollix Watch to remain functional, counting your stats and keeping track of your progress.  
24/7 Heart Rate & Heart Rate Zones - You can always stay informed regarding your heart rate when you are using Pollix Watch. Our 24/7 heart rate will determine your calorie burn, workout, and health trend goals, and our real-time dynamic heart rate zone will tell you when you are in a fat burn, aerobic, or extreme zone so that you can modify your workouts appropriately.
 


 
Keep a close eye on your ECG – right from your own wrist. Pollix Watch will notify you if your heart rate dips or spikes, and it will also pick up on irregular rhythms. From fall detection to emergency SOS alerts, our smartwatch keeps you safe and healthy.
 

This Watch goes beyond workouts: Normal Sinus Rhythm (NSR) and Atrial Fibrillation (AFib) are just a peek away using our always-on ECG. This Watch recognizes more than ten different arrhythmia symptoms, including tachycardia, bradycardia, and tachyarrhythmia.
 

Keeping you alive, your blood deserves your respect. You can watch your blood pressure closely, reading your numbers accurately through a high sampling frequency made possible by Pollix Watch.
 

Those who do it swear it by it, and it can change your life. Breathing naturally and with awareness for one minute, you can enter a meditative state, and Pollix will be there right beside you, keeping tracking of your HRV values to put a score on your meditation.
 

Without sleep, nothing else matters. Pollix Watch will determine your sleep quality, recording your deep sleep, light sleep, and waking times to figure out how much rest you need.
 

Don't catch yourself running on empty! Pollix Watch will tell you when you are fatigued and need to sit down or sleep for a while. 
 
Unavoidable Alerts - However you want to receive your alerts, you can – through call, text, calendar notifications, or push notifications.
 
 Motivation to Succeed - Nothing will set you up for success like a little healthy competition. Share your activities with your friends, organize coaching, set up challenges, and earn awards. Our smartwatch lets you know – it's time to be your best!
   
Track your full activity - with Pollix Widgets you can check your steps, distance, standing, energy, workout, heart rate, sleep stats, and more
 
 


 
Your Pollix Watch will fit any normal-size 20mm band, including sports brand designed for movement and breathability, stylish woven bands, and premium leather bands. You can change the bracelet or watch face on Pollix to match your style at will.
 

Clock Faces - Tell the time the old-fashioned way. You can select any clock face that suits you.
 

 
 

 

 
We have designed Pollix Watch to help you achieve excellence, integrating a GPS, optical heart sensor, electrical heart sensor, and more into an aluminum grade case with a Gorilla Glass Screen and a long battery life.
 

 



 
Our fitness activity tracker will keep you updated on anything and everything you need to know regarding your physical progress. This includes 24/7 heart rate monitoring, an ECG, result-oriented workouts, swim-proof and waterproof protection, sleep tracking and quality improvement, push notifications, a long-lasting battery, and a full touch color IPS display.
 

 

 

 

 
Always know your weight – with Pollix Scale. Using Pollix Scale, your weight, body fat percentage, BMI, and lean mass readings are only a tap away.
 
 
 

 

 
 

 
Partnering with capable, world-class designers and engineers, we have developed Pollix Watch to stand apart in the modern world. We have let no detail fall by the wayside, optimizing style and function at every step. Nothing but perfect is acceptable for Pollix Watch.
 

 
Sketches

Technology process
 

Prototyping process
 
 

Over the course of this year, we have put Pollix Watch through twenty prototypes

 
 

Our team includes AI experts, software engineers, hardware engineers, mechanical engineers, product developers, designers, project managers, investors, and marketers. Talented and enthusiastic, we will stop at nothing to put our plans into practice. WHY KICKSTARTER?
