story:
Short Summary

 

The co-founders of Seven Culture are Duane Wainman and Corbin Bean. We both live in Toronto and have been friends for the better part of our lives. We decided to found a company together because we were both on the quest to find our prupose and more fufillment in our lives.

 

Hello, my name is Duane Wainman and I am 28 years old, born in North Bay, Ontario, Canada. I played Junior A hockey after graduating high school and received a hockey scholarship to attend Lindenwood University, where I studied Psychology. After 4 years at Lindenwood, I ended up as the all-time leading scorer in program history, and with a bachelor of arts degree in Psychology. While I was not playing hockey I was working for Spy Communications, a telecommunications company in Ontario. I worked my way up from a laborer to a Human Resource Manager, which sparked my interest in the HR field. This interest allowed me to be accepted into the Masters of Human Resource Management program at Lindenwood the following semester. I graduated with a master's degree in one year with a 4.0 GPA. I went back to Spy Communications where I received another promotion to a Regional Manager in Toronto, Ontario. Although I thoroughly enjoyed my time at Spy, I began to want more in life, I enjoyed developing strategic avenues, recruiting top-tier talent, and creating a thriving environment. I also wanted to create my own business that would help give, not only myself but other people more of a purpose. 

 

My name is Corbin Bean, I’m a 28 year old from London, ON, Canada. Growing up hockey was always my passion, which helped lead me to Nipissing University where I went for 3 years taking Sociology. I currently work in the finance field for GoToLoans as a territory manager. I’ve always had a dream of being a business owner. After speaking with Duane for endless hours, we decided we needed to expand and make a difference in the world, and that’s where we discovered Seven Culture.   

 

A company selling products is cool, but we still did not think it would give us enough purpose. So we both brainstormed what needs action now, that will benefit the whole world in the future. That's where it was obvious, we were going to donate a portion of our proceeds to help establish the Coral Reef. It has been revealed by scientists that 50% of the coral reefs on the planet have already been destroyed, and the remaining 50% could be in jeopardy if we don’t act now. The repercussions of losing the Coral Reef in the ecosystem. If we lose all the Coral Reefs our ecosystem will be in a major “domino effect” scenario where fish may become extinct. Without fish, all fishermen will lose their jobs and force major developed countries to find a new source of food. This will create an economic disaster affecting millions and millions of people.

 

This campaign is clearly important to us because we have a true passion in front of us. We want to both only work for Seven and grow this company so that we can help give a purpose and fulfillment to so many other people on the planet. We want to create a worldwide culture and create moments with people around the world that we/they will never forget. We want our products to help create awareness so that our dream can become a reality, and help bring the world together for one cause.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We are looking for at least $20,000 from early backers to help us fund our customized watch collection, improve our clothing line by finding more ways to reduce our negative effects on the ocean, develop and implement new marketing strategies, and train our employees to continue to grow and thrive.

 

Our financial breakdown looks like this:

 

$5,000 for marketing.

  • $5/ a day for Facebook/Instagram Ads = $1,825/annually.
  • $5/ a day for Snapchat/TikTok Ads =$1,825/annually.
  • $1,350 to influencers.

$5,000 for product development.

  • $2,000 to improve watch components/packaging.
  • $2,000 to research new designs.
  • $1,000 to improve/design new clothing lines.

$5,000 for research, training and company development.

  • $1,000 to research how to grow our company.
  • $3,000 to train employees.
  • $1,000 to improve company policies, procedures.

$3,200 for intangibles.

  • $3,200 for security and new issues that arise.
 

Our perk options are an exclusive deal from our luxury clothing line, a three-pack of our top three items, Classic Hoodie, Round Neck T, and our Classic T (Premium). These products are all produced in France, and are ethically sourced, ZERO plastic packagaing, 100% organic cotton products.

 

If we do not reach the $20,000 goal, we will take what we have and make the most of it with our company. The backers that have trusted us will still receive their perks of choice. We will discuss as a team and prioritize what department to invest in and how much. 

 

The Impact

Seven Culture is not only selling customers material products, we are selling customers emotions, and motivations that come with our products.

 

With our customized watch collection we want our customers to feel more empowered to use their time more wisely. We want our customers to remember to stop and enjoy moments with friends and family. Ultimately, our time is the most valuable thing we have on this planet, so let's make a difference with it. Buying a Seven Watch means more than just receiving a watch. You have donated to the Coral Reef. You have made a difference. You have made an impact. So, in conclusion, our customers who buy a watch will leave with a new, luxury watch, the feeling of joining a team of diversity and inclusion, a new purpose by donating to the Coral Reef, and ultimately this combination will equal the feeling of fulfillment. 

 

Our clothing line will not only give customers a new sleek, and stylish attires, but it will raise awareness and also add more emotions to our customers. For us when we have felt the best in a social environment is when we are having a “heart-to-heart” with an old friend, new friend, stranger, sibling, parent, cousin, whoever, and we feel safe, secure, and warm. We feel like we can say whatever we want, we feel like we are meant to be where we are in life. This feeling we want our clothing line to bring to people all over the world. By buying a piece of Seven clothing, we want our customers to feel secure, safe, warm, and included in the bigger picture. We want our customers to know that they are now involved in our “heart-to-heart” with the world. 

 

Risks & Challenges

The rise to success will not be a straight shot. There will be numerous challenges we will need to overcome. The first challenge in selling products to an audience is marketing. Our marketing needs to be top tier in order for us to stand out from the rest. The best way to do this is to learn as much as we can from our audience and where they spend most of their time. Our target audience is 13-40-year-olds, which consists of three different generations. The place all three of these generations spend most of their time is on social media. That will be our plan of attack. We will need to create social media ads that are engaging and spark interest. We know from research that millennials and Gen-Z are most interested in making a positive impact on the planet and that's why we will be promoting how we are dedicated to reestablishing the Coral Reef.

 

The next problem we will encounter will be shipping our products worldwide. To tackle this issue we will be upfront and honest with our customers. If a delay is expected we will communicate via email and text message. We want our customers to trust us and I know that we are committed to them. Furthermore, we have communicated with our distributors and suppliers and reminded them of the importance of delivering on time. This is one of our biggest pillars to success.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are unable to contribute financially there are multiple other ways you can help. Firstly, you can just simply talk about us and our passion. You can discuss how we are bringing the world together for one cause. You can talk about how our vision with our watch collection can benefit the world, you can talk about how our clothing line gives you “goosebumps” because reading about it made you remember some of the most memorable times. Secondly, you can follow us on social media and keep up to date with our progress. Thirdly, you can promote our beliefs, passion, and products. Share our posts on social media, share your friends wearing our products, comment on our posts, interact with us, engage with us in any way that will be beneficial. We would love to hear from each and every one of you. Lastly, you can help by also donating to the Coral Reef and helping us fix a huge part of our ecosystem, we won't be jealous, we promise. Any amount can truly make a big impact. Do not forget Indiegogo has sharing tools as well that can help us get our name out there and make a big splash!!!!




 

Thank you, Stay Safe,

Corbin & Duane,

Share our posts on social media, share your friends wearing our products, comment on our posts, interact with us, engage with us in any way that will be beneficial. We would love to hear from each and every one of you. Lastly, you can help by also donating to the Coral Reef and helping us fix a huge part of our ecosystem, we won't be jealous, we promise. Any amount can truly make a big impact. Do not forget Indiegogo has sharing tools as well that can help us get our name out there and make a big splash!!!!
 Thank you, Stay Safe,
Corbin & Duane,

story:
COMPOSITE FABRIC MADE OF WOOD

 

The wood-based fibers are biodegradable by microorganisms

 

WOOD FIBERS ARE SOFT AND ABSORB MOISTURE BETTER THEN OTHERS. 

KEY BENEFITS ARE A HIGHER DRY AND WET STRENGTH 

 

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

 

  1. Back this project.
  2. Click on the Perk you want and enter your payment information.
  3. You will then receive a survey via email 3 days from your pledge asking you for your jacket preference and shipping details.
  4. Once the survey is submitted to us, the jacket will be shipped to you within 2 weeks!

 

    THE PERKS

     

    THE DESIGNS

     

    THE COLORS

    THE SIZES

     

     

     

    YOUR FIT

    EN: The custom developed cut combines a fashionable fit with a comfortable freedom of movement. The shirt is slightly longer than others, perfect for hiking.  

    DE: Der speziell entwickelte Schnitt kombiniert eine modische Passform mit einer komfortablen Bewegungsfreiheit. Das Hemd ist etwas länger als andere, perfekt zum Wandern.  

    YOUR FABRIC 

    EN: We combine our fabric with responsibility, natural function and sustainable fair production. With our production we want to reduce the ecological footprint.

    DE: Unsere Stoffentwicklung verbinden wir mit Verantwortung, natürlicher Funktion und nachhaltig fairer Produktion. Mit unserer Produktion möchten wir den ökologischen Fußabdruck reduzieren.

    YOUR DESIGN

    EN: Make your life your statement. Make our shirt your own.

    DE: Mach dein Leben zu deinem Statement. Mache unser Shirt zu deinem.

    DURABLE DESIGN

    EN: The fabric was designed to be tough and last longer than regular fabrics. However, our philosophy is to provide a great product, with a premium fabric, sustainable, responsible, functional, and long lasting. We will not produce in masses. We will not introduce discounts either, in order to take our responsible part. Commitment to sustainability is in our DNA.

    DE: Das Gewebe wurde so konzipiert, dass es widerstandsfähig ist und länger hält als herkömmliche Gewebe. Unsere Philosophie ist es jedoch, ein großartiges Produkt mit einem erstklassigen, nachhaltigen, verantwortungsbewussten, funktionellen und langlebigen Stoff zu liefern. Wir werden nicht in Massen produzieren. Wir werden auch keine Rabatte einführen, um unseren verantwortungsvollen Part zu übernehmen. Das Bekenntnis zur Nachhaltigkeit liegt in unserer DNA.

     

    RECYCLING

    EN: TENCEL™ Fibers are compostable and therefore biodegradable. A decomposition of 75% within 60 days can be proven.

    DE: TENCEL™ Fasern sind kompostierbar und damit biologisch abbaubar. Ein Zerfall von 75 % konnte innerhalb von 60 Tagen nachgewiesen werden.

     

    SUSTAINABLE MATERIALS

    EN: Sustainable wood sources are obtained from certified and controlled forests.

    DE: Nachhaltige Holzquellen werden aus zertifizierten und kontrollierten Wäldern gewonnen.

     

    RESPONSIBLE PRODUCTION

    EN: The fabric composite uses wood. The process water used in spinning is recycled and more than 99% of the solvent is returned to the production cycle

    DE: Das beim Spinnen verwendete Prozesswasser wird recycelt und führt das Lösungsmittel zu mehr als 99% in den Produktionskreislauf zurück.

     

    SUSTAINABLE DISTRIBUTION

    EN: Climate neutral shipping Our chosen shipping method makes a sustainable contribution to climate protection. They offset the transport-related CO2 emissions of your individual parcel quantities.

    DE: Klimaneutraler Versand Die von uns gewählte Versandart leistet einen nachhaltigen Beitrag zum Klimaschutz. Sie kompensieren die transportbedingten CO2-Emissionen Ihrer individuellen Paketmengen. Unsere Versandverpackung und dessen Bestandteile pflanzt Bäume. ​

     

     

    Hobo Special

     

    ​EN: 10 portable outdoor fireplaces for solid fuel as a special edition 

    DE: 10 portable Outdoor-Feuerstellen für Festbrennstroffe als Special Edition

     

     

     

    Style: LOGO

    Style: TRAIL 

    Style: WANDERER 

    Style: SUNSET

     

    Style: PFALZ

    Style: SUNRISE

     

    TIMELINE

     

    SOMETHING ELSE

    EN: Every detail of our packaging does not use plastic and will plant trees.

    DE: Unsere Versandverpackung und dessen Bestandteile bestehen nicht aus Plastik und pflanzt Bäume.

     

     

    RISKS & CHALLANGES

    EN: We have done our homework and did a lot of iterations, many prototypes with various fabrics. We personally tested thoroughly this awesome shirt, as well as cyclists, trail runners, hikers, mountain bikers. The fabric will be made with the successful launch of the kickstarter campaign. We can fulfill this project on schedule. However, as always in life some unforeseen challenges or the problems could still happen, especially in these unprecedented and uncertain times. We promise to do our best to fix all issues asap. If there's any unpredictable thing occurred, we'll keep all backers informed via updates, and respond to each of your concerns transparently. In other words, we'll take full responsibility to assist you through appropriate methods as we can. We are committed in bringing this great shirts to you. We make it right, you make it yours.

    DE: Wir haben unsere Hausaufgaben gemacht und eine Menge Iterationen gemacht, viele Prototypen mit verschiedenen Stoffen. Wir haben dieses tolle Shirt persönlich ausgiebig getestet, ebenso wie Radfahrer, Trailrunner, Wanderer, Mountainbiker. Das Shirt wird mit dem erfolgreichen Start der Kickstarter-Kampagne hergestellt. Wir können dieses Projekt termingerecht erfüllen. Wie immer im Leben könnten jedoch einige unvorhergesehene Herausforderungen oder Probleme auftreten, insbesondere in diesen beispiellosen und unsicheren Zeiten. Wir versprechen, unser Bestes zu tun, um alle Probleme so schnell wie möglich zu lösen. Wenn etwas Unvorhersehbares passiert ist, werden wir alle Geldgeber über Updates auf dem Laufenden halten und auf jedes Ihrer Anliegen transparent reagieren. Mit anderen Worten, wir werden die volle Verantwortung übernehmen, Sie durch geeignete Methoden zu unterstützen, so gut wir können. Wir haben uns verpflichtet, Ihnen diese großartigen T-Shirts zu bringen.

story:
Never shop for men's underwear again!

It is a hassle you don’t think about until it is too late, but now you will always have the right fit, in a classic style and we produce them sustainably.  Your underwear will arrive in a quarterly refresh pack, so you will have respectable underwear for the rest of your life.

Limited Offer: €30 discount voucher

We recommend backing us with the Sample Pack perk to experience the product's premium quality - backers will get a €30 discount voucher for the full subscription when your sample pack is shipped.

How the Subscription Works

Each pack has the basics a man needs to refresh his underwear drawer, without any more worry about fit, quality or style. And we take back old cotton basics to give them a new life as alternatives to plastic products. We’re bringing sustainable basics to the next level!

 

Always delivered to your door. Like magic!

 

 

Choose Your Pack

 

 

Our Goals

  • Get 100 subscribers. Getting any more than that would be a bonus!
  • Produce our first batch of packs to begin the service.
  • Expand our product range.
  • Create a circular economy for men's basics.

We're offering a special price for one-year and half-year subscriptions with the promise that you'll get to experience the service to simplify one part of your life in a sustainable way. 

 

Premium Quality Basics @ Affordable Prices!

 

 

Benefits / Rewards

  • 1-year subscription with 20% discount (€211)
  • Half-year subscription with 20% discount (€105)
  • Sample Pack - 1 x Shirt, 1 x Boxer-briefs, 1 x pair socks (€30)

NOTE: You will be able to choose your sizes and select your colour pack in a survey we send to the email associated with your account before we ship the first packs. 

 

Let's close the loop together!

 

Sustainability

We design with the end in mind, which means using 100% organic and sustainable materials where possible to ensure the product is more easily recycled, degraded or composted at the end of its lifecycle.

 

Size Chart

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

And if you are not ready for the subscription options, we have some smaller perks to pledge your support and help us further innovate our recycling processes.

Share this campaign and let those men in your life who need respectable underwear know what is happening. Share, share and share some more.

Risks & Challenges

With launching a new service into the world, there are risks and challenges. We feel confident that the risk for this project is very low. We are ready to begin our production process once our funding goal is hit. Our team is 100% ready to bring Refresh Basics sustainable underwear into the world. Generally the biggest risk on any crowdfunding platform is for unknown delays in manufacturing. Things can always change along the way when bringing a new product into the world for the first time. With a sustainably produced product and service in the circular economy, there are many obstacles to tackle and we are ready to take them all on. 

This isn't our first start-up and we are ready to tackle any unforeseen issues that come our way. We plan to bring Refresh Basics in its most sustainable and simple to use format as outlined on this project. All information we disclose in updates, in the comments and in private or direct messages in this campaign or through emails is subject to change as we move through production. There may be critical decisions we need to make moving forward that we did not foresee or that we cannot control. Our ultimate goal is to deliver your men’s underwear basics to our supporters and the world!

Our business is underwear basics for men and we want to feel as good in our souls as we do in our underwear. There is value to be found across all of our business processes and we are passionate about optimising every step for waste reduction and sustainability, from start to end and back again. We try to improve every day to be better for the next day. We're not superheroes, but we know we need to do something.

Our business is underwear basics for men and we want to feel as good in our souls as we do in our underwear. We try to improve every day to be better for the next day. We're not superheroes, but we know we need to do something.

story:
The Galactic Hub Project is a Civilized Space community focused on exploring a specific area of the Euclid galaxy with other players. This includes the Rentocniijik Expanse and 10 specific surrounding regions. To show your love for this community, please pledge any amount above £1 ($1.31) to the IndieGoGo campaign to guarantee a metallic, hard enamel 'Galactic Hub' pin badge.

When donating, you must include your email or Reddit username. Otherwise it will be considered an anonymous donation - which is certainly appreciated!

All pins will be sold on Etsy. Donors to the IndieGoGo campaign will receive a coupon code to waive all costs besides shipping. (This will make it easier to deal with shipping costs, as no shipping costs will be considered during the Campaign Phase. It would just be too complicated with people outside of the US. Shipping costs may be subject to change after I ship the first few out.)

Non-shipping costs will just be $1 per pin. Any small amount of profit will be split between u/AndyKrycek6 (the person managing this campaign) and u/morgvom_org (the artist of both emblems).

 

IndieGoGo's minimum goal amount is £500. We don't expect to reach that amount, however with their flexible goal amount, we can keep all contributions regardless of whether the goal is met. So any and all contributions are welcome to kick this off

story:
Vessi's are the World's First 100% Waterproof Knit Shoes

Designed to fit, feel and perform like a regular shoe yet protect against all types of weather. Our patented Flash Knit technology will keep your feet dry, whatever the season. Don't compromise style for functionality with Vessi's.

 

 

 

 

 

Puddle Proof and Easy To Clean

No need to avoid those puddles ever again. Our Flash Knit material allows for easy cleaning thanks to Vessi's hydrophobic surface treatment.

100% Protected up to your ankles.

Complete protection all the way up to your ankles. Vessi's upper is built from our proprietary one-piece circle knitting manufacturing process. No seams to allow water to come through.

Breathable and Moisture Wicking. 

Unlike other waterproof shoes, Vessi's Flash Knit upper allows your feet to breathe, reducing sweat and odor build up.

 

 

 

 

 

Vessi's Flash Knit is built with 3 Distinct Functional Layers

The Nano-Filtering Membrane and the heart of Vessi's upper is a waterproof and moisture-wicking layer that keeps your feet dry while allowing moisture from your sweat and body heat to escape the shoe. Being waterproof means that the area of your feet covered by Vessi shoes is completely impervious to water. This is not a coating and the waterproofing function will last the lifespan of the shoe.

The Stretch Knit Layer of the Vessi upper is a knitted layer composed of a blend of polyester and nylon. We chose this specific blend to create an elastic yet durable knit that stretches to the shape of your feet. This encourages you to move naturally.

The Comfort Lining is designed to mimic the feeling of wearing socks. It is soft to the touch and form-fitting.

Traditional waterproof shoes tend to be stuffy and make your feet sweat and stink due to its lack of ability to regulate the dispersal of moisture. However, Vessi’s moisture-wicking technology regulates the dispersal of moisture thus reducing feet sweat and the buildup of odor.

Vzero Midsoles

In addition to Vessi’s knit features are it's ultra lightweight Vzero midsoles. The composition of these Vzero’s is designed to maximize energy return while providing flexibility and cushioning for every step. The outsole is enhanced with rubber treads for traction in all weather conditions. The sole’s hardness and density are optimized for a perfect balance of lightness and comfort. 

Vessi will provide you with complete protection against water penetration while water repellent or resistant shoes just repel or resist water to a limited degree and will eventually start getting wet after a short period of time.

Waterproof is the highest level of protection against water. Vessi shoes are waterproof which means it will provide you with complete protection against water penetration and keep your feet dry no matter what. 

Water-repellent is a level down; it is not as easily penetrated by water but you will only stay dry for a short time when exposed to water, rain, or any moisture. 

Water-resistant is the lowest level of water protection. These products are designed to make water penetration more difficult, water can still easily penetrate when the products are exposed to water or moisture for a very short period of time. If you submerge your feet in water-resistant shoes, your socks and feet will be soaking wet.

 

Our waterproof and moisture-wicking test. The below image shows a red nano-filtering membrane separating water and air. The membrane layer allows air to escape (breathability) yet is impervious to the water.

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

Sizing Comparison | Vessi's sizing is similar to the fit of many popular running shoes (within a few mm longer than most).

Half Sizes | If you typically wear ½ sizes, we recommend sizing up for a more relaxed fit or sizing down for a snug fit. 

Full Sizes | If you typically wear a full size, we recommend the same size for the best possible fit and comfort.

Size Exchanges | Getting the perfect fit can be difficult especially online. It’s our mission that you get the best possible fit with your Vessi's. Send us a message and we’ll be happy to help you out. 

Still not sure about your size? Here's how you can measure for the right fit.

  • Place a piece of paper against the wall. Place one foot on the piece of paper with your heel against the wall. 
  • Trace around your feet making sure not to move your heel. 
  • Measure your marking from the highest point of your toes to the middle of the heel in cm and add 5 mm. 
  • Take the resulting figure and compare this to the JP/CM part of our chart. 

 

 

We have spent the past 2 years developing a new waterproofing technology we call Flash Knit. After years of research and dozens of prototypes, we are ready to introduce Vessi to the world. We are confident that Vessi's technology is the next innovation in footwear. Below are the initial sampling molds we used to create our initial testing samples.

Vessi shoes are waterproof which means it will provide you with complete protection against water penetration and keep your feet dry no matter what. Water-repellent is a level down; it is not as easily penetrated by water but you will only stay dry for a short time when exposed to water, rain, or any moisture. Water-resistant is the lowest level of water protection. These products are designed to make water penetration more difficult, water can still easily penetrate when the products are exposed to water or moisture for a very short period of time. If you submerge your feet in water-resistant shoes, your socks and feet will be soaking wet.  Our waterproof and moisture-wicking test. The below image shows a red nano-filtering membrane separating water and air. The membrane layer allows air to escape (breathability) yet is impervious to the water.  
 Play

 
Replay with sound


 
Play withsound



00:00


00:00
 
 
 




 
 
 


       Sizing Comparison | Vessi's sizing is similar to the fit of many popular running shoes (within a few mm longer than most).Half Sizes | If you typically wear ½ sizes, we recommend sizing up for a more relaxed fit or sizing down for a snug fit. Full Sizes | If you typically wear a full size, we recommend the same size for the best possible fit and comfort.Size Exchanges | Getting the perfect fit can be difficult especially online. It’s our mission that you get the best possible fit with your Vessi's. Send us a message and we’ll be happy to help you out. Still not sure about your size? Here's how you can measure for the right fit.
Place a piece of paper against the wall. Place one foot on the piece of paper with your heel against the wall. 
Trace around your feet making sure not to move your heel. 
Measure your marking from the highest point of your toes to the middle of the heel in cm and add 5 mm. 
Take the resulting figure and compare this to the JP/CM part of our chart. 
 Our Size Exchange Policy 
If there is a need for an exchange, we will need to charge for the shipping both ways as we are a startup and work with a limited budget. Thank you all for understanding. We will do our best to negotiate with the courier for the most economical shipping for you. This is true for all North American and international orders.
But we are happy to say that because Vessi’s Flash Knit can stretch to conform to the most optimal fit. This makes picking out your size more accommodating thus potentially lowering the need for an exchange.
All exchange requests must be submitted within 30 days of receiving your Indiegogo reward. We will exchange your shoes as long as they are unworn outside, returned with the original packaging and you have the original receipt. We have spent the past 2 years developing a new waterproofing technology we call Flash Knit. After years of research and dozens of prototypes, we are ready to introduce Vessi to the world. We are confident that Vessi's technology is the next innovation in footwear. Below are the initial sampling molds we used to create our initial testing samples.

story:
My name is Paul Gallagher and i am founder of Scutti GB Ltd. The company was formed in May 2010 and for the last 3 years i have been trying to raise finance to bring to life my designs for a new reputable British sportswear brand, because we dont have one.

I have been self employed for around 20 years and i ran a successful materials handling company between 1995 and 2006. Due to a slowdown in business i looked at alternative business idea's. Realising Britain did not have reputable sports brand i decided to create one. A challenge i still pursue.

After trying to raise finance for the last 3 years through all the usual channels, banks, business angels, venture capitalist, government schemes for business funding, all with no success. Undeterred by this i set about financing the operation myself.

I have funded the company formation, registered trademarks, produced small numbers of clothing for brand testing. A online shopping website waiting for my designs to be manufactured and uploaded to the website. Branded woven labels, swing tickets, and i have financed a portfolio of nearly 40 designs waiting to be manufactured. You can see the designs and how the brand looks on http://scutti-sportswear.com

Strategy

The company aims to create at least 3000 self employed homeworkers across the UK to sell the Scutti brand of sportswear direct to homes.We do not intend to supply to retail.

Online development - 

  • at the heart of the strategy is a focus to grow our e-commerce business 
  • international - to offer our products in new markets 

 

Our accountants are Fairhurst Accountants,

address: Douglas Bank House, Wigan Lane, Wigan, Lancashire, UK, WN1 2TB

Scutti is also a business opportunity for entrepreneurial people.

I will continue to strive to make Scutti into a global brand and since i came across this website i thought there may be others out there who want me to succeed. Hopefully one day people can look back and say i help that guy make it and the brand can be sold in years to come for millions.

I believe in philanthropy and like Bill Gates and Warren Buffett who are giving back the billions they made in business to the less fortunate and i would like to do the same, as my contribution to world and help others as others helped me acheive my dream.

By contributing you can make this dream possible.

I will be able to create jobs and around 3000 self employed sales positions in the UK alone expanding globally and that in itself can make people feel better about themselves.  

The business is nearly ready to launch and bring products to  market and the finance will enable me to do this now.

I need £160k to bring the products to market and the money will be used for premises, manufacture the current design range, printing machinery, design software, stock, marketing, working capital and continuous development of products.

Even if i dont receive all the funding anything will help to get the ball rolling and start to manufacture my designs and to take to market.

In return for funding contributors can receive a range of discounts on goods purchased and the contributors can buy and re-sell our goods at a profit. You could become an official licenced distributor of the Scutti brand where ever you are in the world. Brand awareness will become global.

In relative terms £160k to finance the brand is small compared to the size of the UK sports industry which is worth £4.5 billion per year with a growth rate of 3%. We aim to grow rapidly making an immediate impact on the fashion industry in sportswear.

I have previously taken an unknown brand on a very small budget from product development to being seen on television worn by professional sports people. My marketing skills to make Scutti a success are very good with good contacts within the sports industry.

I have a good team of freelance designers that are ex employees of Diadora, Umbro, Tacchini.

I have a excellent merchandiser who has over 30 years experience having worked with Puma, Umbro, Lotto, Diadora, Marks and Spencers, and Burton Group. Details on request. 

If your looking for a new business opportunity and you like the fashion industry, this could be for you. Distributors will be required in all major countries.Scutti is the sexiest name in sportswear. It sounds Italian but it's a British brand. British designed, British owned.

People around the world can help this new brand become global by networking, telling their friends, relatives, work colleagues, and more importantly by wearing a scutti tee shirt, hoodie, sweatshirt etc.

I would like to thank everyone for taking time to read my campaign and wish you all good health and happiness and success.

kind regards

Paul Gallagher

SCUTTI GB LTD

story:
The Dream Flat by OESH is available for pre-order now on oeshshoes.com

 

The Science of the Sole

Unlike the typical dress flat,"The Dream" is a true flat, meaning the OESH Sole is completely flat from heel to toe and side to side in the forefoot region.

The reason for this is simple. OESH Founder Dr. Kerrigan's published research on walking, running and the effects of footwear on the body has uncovered that even a small heel elevation, along with other, often hidden, features in traditional women's dress shoes, abnormally increase impact on the knee and other joints in the body.

The increased impact on the knees may help explain why women are twice as likely as men to develop knee osteoarthritis over a lifetime.

 

 

OESH Soles are made flat from a uniquely springy material that stays flat without developing unwanted contours over time, giving your foot and body the stable foundation you've never had in a women's dress shoe. The springy Sole, made of the highest performance elastomeric material possible, based on years of biomechanical data, is precisely tuned to give you the stability, comfort and performance you could only DREAM of in a dress shoe.

Form Follows Function

Driven by Dr. Kerrigan's research and inspired by the lifestyles of active women, the Dream is designed to make you feel incredible all day long, whether its hustling around an office, running around town or dancing in the rain. Its design is wonderfully versatile, and comfortably transitions from a day of work to a night out in the city. 

Most dress flats are narrower in the forefoot and toe box than most women's forefoot and toes are naturally. Try tracing your bare foot on a piece of paper, then trace a pair of dress shoes you wear on top. More likely than not, the outline of your foot at the toes fits OUTSIDE the outline of the shoe! Consistently squeezing your forefoot and toes into shoes with a narrow forefoot and toe box not only hurts, decreases your circulation and permanently deforms the shape of your feet, it has negative effects on the joints above your foot as well. 

 

 At OESH, we don't think deforming your forefoot and toes and compromising your foot's natural function is especially attractive. 

Instead, we believe your natural feminine foot shape, which is wider in the forefoot and narrower in the heel compared to men, is beautiful.

And functional.

Unique Stretchy Sock-Like Upper

A soft stretchy knit upper gently hugs your foot without bunching up or digging in while enabling further movement in your foot and toes. This is in contrast to your usual shoe upper material which hardly even accommodates the change in your foot size that occurs throughout the day. How are we able to do this? With a unique combined experience in both biomechanics and manufacturing. The upper is knitted on a computerized knitting machine with just the right amount of tension and stretchiness to accommodate all those natural foot size and shape changes. Bottomline, you can comfortably wear them all day and all night!

The Story of OESH

OESH Shoes was born from Dr. Casey Kerrigan's 20 years of research on the biomechanics of walking and running and the effect of footwear on the body. Dr. Kerrigan received an M.D. from Harvard Medical School which just featured her unlikely journey from medicine to footwear in the current issue of Harvard Medicine Magazine.

Her discoveries that heel elevation and other features in traditional women's dress shoes not only hurt the foot but also increase impact on the knees and other joints, have been featured in Glamour, Mademoiselle, the New York Times, Prevention, Newsweek, ABC's 20/20 and other news. Her specialty of physical medicine and rehabilitation has to do with performance and the long-term health and well-being of the whole body. With over a hundred peer-reviewed research publications, she dreamed of a better shoe. But to make it would require developing an entirely new sole material and design. So, she built a factory and started developing and making. Since 2011 women all over the world are now wearing OESH and telling us how much they love them. 

For more information about OESH Shoes, visit www.OESHshoes.com

Innovation

OESH is uniquely committed to innovation and research. OESH is the only shoe company that is recognized by the U.S. National Science Foundation with a Phase I and Phase II Small Business Innovation Research Award for footwear manufacturing. In 2016, Dr. Kerrigan was recognized as one of the top 100 woman leaders in manufacturing (and the only leader in footwear manufacturing) by the U.S. Manufacturing Institute with a STEP (Science, Technology, Engineering and Production) Ahead Award. In April 2018, OESH Shoes was awarded the "Innovator of the Year" Award by the Charlottesville Business Innovation Council at its 20th Anniversary Gala Celebration.

Integral to developing the OESH Dream was creating numerous prototypes using a proprietary 3D printing process which OESH specially developed to print its elastomeric material. With support from the National Science Foundation, OESH continues to refine its novel 3D printing process and currently uses it not only to prototype new footwear styles but also to manufacture in their entirety, our award-winning Athena and Artemis sandal soles. 

Sustainability

Dr. Kerrigan's research informs a shoe design that is not only easier on the body, but also easier on the planet. The traditional shoe design typically combines numerous needless and often unhealthy materials bonded to one another with toxic VOC laden adhesives and primers.

The Dream ballet flat is simplistic in design with only three main components: the upper which is  knit all in one piece and hand sewn to minimize waste and maximize wear, a proprietary non-vinyl elastic spring Sole that is easier on workers and on the environment than the typical vinyl rubber and EVA (ethylene vinyl acetate) used in the shoe industry, and a removable insole that is similarly devoid of vinyl. Because the Sole is a single unit and does not contain any vinyls, it obviates the need for any of the toxic VOC adhesives and primers typically used in the industry. 

Testimonials & Customer Service

OESHers around the world have been loving the unique spring and fit of OESH Shoes for years. If you get a chance, you can see the enormous amount of feedback we regularly post on the OESHers Say page of the website. And we have hundreds of reviews on Google and Facebook with sterling ratings of 4.8 and 4.7--exceptional for any apparel company but nearly unheard of for a footwear brand. We believe these reviews are due to our eagerness to listen and improve OESH Footwear where and when we can. As long as suggestions can be met in the realm of peer-reviewed medical science, we weigh the merits of great ideas constantly. The upshot is that OESH, without question, has the most sophisticated and educated consumer base in the footwear world. Our respect for OESHers is the spine of our business--and our excellent, fair, yet firm execution of consistent Customer Service speaks directly to this relationship.

          

But even we have been blown away with the first comments from women wearing the Dream:

"Jinkies! Those are comfortable!"

-Cassie, New Haven

"I usually wear sneakers for my commute, but if I was wearing these, I would never take them off!"

-Katie, Vienna

"...Can I keep these?" 

-Becca, Cambridge

Timeline

Team 

OESH is based in Charlottesville, Virginia where all OESH Footwear are designed, developed and tested. Like several of our footwear lines, your Dreams will be made and shipped back to the Charlottesville Factory by ocean vessels from our manufacturing team in Jinjiang, China. OESH then Fulfills your order from Charlottesville directly to your home. This means Dr. Kerrigan doesn't have to knit every pair of uppers by hand! Rather, hundreds of computerized knitting machines like the one Dr. Kerrigan is programming above in Jinjiang, will be used to create the stretchy knit uppers.

OESH has been working with the same manufacturing team for many years, and our close relationship continues to benefit both sides of the Pacific. Pictured above are Managing Directors Charlie and Yvonne with Dr. Kerrigan and her youngest daughter on the Dream development trip earlier in 2018. We are especially pleased with the long-term health benefits our focus on Sustainability (above) creates for those we work with in Asia. This is an essential virtue of backing OESH and one where we again lead the shoe industry by doing the right thing for our entire Team.

Established soon after OESH began rolling volume through our Charlottesville factory, this international partnership combines hundreds of hands working together to make a line of finished shoes. Impressively, OESH has carved a unique fit and manufacturing process within the hub of world-wide footwear making, allowing us to produce beautiful shoes in high volume--one finished pair at a time. A proven long-term partnership ensures that the shoes you receive are well made with the highest quality materials, for our most comfortable, practical, and stylish shoe yet. 

Frequently Asked Questions

How do you pronounce OESH?

OESH is pronounced like the first syllable of ocean, ōSH. The name OESH turns the word “shoe” upside-down and inside-out, the same thing OESH Shoes has done with the idea of footwear.  

How do I choose my size? 

We will e-mail you! The Dream will be available in sizes 5-12 (US Women's).  Also, if it's not a perfect fit you will be able to exchange them. 

I have foot issues! Should I try OESH?

Absolutely! The unique comfort and design of OESH Shoes can be enjoyed by everyone. OESHers include runners, rock climbers, surgeons, baristas, and just about anyone who uses their feet. OESH has also been the shoe of choice for women with a wide range of conditions including Morton’s neuroma, knee pain, metatarsalgia, and especially during and after pregnancy. 

Is the Dream flat vegan/eco-friendly/sustainably made?

Yes! The Dream does not contain any animal products, EVA foam, vinyl, latex, or toxic adhesives. The upper is knitted all in one piece to minimize waste and maximize wear and comfort.

What is all this peer reviewed research the design of the Dream ballet flat is based on? 

If you're interested in reading the research OESH design is based on, try starting with Knee osteoarthritis and high-heeled shoes (The Lancet, 9 May 1998)  and The Race to Build a Better Shoe: Biomechanists now know how to build a healthier shoe. So why aren't shoe companies making them? (IEEE pulse, 2014). DC Kerrigan, M.D. has written over 100 published journal articles on gait and movement, but you don't need to read them all to feel the benefits of OESH Shoes! 

Can I wear orthotics with my Dream?

Absolutely! The insole is removable. Just replace it with your orthotic. 

Connect with Us

We've always relied on email as our primary means of communication. The reason is simple--this method avails you of a permanent, written response from one of our experts here at OESH. If you have any questions about the Campaign or more general inquiry regarding OESH Shoes, please email indiegogo@oeshshoes.com

Or connect with us on social media: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram

If you're interested in reading the research OESH design is based on, try starting with Knee osteoarthritis and high-heeled shoes (The Lancet, 9 May 1998)  and The Race to Build a Better Shoe: Biomechanists now know how to build a healthier shoe. So why aren't shoe companies making them? (IEEE pulse, 2014). DC Kerrigan, M.D. has written over 100 published journal articles on gait and movement, but you don't need to read them all to feel the benefits of OESH Shoes! 
Can I wear orthotics with my Dream?
Absolutely! The insole is removable. Just replace it with your orthotic. 

Connect with Us
We've always relied on email as our primary means of communication. The reason is simple--this method avails you of a permanent, written response from one of our experts here at OESH. If you have any questions about the Campaign or more general inquiry regarding OESH Shoes, please email indiegogo@oeshshoes.com
Or connect with us on social media: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram

story:
Probably the best No-Show socks for men in the world

Strolling down the street, you want to look good in your new sneakers. You don't want to stop every 2 minutes and pull your socks up and you don’t want to show the rim of your socks at the same time. And going sockless - well that hurts and will most definitely stink! And when you do take your shoes off, you don't want the room to clear, because of how your socks smell and how they look.  

Impossible? It used to be, but not anymore. 

At William & Sterling, we decided to develop what is probably the best No-Show socks for Men in the world. We have created well-designed anti-microbial No-Show socks, made to stay on your feet and keep them fresh throughout the whole day. And our technical silicon solution is eco-friendly with no by-products.



Design and Prototyping

Our journey started in 2015 with an ambitious idea, to make the best No-Show socks for Men, period! We often found ourselves borrowing or buying women's No-Show socks, as there was so much more to choose from compared to the men’s sections. We started asking around and found that every man that have tried out the sockless style, faced exactly the same problems as us. Either they:

  • Wore ankle socks and had the sock-rim show above their shoes
  • Bought socks from women’s department - but the smaller sizes made them ill fitted
  • Wore generic No-Show socks that ALWAYS roll off their feet
  • They went totally sockless and got smelly and blistered feet 

We started our designing process with these issues in hand. We then spend many hours and thousands of dollars on prototyping. For the past 10 months, we have distributed thousands of socks to gain feedback. This massive data was then used to develop our products even further.

Designed in Sweden, and Made in Europe

As quality and design are the key components to out No-Show socks we needed to ensure that the hardest quality and ethical standards were being followed by our manufactures. We have therefore chosen to team up with world renowned manufacturers in Europe to keep to our promise. These experts have decades of experience within the textile industry, and sustainable sourcing.

 

During the development process we tackled many challenges:

Our main challenge was to find out why No-Show socks ALWAYS roll of the feet. It took us over 8 months of research and development to figure out the root of the problem, and to come up with the perfect solution for a one size fit. Most No-Show socks on the market also have a silicone strip on the heel, but they still roll off. We found however, that the Silicone most brands use, the Size and Pattern of their silicone strip, and its Position, is not helping the socks to stay up. We have taken all these four points to another level, and created socks that stay up the whole day.

 

 

Our second challenge was to figure out why feet smell, even when we wear socks. We found out that our feet, on an average, produce over 17oz (500ml) of sweat per day. And since bacteria love to feed on sweat, it gives off a strong smell as it eliminates waste products. So it’s not the sweat itself that stinks, it’s the by-products of the bacteria living of your sweat. That is why we decided to collaborate with a European manufacturer of a patented, organic anti-microbial solution for textiles. All our socks are anti-microbial treated, meaning that we will dramatically reduce the germs in your socks and shoes, hence reduce the unwanted smells.

Anti-microbial solution, Goodbye smelly feet!

 

Our 3rd challenge was to design No-Show socks that you actually want to show off. The limitations of the male sock selection leaves men to buy socks from women’s departments where size and shape is not ideal for the male foot. Problems such as peekaboo toes, bare heels and smelly feet are a common ordeal where it often ends up with men walking around sockless and barefoot - adding up to blisters. After months of observing and studying the global sock industry and the way men use their No-Show socks, we not only focused on the functionality of the socks but we also set out to make them fashionable. We designed 12 patterns to complement both your casual and formal look ending up with socks that look good, feel good and smell good.

 

For our 4th and last challenge, we need your help.

For us to keep the high quality and design that we have set out to reach, we needed to ensure that we work with the best manufacturers for our socks. Therefore, we need to cover our manufacturers large MOQ's (Minimum Order Quantity). By reaching a larger order volume, we will be able to reduce our purchasing price. 

Support our vision of taking this product to market.  Every contribution counts.

story:
The Brellabag wins Gründer-Garage competition!!!!

Many thanks to all of you! You made it happen!

 

The Brellabag - cause it's waterproof 

Wie alles begann

So haben wir es oft erlebet : Schnell den Taschenschirm aufspannen und zur Metro laufen. Uff, gerade noch und einen Platz ergattert ...

Wohin nun mit dem tropfnassen Regenschirm?

Zusammenfalten, in die Hülle stecken und zurück in die Handtasche? Aber halt! Die Hülle ist ja nicht wasserdicht und wird feucht. Zurück in die Handtasche geht kaum, denn Handy, Papiere und Geldbörse müssen trocken bleiben.

Wer braucht denn so was? Ständig den nassen Schirm auf sicheren Abstand in der Hand tragen oder abstellen und wieder einmal vergessen? Das ist doch nervig!

Unsere Idee ist eine wasserdichte Regenschirmhülle, die schnell über den Schirm gestreift werden kann und der Schirm danach getrost in der Handtasche verschwindet.

Das ist der Brellabag! Eine wasserdichte Regenschirmhülle, leicht und unkompliziert, in verschiedenen Farben und für gängige Taschenschirmgrößen.

What is the story

Rather than throwing your soaking wet umbrella in your bag wouldn’t you feel better quickly sliding it into a secure waterproof bag, rather than into a conventional bag that is not waterproof?

 
What is the Brellabag
The Brellabag is a waterproof umbrellabag that protects all the valuables inside your bag : It keeps the rain out of your handbag!
 
 
 

What are the benefits

 

  • Waterproof - protects all your valuables

  • Easy to handle – slide in quickly

  • Flexible - fits all sizes of umbrellas

  • Lightweight - no extra weight

  • Stylish - comes in different colours and styles

 

What more about the Brellabag

  • Neoprene
  • 25cm long
  • fits umbrellas 20cm to 29cm

 

What we aim for

Work space > the main thing we are hoping to get out of this campaign is a great work space. We have been working in cafes and even at the kitchen table.
 
Market research > we would also like to perform market research to better understand the needs of Brellabag users, and do a top branding campaign.
 
Develop the product > we would like to further develop the Brellabag. 
 
Manufacturing > to prepare for the next step - manufacturing and bringing the Brellabag onto the shelves.
 
Be part of it > the Brellabag is just a start. We are working on more ideas and we would love you to be part of the journey by helping to bring the Brellabag to market. 

 

How can you help

Share our campaign > support us by passing on this campaign to as many friends as possible. Share us on facebook and other social media networks and follow us on twitter.
 
Contribute to our campaign > donate to our campain and get some amazing perks.

You tell us more > give us feedback. Do you like the product? Is there anything you would like to improve? Do you like the name? Do you have an idea about what the name should be? We would love to hear from you!

 

>>> We cant wait to get started. Be a part of our exciting journey and make the Brellabag happen!

 

 Elizabeth, Angelika and Gen working at the kitchen table

story:
Who Are We?

Joe Dunbar Designs is located in beautiful Talent, Oregon. Joe Dunbar and Lynae Williams have created a fashion house where designers and artists can come together to fulfill their artistic vision. They focus on one of a kind garments from ready to wear clothing to evening and bridal as well as costumes for theater, dance, and movies. All of the projects are made in their studio in Talent.

The design house is a teaching facility where interns can come learn and help create garments in the studio. Joe and Lynae continue to learn, try new techniques and push creative boundaries. Joe Dunbar Designs has had 8 interns that have mentored with the team and the majority of them have continued in the fashion industry.

Joe Dunbar earned his degree in apparel design in Portland, Oregon where he also had his own bridal shop. In addition to designing, Joe is a gifted painter and artist.

Lynae has a degree in apparel design from the Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising. She was one of Joe's first interns and now works beside Joe.

Our Project

We are shooting a documentary style movie that encompasses the creative process behind initiating and executing a full scale fashion show. 

Director Kadi Carlson, originally from southern Oregon and now an LA resident, will be shooting the film with her crew. Kadi is currently a student at AI, graduating in June 2013.

The runway portion of the documentary will be filmed August 2nd through the 5th.

Currently, we are in the preliminary stages of planning the event. The fashion show itself will include three sections:
  • Party Dresses, featuring our signature little black dresses
  • Costumes, including theatrical and dance
  • Finale, showcasing both bridal and evening gowns

The show will feature new looks, which are currently in the design phase as wall as classic pieces from our archives. The documentary will showcase the process of sketching through the completion of garments as well as the final show.

This documentary will not only feature the design house and it's garments, but will also provide a behind the scenes look at all components of a fashion show. The models, make up artists, and hair stylists will have the opportunity to be showcased for their craft.

We will be using 10 models (with two alternates) to walk in our show, which we are currently casting for. Some of the models we are using have started their careers walking in Joe Dunbar Designs shows throughout the years. Hair and make up artists are being selected by both Joe Dunbar Designs and Kadi Carlson.
 
 
 

What We Need 

  • Fabric and Trims
  • Director and Crew
  • Equipment Rental, such as lighting and stage
  • Props, including masks and backdrops
Our goal was set at the minimum required to fund this project. The $6,000 will be used to compensate the film crew for their travel expenses and rental equipment as well as purchase fabric and trims for the garments. Any funding above and beyond our goal will be used to purchase better quality props and materials, compensate the models and crew, and contribute to the editing and distribution of the film.
 
The most difficult part of the completion of this project will be to keep all the creative talent flowing in one direction that makes everyone satisfied with the end product.

The garments are currently being made, models have been cast, and the crew is being gathered by both Joe Dunbar and Kadi Carlson. There will naturally be some last minute switches, but the design team and film crew feel well-prepared to handle any changes that may arise.

The Joe Dunbar Designs crew has worked on several productions including theater, ballet, movies and many runway shows. The team is used to the fast-paced and constantly changing environment on set and during preparation.

There is a large group of talented people working on this project who share the same goal of creating a beautiful film. It is our hope that this will be an amazing experience for the talent/crew and enjoyable for the public to view.

We greatly appreciate your support! 

Remember, every dollar counts! Even small contributions mean a great deal to us! If you aren't able to contribute financially, please spread the word! Share our link with your friends!

story:
Our Story

Gangfeather was created by the two fine artist sisters Lauren Stout and Ashley West in the summer of 2010.


Lauren: "The timing was impeccable, I had just come back from Spain and Ashley had graduated from high school. We entered our music video in the video contest for the band The Prodigy in January 2010, where I had drawn the gangfeather symbol on our faces. Ashley later digitized the symbol and gave our brand its name."

Ashley: "I remember liking the image concept Lauren had created.  I even tried to incorporate it into my concentration for my AP 2D Art class last year.  I was sitting at the computer with the image pulled up on Photoshop.  I previously had digitized the image, drawing my own version of it on Photoshop. I pondered what the title of the piece should be. It looked like a feather, but It also looked like a gang sign. I literally put to and two together and came up with gangfeather!  The name would also be very simple to explain."

 

The Impact

Gangfeather will close the gap between fine art and street wear. We're not JUST a skater brand, we're not JUST a trendy brand, there are no boundaries. Our designs all begin as little sparks in our brains, otherwise known as ideas. These ideas get developed in sketch books and later adapted to garments by screen printing or hot press.  

If we aren't able to raise enough funds, we wont be able to create our clothing line or go to the apparel markets. It's very hard to support a business with what little income we already get from our art projects on the side.  Please help us find our place in the career we're absolutely passionate about!

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $7000 to help pay for our 2011 fall and winter line. The money will be used to pay our screenprinter, our branding items aka hangtags and etc., marketing, and a booth at the apparel market.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please tell everyone you know about gangfeather. If you don't have enough time to explain to your friends just tell them to look us up on Indiegogo. Thank you all for your support. It is greatly appreciated!

Gangfeather will close the gap between fine art and street wear. We're not JUST a skater brand, we're not JUST a trendy brand, there are no boundaries. Our designs all begin as little sparks in our brains, otherwise known as ideas. These ideas get developed in sketch books and later adapted to garments by screen printing or hot press.  
If we aren't able to raise enough funds, we wont be able to create our clothing line or go to the apparel markets. It's very hard to support a business with what little income we already get from our art projects on the side.  Please help us find our place in the career we're absolutely passionate about!

What We Need & What You Get
We need to raise $7000 to help pay for our 2011 fall and winter line. The money will be used to pay our screenprinter, our branding items aka hangtags and etc., marketing, and a booth at the apparel market.

Other Ways You Can Help
Please tell everyone you know about gangfeather. If you don't have enough time to explain to your friends just tell them to look us up on Indiegogo. Thank you all for your support. It is greatly appreciated!

story:
4" Round Vinyl Rustic Hound Sticker

$3.00 Perk

 

Christmas Specialty Collars $25

Suns & Paws Collar $20 + $3 shipping = $23

 

Our Best Selling Specialty Collar

Skulls collar $25 Perk

     

 

 

ONE COLLAR with ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES

Collars are waterproof, fade resistant, eco-friendly, easy to clean, and don't smell after your dog dives in the water-Patent Pending

Collars work with interchangeable Jibbitz shoe charms that lock into place.

 

 AS SEEN IN


                 

 

Our Story

Jerry, and I met for the first time on Superbowl Sunday in 2010.  I really didn't think there was someone out there as crazy as me until I met him :) He is a 4th generation Iron Worker, and I work in Law Enforcement.

I must confess that it was Jerry's dog Rockie that first caught my eye!  I grew up around all types of animals, but never met a Great Dane before.  I couldn't resist his OUTSTANDING personality!!

 

So much so that we just had to get another!  

When I met Harbor it was love at first sight!  She went EVERYWHERE with me. When she started getting bigger a lot of people kept telling me how handsome she was, and that drove me insane.  I looked everywhere for a dog collar that would tell the world that Harbor was a lady!   I couldn't find anything, and started making my own. They weren't doing the job, and Jerry took the matter into his own hands.

Harbor was getting quite the reaction with her new collar.  Everywhere I took her someone had something to say about it.   They loved it, and wanted to know where they could get one for their dog. I remember walking into the house, and just saying to my family we need to make more of these! That was the beginning of our adventure...

Why we need your help now?

Over the past year we had our share of sink, or swim moments!  I taught myself to build a website, learned the art of photography (thousands of pictures later), and Jerry worked countless hours with a manufacturer that couldn't unerstand why he wanted  holes in a dog collar.  

Ours first manufacturer took us for a ride, and when our order showed up 30% of the collars were not assembled properly.  They were of no use to us, and we had to start from square one.  Searching all over again for someone to take on our project, but determined to get it done.  When we found someone to develop them for us we still had to pay to have all new molds created.

On paper I think we have always looked like a much larger company than we are.  In all reality I run around like a maniac every morning trying to get everything done before work the evening shift.

Those were some of the really tough months.  Everyone was skeptical about our CRAZY IDEAS, and we did our best to ignore them. 

Help us expand our business, and bring everyone the perfect dog collar for their dog.  We currently manufacture our collars in one style, and 3 sizes.  Our goal is to expand our line with more sizes, colors, and option.  

  • Marketing

  • Advertising

  • Trade Shows

  • Packaging Development

  • Product Development

  • Legal Fees

This year we over shot our donation budget, and we hope to do that every year!

 

Frequently asked questions:

Q.  What is the difference between our Original, and 2nd Generation collars?  

A.  We have already manufactured, and currently sell our Original collars.  The 2nd Generation collars will have the lanyard molded inside the collar.  This has never been done by a collar company before.

Q. What do the T-Shirts look like?

A. Shirts will be similiar to our current style, but will have the Indiegogo Campain logo.

story:
After a successful pre-sale crowdfunding campaign we are excited to bring Hardin backpacks to Indegogo! The good folks at Indiegogo felt that our backpacks were up to the task and offered to feature us in the InDemand section. There are no early-bird specials, but if you place an order by February 29th we can promise shipment in March. Thanks for stopping by and checking out our campaign, feel free to message us with questions or concerns.

The current day bag market is flooded with low quality products. The current backpacks are too focused on gimmicks and overly complicated designs. We were tired of losing our headphones in the abyss of a 9-compartment backpack while breaking the one-way zipper.

We adapted a classic military design to fit your daily life. We focused on simple features and kept a clean look. All materials are American-sourced and the bag is sewn in Southern California. The backpack is built to last a lifetime and you may never need to buy another day bag.


We offer two color options: OD Green & Black



No zippers means less moving parts thus less to break. The design relies on a folding closure system than can also be locked. (see video)




No plastic EVER. We only use metal components.



The patches on the shoulder straps pay tribute to a lot of wasted hours at the beach...


Hidden interior Velcro pocket (left). Exterior pocket with pen holder and metal snap.


CONSTRUCTION:

  • 1000 DENIER Weatherproof CORDURA® Brand (Exterior)
  • Coated Ripstop Nylon Fabric Liner (Interior)
  • MIL- SPEC Nylon Webbing (Handle and Straps)


SOME OF OUR FAVORITES:

story:
Please let us introduce ourselves.  We are Fleur Pierets en Paulien Boom and we are on the verge of launching the first glossy magazine that combines naughtiness with a touch of art, a slice of fetish, a lot of engagement and a bucket of chic.

 

ET ALORS?

The first flamboyant style magazine about fun, fashion, fetish, art, gender, literature, gay, culture, glamour and icons.

 

4x a year

In English

10.000 copies

260 pages

Worldwide distribution

1st. issue = december 2011

 

Our personal references:

After getting the degree of licentiate in history of art and communication, Fleur Pierets spent the following ten years running Glamor Is Undead. A cultural event organisation with customers such as Kunstenfestival/des Arts Brussels, Antwerp Open, Fashion Museum Antwerp and Cultuurcentrum Mechelen.  She freelances as a journalist for Elle and the Dutch art magazine Isel.  She will be the guest editor-in-chief for the January 2012 issue “Women in Arts” of Isel.

Her partner, Paulien Boom, is travelling around the world as a freelance hydrographer. Next to being a Drag king model, she’s also one of the most important spokeswomen within the transgender community in Amsterdam.

 

Due to our preference for exclusivity,  Et Alors?  will be printed on 10.000 copies. We create most of our content ourselves for which we are collaborating with a large scale of artists, writers and photographers. 

 

We will feature interviews, photos, art and illustrations from an International collection of artists, musicians and cultural catalysts. Et Alors? fills the gaps between a naughty lifestyle, special-interest publications and style. With a high class take on the people and things we love. Art, music, culture, and sex coexist interdependently, just like they do in our everyday lives. Our contributors and features span diverse ethnicities, nationalities, genders, opinions and media. With more practice than theory, more kink than censorship, and more subversion than advertising.

 

Our target groups are open-minded inspired men and women, higher social classes executing rewarding jobs and with a tendency to spend their money on high quality, visually attractive and original trendy goods. They can fall in love with a piece of art and are looking forward to be surprised by things they never heard about. Just  to get their brains tickled. They do not mind a naughty word or two either, as long as it sounds stylish.

 

 If you are interested in advertising and you want to receive some of the content that's already finished, please send an email with your company  details to:

info@lamaitressedupirate.com

 

If you're unable to contribute financially--and even if you are!--please help us to reach our fund-raising goal by spreading the word about our IndieGoGo campaign. Use the share tools on this website to help drive traffic to our page. Every little bit helps, and your efforts truly will make a difference!

 

Thank you for your interest and I hope we'll meet soon!

Love, Fleur

story:
Are you tired of awful tasting and breaking plastic or wooden forks contaminated with different kinds of bacteria?


We have the solution for you!





Design

Our objective was simple: design a modern even futuristic french fry fork made of high quality durable stainless steel.
We wanted an environmentally friendly reusable solution which is not commonplace in the cutlery industry.
Inspired by the idea of „Less is More“, the UberFork went through a shape simplifying design cycle to become what it is today, a sightly clean product.
The futuristic look of the UberFork definitely differentiates it from similar products. Even if we don’t talk about a reinvention it is at least a creative reshaping.



Use Cases

The UberFork is not just perfect for french fries. In fact, the unique design provides a wide range of applications.
Just add a stylish note to your food by applying the UberFork to snack dishes like cheese, fruits, olives or any other nibbles.




Production - Made in Germany

The whole production runs in Germany to create a precision crafted UberFork under permanent quality assurance.
You will get a pristine high tech product "Made in Germany".

We have great partners with extensive experience in the automotive and aviation industry to guarantee flawless product results.
Leading edge laser cutting technology ensures consistent product quality and very precise and reproducible UberForks. The distinguished  edge surface created by the high energy laser is an integral part of the ultramodern design.
A high tech grinding process ensures the best metal surface characteristic achievable. The 1st 200 UberForks are hand sanded which makes them even more exclusive.


Material

We’re using V4A Stainless Steel to build a durable product.
The full metal food grade UberFork has no taste influence which makes it an easy choice in comparison to awful tasting wooden french fry forks.

Stainless Steel Specification:
EN:                  14.401
DIN:                X5CrNiMo17122
SAE/Aisi:      316
B.S.:                316S17
UNE:               F.3543
SS14:              2347



Dimensions

The dimensions are carefully selected to make it easy to have the Uberfork always with you. It is just a bit shorter than a credit card.
A thickness of 1.5 mm assures high stability to avoid any bending.

Length:          76 mm
Width:            10 mm
Thickness:    1.5 mm
Weight:          7,6 g


Timeline

Because we believe that the UberFork is the perfect Christmas gift, we do everything to start the mass production right after closing the crowd funding campaign.
If you are one of the 1st 200 contributors then you'll get not only the exclusive hand sanded UberFork, but we also directly ship it to you. 

13.10.2014 - 12.11.2014    Crowd Funding Campaign
24.11.2014                           Start pre-Christmas shipping of the 1st UberFork batch


Funding

We’ve spend many hours in designing and pre-production as well as working out the production process. Now the next steps are quite easy. We need your contributions to built enough UberForks to make the production of the 1st batch cost-effective.
The funding goal is set at just $1.800. Nevertheless, we decided to go for flexible funding, so that everybody who wants an UberFork gets it, independent from reaching the goal. This is possible because of the already available prototype batch which is up to the final quality standards and even more exclusive because of the hand grinding process applied.


Risks and Challenges

Because our partners are well known in the industry we are able to keep any risk very manageable.
High quality mass production is the day to day business of our associates.


Questions and Answers

  • What does the pricing include?
    The pricing includes world wide shipping as well as EU-VAT.
  • What will be the packaging for shipping?
    We are using air cushion envelopes and pressure lock bags to savely ship the UberFork.
  • What grinding process is applied?
    The first 200 UberForks are hand sanded and therefore very exclusive.
    We assure the best metal surface by applying optimal grinding processes.
  • What does Laser Cutting mean?
    All UberForks are cutted out of high quality stainless steel panels by a high energy laser producing a distinguished edge surface which is part of the futuristic design.

story:
For all these solar products in the market, they all just black or white. No matter how hard the designer try to make solar panels look like an artwork rather than a black board, they all failed for many different reasons. 

As a designer of solar panels, we are trying to solve this problem by developing more colorful and fashionable solar panels, so these colorful solar panel could be widely used on fashionable product. 

And we made some progress now. We are able to create fashionable solar panel and provided our customer related accessories to create their own fashionable solar charger. These colorful solar chargers can be easily folded for convenience, and fixed onto other portable things such as the backbags.  With these chargers,  you can charge your electronic devices wherever you go!

Flextech first designed the world colorful solar panels that will make your solar charging time more enjoyable, colorful and fashionable. We have green, lemon yellow and orange available, DIY with your own colors is also considerable.

The solar panel is foldable, light weight and easy to carry with wherever you want to go. Through the eyelets at corner, you can hang it on your bag, your bike or put on the top of your car, wherever you are, it is really easy to play. 


Made by high efficiency of Sunpower cells,the panel can fully charge your iPhone in 1.5 hours in a sunny day. With USB output, you can charge your cell phones, speakers, tablets, Gopros and many electronic devices you need on the go. 

Make your choice now!

Enjoy your happy charging time with the world's first colorful portable solar panel!

you can easily DIY a solar bag  with this solar charger, we also provide free buttons for the backers who want to make solar bag by himself.


FAQ

Q1: What kind of device this this solar panel can charge?

A2: All kinds of mobile phone, such as Apple, Samsung, and android phone.

      All kind of power banks that used to provide power for your mobile phone

      All kind of digital  camera with 5V input, MP4 Player and PSP etc.

      The output of this solar charger is 5V, so all kind of electric device with 

 5V input can be charged by this solar panel.


Q2: Would this solar charger be directly connected to the electric device without any extra regulating system?

A2: Yes, this solar panel has inbuilt 5V regulator in the junction box, so this panel can directly connected with any electric device with 5V input(such as mobile phone, power bank etc.) without damage these devices.


Q3: Can this solar panel work in cloudy days?

A3:  It depends on the weather condition. If the light is bright and you can 

feel  the sunshine go through the cloud, our solar panel will work in this  

condition. But is the light is dim, this panel won't work in dim condition.


Q4: Do you accept bulk orders for this solar panel?

A4: Yes, the solar panels can be ordered in bulk orders after this campaign. We 

are also looking for distributors all over the world. If you are interested in 

being our distributor, please contact flextech_sales@163.com. Thank you.


Q5: What colors are available now?

A5: Blue, yellow, green and orange color are available now. You can leave a    

message to us for the color that you want. Thank you.


Q6: Is it possible to print personalized logo on the panel ?

A6: If you order 10 pcs of solar panels, with extra $50, you can own the solar 

panels with your personalized logo.
