Enjoy your happy charging time with the world's first colorful portable solar panel!
you can easily DIY a solar bag  with this solar charger, we also provide free buttons for the backers who want to make solar bag by himself.FAQQ1: What kind of device this this solar panel can charge?A2: All kinds of mobile phone, such as Apple, Samsung, and android phone.      All kind of power banks that used to provide power for your mobile phone      All kind of digital  camera with 5V input, MP4 Player and PSP etc.      The output of this solar charger is 5V, so all kind of electric device with  5V input can be charged by this solar panel.Q2: Would this solar charger be directly connected to the electric device without any extra regulating system?A2: Yes, this solar panel has inbuilt 5V regulator in the junction box, so this panel can directly connected with any electric device with 5V input(such as mobile phone, power bank etc.) without damage these devices.Q3: Can this solar panel work in cloudy days?A3:  It depends on the weather condition. If the light is bright and you can feel  the sunshine go through the cloud, our solar panel will work in this  condition. But is the light is dim, this panel won't work in dim condition.Q4: Do you accept bulk orders for this solar panel?A4: Yes, the solar panels can be ordered in bulk orders after this campaign. We are also looking for distributors all over the world. If you are interested in being our distributor, please contact flextech_sales@163.com. Thank you.Q5: What colors are available now?A5: Blue, yellow, green and orange color are available now. You can leave a    message to us for the color that you want. Thank you.Q6: Is it possible to print personalized logo on the panel ?A6: If you order 10 pcs of solar panels, with extra $50, you can own the solar panels with your personalized logo.

story:
We are an exciting new caused based brand, producing quality lifestyle clothing.

Utilizing various waste material for our raw product, specializing in recycled PET bottles (rPET).

That means for every piece of clothing you buy, we have less plastic waste polluting our oceans.


What We Need & What You Get

  • We are seeking $50,000 to complete minimum orders on all of the featured items.
  • Every piece of clothing is produced from products that would otherwise be sent to the landfill or end up in OUR oceans.
  • All funds go into bringing this brand live to the peoples, showing strength in this initiative to national distributors and chain stores alike
  • All international certifications provided to prove we are not doing more harm than good!



The Impact

This is the FIRST brand set on being hands on with directing waste supply to the clothes you BUY!

  • By supporting this launch, you involve yourself in a possible solution to the largest threat our Oceans face!
  • Leisure Activist Group clothing already has TWO pilot projects in-place to close loop the supply of plastic to our clothing. One in the Indian Ocean and One in the Pacific Ocean.
  • We as well operate a community outreach program called The Ocean Ambassadors, specifically designed to "Create Jobs, Close Landfills and Anchor Renewable Energy Systems."


The Ocean Ambassadors


Campaign and When You Get Your Perks

  • Feb 20th Campaign closes.
  • March 1st all waste fabrics are ordered for your new favorite piece of clothing
  • March 15 Our Bluesign System Approved manufacturer goes to work on pumping these beauties out.
  • April 30 First finished products start arriving at our office
  • May 1 - 30 we forward on your Perks

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the good word and tell your friends, be an Ocean Ambassador and see this brand come to life!
  • Start by liking us on Facebook, Share our posts as much as possible and TELL everyone you know about what is happening, and be sure to utilize all Indiegogo share tools!

Here's a sampler pack of what we offer, for a full photo selection visit the gallery.

Boardshorts

Women's Hoody and Yoga Pants

Men's Dolphicorn T

Athletic wet/dry T

Women's Jacket and 3/4 yoga pant

Men's Jacket and Pants

Womesn's yoga top

story:
Short Summary

I am an Amtgardian. Specifically I'm soon to be the Sheriff of the Shire of Grey Lantern in The Empire of the Iron Mountains. I've been in the game almost a year now and the lack of armor and aesthetically pleasing weapons on the field is a bit of a bother to me, so I'm going to change that. and I need your help to do it.

What We Need & What You Get

I've got a wonderful mentor for leatherworking in may Father-in-Law. He's shown me quite a bit but he doesn't live locally so if I want to make my dream a reality I need to be able to get my own proper set of tools. This Is where you come in.


I'm offering some small rewards to help me raise money to get my shop set up. The rest of the funds I receive will go into making rewards for my generous donors. 

The Impact

Long term my goal is to ensure anyone who wants armor in my park at first then eventually wherever I travel to has access to some modicum of it. This will require some combination of effort and funds on their part. I will be willing to let people purchase my gear for materials cost if they are willing to work with me to make their gear, for example. or they could just purchase it outright paying me for not only materials but my time as well.

Risks & Challenges

Thankfully there is very little risk involved with this plan. I get the funds I get tools and you guys who donate get some nifty things out of the bargain. I also get to start making nifty things for people. It's that simple.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate yourself you can still help. Get the word out. Tell anyone you know who might be interested in helping me get started that I'm here. That's all there is to it.

story:
MY NEW MESSAGE TO THE WORLD on December 15, 2015! 

As of today, I am no longer seeking Backers to Help me with Funds to hire an attorney to write & file my 2 other very Important FULL Patent Applications for my 'NEW INVENTION' at this time for my '360 DEGREE HANDS-FREE DOG LEASH ATTACHMENT UNIT'!  Since, I could not show my Full Invention right now, I have failed to raise any Funds besides my own to do so. I did receive about 900 Visitors to my Indiegogo Fundraiser's Campaign Page during the first week and even days after that from people in many countries around The World!!! I also had some good people who referred other's to my Campaign Page too. ! I do Thank everyone of YOU for your time.  Right now, I am trying to learn as much as I can about the Full Patenting Process. I have also learned that I can get some assistance on How to fill/complete & file my 2 patent applications through programs at the Unites States Patent and Trademark Office, the internet and other ways too. I will still need about $3,500 to $4,000 to pay all fees to file these applications. I will let 'GOD & JESUS CHRIST'  make a way for me to pay for my patents. Then, I will be able to show this 'Great Invention to THE WORLD'!
Once I have filed both of my patents before May of the year 2016, My '360 DEGREE HANDS-FREE DOG LEASH ATTACHMENT UNIT'  Will-be-Back!  Said it like "The Terminator"  'The Great Arnold Schwarzenegger'! 
Thanks again to all visitors to my Indeigogo Crowdfunding Campaign Page from around The World for your time! And, I am also saying 'Thank You' to everyone who referred other's to my campaign, in your own way. 
ANDREW JASMINE SR.     Hands-Free Dog Leash!      I'll Be back!!!


It's HERE!!!

A '360 DEGREE HANDS-FREE DOG LEASH ATTACHMENT UNIT' has finally been perfected!  

HOW WOULD YOU LIKE TO HAVE A CHANCE TO GIVE A NEW INVENTION IT'S NAME?  If so, read my $25 Perk NOW!!!


The Impact and Benefits of this '360 DEGREE HANDS-FREE DOG LEASH ATTACHMENT UNIT'?

  • It can 'SPIN-AROUND & AROUND' in any direction (left or right)...
  • It relieves the use of your hands...  
  • It takes pressure off your fingers, palms, forearms, elbows, upper arms muscles & shoulders that cause upper & lower back area strains...  
  • If feels comfortable around your stomach, waist & lower back area...  
  • It's easy to attach, lock, unlock and remove from an owners lower body...  
  • It gives a dog the freedom of movement to run around it's owner without being yanked back to a previous position...  
  • It takes the stress away from a dog's owner when it's time to take a walk or go jogging... 
  • It let's your full body weight be used to hold your dog back...  
  • It may have the option to come in different colors?...  
  • It's padded on the rear for comfort... 
  • It has a smooth working operation...  
  • It's easy to adjust for a firm fit... 
  • It will not grab your clothes. ex; shirt/dress/jacket/etc... 
  • It will still let you have access to your leash to bring your dog into close proximity to your lower body/legs area...          
  • It's leash can easily be connected or disconnected...  
  • It's easy to clean... 
  • It's sweat and water proof... 
  • It's also a good leash safety attachment!  
  • It will be Fun to use... 
And, this Invention will take us into the near Future of products for pets!...  


_____________________________________

...NOTE...  To my Future Backers! Please read both paragraphs Below! 

Due to the advice given to me during October 2015, from 3 phone calls to the United States Patent and Trademark Office, I was instructed & advised that I should not disclose full details, which includes videos or pictures of my Invention on The Worldwide Web at this time!  But, it will eventually be done!  It's because, I only have a Provisional Patent Application currently on file, (AS A FIRST TO FILE DATE) and, I have plans to file a Complete 'USA' Non-Provisional Patent Application & a PCT International Patent Application for Foreign Countries of my choosing!!!  

AND, ON NOVEMBER 13, 2015, THIS TIME I CALLED THE UNITED STATES PATENT AND TRADEMARK OFFICE LEGAL DEPARTMENT FOR MORE ADVICE!  AGAIN, I WAS TOLD THAT BECAUSE I ENTERED LOTS OF INFO INTO MY PROVISIONAL PATENT APPLICATION FILED ON MAY 5, 2015,  AND, IF I DO NOT SUCCEED IN RAISING FUNDS TO HIRE A PATENT ATTORNEY TO FILE A NON-PROVISIONAL PATENT APPLICATION & A PCT INTERNATIONAL PATENT APPLICATION BY MAY OF 2016, MY FULL INVENTION WILL BE OUT THERE WITHOUT NO PATENT PROTECTION FOR ANYONE TO PRODUCE AND TO SELL!    To everyone out there, you must understand how this would be devastating to me... So, Please bear with me until these 2 patents have been filed by an attorney!   MY FUTURE BACKERS, You have my word that this Invention under those towels in my video/s will be shown to all Backers first after patents are filed!  You will be informed about all of my attorney's patenting progress as it would take place!!!  Thank You!    

_____________________________________


To all of my Future Backers! I am not Seeking Much, but I am Hopeful of Acquire Volume! Meaning? Thousands of Perks Claimed!  

>>>>>PATENT PENDING<<<<< GOING WORLDWIDE! 

>>> PATENT PENDING <<<   GOING WORLDWIDE! 

((( This New Invention will bring JOY, FUN, LESS STRESS & HAPPINESS TO A DOG AND THEIR OWNERS ALIKE. )))        



Hello To all of my Potential Backers! 

 My name is Andrew Jasmine Sr.   

About this Invention!  I have created the Ultimate '360 DEGREE HANDS-FREE DOG LEASH ATTACHMENT UNIT'!  It is adjustable and worn over the lower hip area and it wraps around the body. I have seen dog owners 'time and time again', while walking or jogging with their dog, have to keep switching their leash from one hand to the other in front and behind their backs. Then as their dog takes off to any direction, their owner's arm is suddenly jerked unexpectedly to that direction. (((So one day, I envisioned these pet owners having a device that would be worn around their waist to Free their hands, as their dog ventures to any direction that he or she chooses?)))  Also, a device that would incorporate the user's weight (as a force) to hold back their dog and to prevent stress to the user's upper body.  

NOTE! I also have 4 other designs for this product. This Invention is "Patent Pending" right now, with plans to file a 'Non-Provisional Patent Application and a PCT International Patent Application' which will allow me 30 months to file a 'National Patent Application' in many other foreign countries Worldwide!  

 

 

Who am I? I am an Inventor. I have ideas to invent many things in the Future! 


 >>> PATENT PENDING <<<   GOING WORLDWIDE!  

 >>> PATENT PENDING <<<   GOING WORLDWIDE!  

(Jingle)   Spin-Around, Dog Leash goes Round and Around - Thump Thump!  Repeat...

ATTENTION!   ONCE BOTH PATENTS HAVE BEEN FILED, EVERY BACKER WHO SELECTS MY $25 PERK WILL HAVE A CHANCE TO GIVE THIS AMAZING NEW INVENTION IT'S LIFETIME NAME!!! If your name is chosen, you could win a Prize? More Details to come!  


From a Prototype to it's Existence around This WORLD!!!


... MENU OF EVERYTHING BELOW ...

  1. My reasons for creating this Indiegogo Crowdfunding Page? 
  2. My Plans, Goals & Phases for this New Invention? 
  3. Other ways you can Help? 
  4. My Detour, Inventing Process & my Philosophy?  
  5. SUMMARY? 
  6. PERKS & Name Submission Policy?           
  7. Risk and Challenges? 


1. Here are my reasons for creating this Indiegogo Crowdfunding profile?  

I decided to come to this Worldwide Indiegogo Crowdfunding Site to seek your generous Help to complete my patent applications process! I need to hire a good patent attorney to file a Non-Provisional Patent Application for the USA and a PCT International Patent Application with the US Patent and Trademark Office by May 2016! A PCT Patent Application will allow me about 30 months to file a National Patent Application in many other countries worldwide. I am going to choose 10 major countries that have the most dog owners per household. 

I need assistance to hire an attorney to file these important applications! With 'God & Jesus Christ' by my side and enough Funds raised from my 'Future Backers' on this Indiegogo crowdfunding site, I will be able to succeed and be successful!  


2. My Plans, Goals & Phases for this New Invention? 

... PHASE #1 ...  This Phase must be done First!

My Main Goal is to raise funds using this Indiegogo Crowdfunding Site to hire a good patent attorney!  With the help from all of you (my Backers) the funds will be raised 'successfully into existence'... Then, we'll be going to PHASE #2!  

To fulfill my 2 patenting process? I need to raise $17,000! I have learned that the cost to file for a USA Non-Provisional Patent Application can cost from $7,000 to $10,000. Due to the makeup of my invention, I need $9,000 to cover that? 

AND, a PCT International Patent Application can cost from $5,000 to $9,000! I need about $8,000. This application will allow me about 30 months to choose what foreign countries that I wish to file a National Patent Application In!     

SOME OF THE TOP 10 FOREIGN COUNTRIES ARE:   Brazil, China, Russia, Japan, Philippines, India, Argentina, France, Romania & Norway! This list may change!!!  

NOTE!  ((( I will be seeking advice from my patent attorney on the right time to proceed with a FULL Disclosure of this Invention ))) 


... PHASE #2...   

NOW, this phase will be for funding that will take my prototype from it's Infancy Stage to a manufacturer to produce a Finished Product! For this phase, I will need to raise more funds?  BUT, if enough funds are raised beyond my attorney fees, I will go straight to a manufacturer that I have decided on contracting/hiring!  

 I have researched and learned that at least a minimum of $20,000 should be enough to take a prototype for a new invention, to a manufacturer, to have a finished product produced! It all depends on the makeup and complexity of the invention at hand, and, what type of molds will need to be made, if any?  
AFTER, the completion of PHASE #1 & 2, I will have a better idea of what it will Look Like and Cost?  And then, I will be Free to disclose the first manufacturing process of this product to all of my early Backers FIRST! This will be a privilege that you will be entitled to as my Backers who assist me in the completion of my full patenting process and the first manufacturing of this product!!! 

During 2016, I will be able to show and provide personal emailed pictures and videos of it's manufacturing process to all of my Backers...  Backers, you will be a part of this 'New Invention' as it comes to life and into existence on Planet Earth! I will keep all of my Backers up to date on my hiring of a patent attorney, their name and what is being done on a weekly or bi-weekly basis. Also, you will know when these (2) patents will be filed and, the dates that they are/were filed. Also, you will know what manufacturer I will be using and all forward progress of this New Invention...  Only you will be the one to know this information when it is being done and after it has been done... YOUR Privilege as my early Backers!  


... PHASE #3 ...   

This PHASE will be added later during 2016... THANK YOU!


>>>>>PATENT PENDING<<<<< GOING WORLDWIDE! 

      

3. Other ways you can Help?       

PLEASE "Spread the Word" about this Fantastic Indiegogo New Invention Campaign!  You can use the Indiegogo share tools if you like! You can also do this by telling everyone who you know and even don't know!            

Example:  Start by telling your Family, Friends, Neighbors, Church Members, Teachers>Your Students, Sports Team Members, People In The Park, Band Members, Local News Media, Local Newspaper Columnist, People You See With A Dog and so forth & so forth... 

To all of my Future Backers! I am not seeking much, but I am hopeful in acquiring volume!  

 

Copy & Paste and send this Link to people that you Know! 

 https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/360-degree-hands-free-dog-leash-attachment-unit    

NOTE!  You can donate more if you like too, and/or, you can use your ability & skills to Broadcast what I am doing by 'Word of Mouth'! You can tell everyone that you know to support this infancy invention project. Just send them to my Indiegogo profile page to read my info and, try to inspire them to choose one of my little Perks if you can?  Thanks!!!  



4. My Detour, Inventing Process & my Philosophy!

Before I started to create drawings of my visions of prototypes for this invention, I was in the process of working on the full details needed to file a 'Provisional Patent Application' for a prior invention that I had been working on for over 7 years. But, when I had told my oldest daughter about my new invention idea, she told me to stop on the 7 years invention and start the new invention idea Right Now. So, I took her advice and that is just what I did. 

First, I drew design after design to find out what may work, and, what would not work 'while looking for' the 'perfect design & operational/mechanical function'... Then, I use my own creative mind that 'God & Jesus Christ' instilled in me to en-vision a futuristic device that people all over the World could & would use. My design sketches can easily climb up to about several hundred typing paper sheets. Once, I feel that I have enough drawings to start with, then I start to focus on what materials that I can use that is already out there. The main stores that I used were: Lowes Hardware, Walmart, Academy Sporting Goods and Home Depot.   

My Philosophy on Creating an Invention Is?  It takes Quality Time, Futuristic Thoughts, a Progressive Effort and, a Never-Giving-Up-Mentality.  


5. SUMMARY? 

My name is Andrew Jasmine Sr.  I am a father of 4 wonderful adult children and, a Paw-Paw to 4 Grandboys! I am a inventor. For now, (my Focus is on) I have Invented a '360 DEGREE HANDS-FREE DOG LEASH ATTACHMENT UNIT' for the Future of walking, jogging and being out-&-about with your Dog!

ALSO, I decided to come to this crowdfunding site, because I cannot afford the expense to hire an attorney to file a full 'Non-Provisional & a PCT International Patent Application' for my Invention!  So, I am seeking funding from Backers to do just that. 'IF' enough Funds are Raised, I will also be able to take my homemade prototype to a manufacturer to have it manufactured into a Finished Product! Once this is done, I will have a better idea of what it will look like and have full details, pictures and videos of this invention to present to all of my Backers First! Which includes all Backers of [ALL 4 PERKS]... Then, I will present my full disclosure of this finished product to the World thereafter?  

((( This New Invention will bring JOY, FUN, LESS STRESS & HAPPINESS TO A PUP/DOG AND THEIR OWNERS ALIKE. )))      

To all of my Backers: You will be helping & assisting me to take my first ever Invention out to The World. You will help me to give pet/dog owners and their pup/dog lots more Freedom & Love for each other, when they are out taking a walk or jogging... All ladies would appreciate it too!


6. PERKS & Name Submission Policy?   

ATTENTION! ONCE ALL IS DONE, EVERY BACKER WHO SELECTS MY $25 PERK WILL HAVE A CHANCE TO GIVE THIS AMAZING NEW INVENTION IT'S LIFETIME NAME? If your name is chosen, you could win a Prize? More Details to come!  

$1 Backers?  You will get a "Big THANK YOU"!  Thank you very much for giving a Helping Hand and, becoming a contributor in supporting this New 'Infant' Invention!

$5 Backers?  You will get A "Very BIG THANK YOU" for giving a Helping Hand! and, becoming a contributor in showing support for this New Invention! Plus, you will be helping  me to get this "INFANT INVENTION a LOT OF ATTENTION"!   Sound's like a song to me! Hey "INFANT INVENTION a LOT OF ATTENTION" Hey!   Sing It when you Feel It! You have earned the right to do It!  By me The INVENTOR!

$15 Backers?  You get Both Perks above and a Cool BONUS! You will have Your Name or Nickname & your residing City & State (for the US) added in alphabetical order, to my Facebook Page Timeline (or in a Photo?) as my "GENEROUS Patent Attorney & Manufacturing BACKERS"! If the manufacturing cost is also accomplished? 

NOTE! For Foreign Country BACKERS?  I will need your Name or Nickname & your residing Town & Country's Name to be added (in alphabetical order with The US) to my Facebook Page Timeline as my "GENEROUS Patent Attorney BACKERS" too!  I may build a website?

$25 Backers?  You get what's in  the 3 Perks above & a Lifetime BONUS?  You will have an opportunity to Create & Submit a Name for my Invention to be chosen down to the "Top 3"!  All Names must be in the English Language!

If your Name is chosen, you will have a 'Lifetime Credit' in all written info as the person who created it's name! The "Top 3" will receive a Nice FREE Gift for their entry? I'll add more details about that Later! 


NAME SUBMISSION POLICY?  

NOTE!  The submission of names by all Backers at the $25 PERK level for this Invention will start after both patents have been filed & I have given the public a FULL Disclosure of this invention... ALSO, your submission must be in the English Language!  And, to save yourself an instant rejection you must do your very best to research your-created-name to be sure that it is not already taken and/or Trademarked! This will also have to be done by my attorney. You can simply GOOGLE your name of choice to see if it comes up in a listing! You can also do a full search on the United States Patent & Trademark Office website.  
 NOTE!  A word of advice! Take Pride in the name that you create before submitting that name as one to be chosen. This is something that will last for your Lifetime and the Lifetime of this new product!

7. Risks & Challenges? 

As for any Risk! I hope to raise enough funds to file both patents! Just raising enough funds to cover the territories of the U.S.A. will complete only 1/2 of my Goals! I want to protect my 'UNITED STATES OF AMERICA' American Citizen Invention from being taken and manufactured by other's in other Major Countries around This World. This Invention was born on US Soil and, it needs PROTECTION! I will pursue a National Patent in the 10 most dog owners per household countries out THERE!   
AGAIN, SOME OF THESE TOP 10 FOREIGN COUNTRIES ARE:   Brazil, China, Russia, Japan, Philippines, India, Argentina, France, Romania & Norway! This list may change!!!  
...There are NO Challenges at this early stage for this Invention at this moment?... 

The magnitude of what Backers at the $25 Perk level will achieve is astounding and 4Life!


Andrew Jasmine Sr.  

'360 DEGREE HANDS FREE DOG LEASH ATTACHMENT UNIT'! 

Follow me on Facebook:   Andrew Jasmine Sr.  &   Andrew.Jasmine.Sr.Songs 

 My twitter account:   @andrewjasminesr. 

Thank You & Peace OUT!
story_txt:
MY NEW MESSAGE TO THE WORLD on December 15, 2015! 

As of today, I am no longer seeking Backers to Help me with Funds to hire an attorney to write & file my 2 other very Important FULL Patent Applications for my 'NEW INVENTION' at this time for my '360 DEGREE HANDS-FREE DOG LEASH ATTACHMENT UNIT'!  Since, I could not show my Full Invention right now, I have failed to raise any Funds besides my own to do so. I did receive about 900 Visitors to my Indiegogo Fundraiser's Campaign Page during the first week and even days after that from people in many countries around The World!!! I also had some good people who referred other's to my Campaign Page too. ! I do Thank everyone of YOU for your time.  Right now, I am trying to learn as much as I can about the Full Patenting Process. I have also learned that I can get some assistance on How to fill/complete & file my 2 patent applications through programs at the Unites States Patent and Trademark Office, the internet and other ways too. I will still need about $3,500 to $4,000 to pay all fees to file these applications. I will let 'GOD & JESUS CHRIST'  make a way for me to pay for my patents. Then, I will be able to show this 'Great Invention to THE WORLD'!Once I have filed both of my patents before May of the year 2016, My '360 DEGREE HANDS-FREE DOG LEASH ATTACHMENT UNIT'  Will-be-Back!  Said it like "The Terminator"  'The Great Arnold Schwarzenegger'! Thanks again to all visitors to my Indeigogo Crowdfunding Campaign Page from around The World for your time! And, I am also saying 'Thank You' to everyone who referred other's to my campaign, in your own way. ANDREW JASMINE SR.     Hands-Free Dog Leash!      I'll Be back!!!






It's HERE!!!A '360 DEGREE HANDS-FREE DOG LEASH ATTACHMENT UNIT' has finally been perfected!  






HOW WOULD YOU LIKE TO HAVE A CHANCE TO GIVE A NEW INVENTION IT'S NAME?  If so, read my $25 Perk NOW!!!



The Impact and Benefits of this '360 DEGREE HANDS-FREE DOG LEASH ATTACHMENT UNIT'?


It can 'SPIN-AROUND & AROUND' in any direction (left or right)...
It relieves the use of your hands...  
It takes pressure off your fingers, palms, forearms, elbows, upper arms muscles & shoulders that cause upper & lower back area strains...  
If feels comfortable around your stomach, waist & lower back area...  
It's easy to attach, lock, unlock and remove from an owners lower body...  
It gives a dog the freedom of movement to run around it's owner without being yanked back to a previous position...  
It takes the stress away from a dog's owner when it's time to take a walk or go jogging... 
It let's your full body weight be used to hold your dog back...  
It may have the option to come in different colors?...  
It's padded on the rear for comfort... 
It has a smooth working operation...  
It's easy to adjust for a firm fit... 
It will not grab your clothes. ex; shirt/dress/jacket/etc... 
It will still let you have access to your leash to bring your dog into close proximity to your lower body/legs area...          
It's leash can easily be connected or disconnected...  
It's easy to clean... 
It's sweat and water proof... 
It's also a good leash safety attachment!  
It will be Fun to use... And, this Invention will take us into the near Future of products for pets!...  


_____________________________________



...NOTE...  To my Future Backers! Please read both paragraphs Below! Due to the advice given to me during October 2015, from 3 phone calls to the United States Patent and Trademark Office, I was instructed & advised that I should not disclose full details, which includes videos or pictures of my Invention on The Worldwide Web at this time!  But, it will eventually be done!  It's because, I only have a Provisional Patent Application currently on file, (AS A FIRST TO FILE DATE) and, I have plans to file a Complete 'USA' Non-Provisional Patent Application & a PCT International Patent Application for Foreign Countries of my choosing!!!  

AND, ON NOVEMBER 13, 2015, THIS TIME I CALLED THE UNITED STATES PATENT AND TRADEMARK OFFICE LEGAL DEPARTMENT FOR MORE ADVICE!  AGAIN, I WAS TOLD THAT BECAUSE I ENTERED LOTS OF INFO INTO MY PROVISIONAL PATENT APPLICATION FILED ON MAY 5, 2015,  AND, IF I DO NOT SUCCEED IN RAISING FUNDS TO HIRE A PATENT ATTORNEY TO FILE A NON-PROVISIONAL PATENT APPLICATION & A PCT INTERNATIONAL PATENT APPLICATION BY MAY OF 2016, MY FULL INVENTION WILL BE OUT THERE WITHOUT NO PATENT PROTECTION FOR ANYONE TO PRODUCE AND TO SELL!    To everyone out there, you must understand how this would be devastating to me... So, Please bear with me until these 2 patents have been filed by an attorney!   MY FUTURE BACKERS, You have my word that this Invention under those towels in my video/s will be shown to all Backers first after patents are filed!  You will be informed about all of my attorney's patenting progress as it would take place!!!  Thank You!    
_____________________________________

To all of my Future Backers! I am not Seeking Much, but I am Hopeful of       Acquire Volume! Meaning? Thousands of Perks Claimed!  >>>>>PATENT PENDING<<<<< GOING WORLDWIDE! 




>>> PATENT PENDING <<<   GOING WORLDWIDE! 

((( This New Invention will bring JOY, FUN, LESS STRESS & HAPPINESS TO A DOG AND THEIR OWNERS ALIKE. )))        




Hello To all of my Potential Backers! 

 My name is Andrew Jasmine Sr.   
About this Invention!  I have created the Ultimate '360 DEGREE HANDS-FREE DOG LEASH ATTACHMENT UNIT'!  It is adjustable and worn over the lower hip area and it wraps around the body. I have seen dog owners 'time and time again', while walking or jogging with their dog, have to keep switching their leash from one hand to the other in front and behind their backs. Then as their dog takes off to any direction, their owner's arm is suddenly jerked unexpectedly to that direction. (((So one day, I envisioned these pet owners having a device that would be worn around their waist to Free their hands, as their dog ventures to any direction that he or she chooses?)))  Also, a device that would incorporate the user's weight (as a force) to hold back their dog and to prevent stress to the user's upper body.  
NOTE! I also have 4 other designs for this product. This Invention is "Patent Pending" right now, with plans to file a 'Non-Provisional Patent Application and a PCT International Patent Application' which will allow me 30 months to file a 'National Patent Application' in many other foreign countries Worldwide!   

 


Who am I? I am an Inventor. I have ideas to invent many things in the Future! 





 >>> PATENT PENDING <<<   GOING WORLDWIDE!  




 >>> PATENT PENDING <<<   GOING WORLDWIDE!  



(Jingle)   Spin-Around, Dog Leash goes Round and Around - Thump Thump!  Repeat...

ATTENTION!   ONCE BOTH PATENTS HAVE BEEN FILED, EVERY BACKER WHO SELECTS MY $25 PERK WILL  HAVE A CHANCE TO GIVE THIS AMAZING NEW INVENTION IT'S LIFETIME NAME!!! If your name is chosen, you could win a Prize? More Details to come!  
From a Prototype to it's Existence around This WORLD!!!

... MENU OF EVERYTHING BELOW ...


My reasons for creating this Indiegogo Crowdfunding Page? 
My Plans, Goals & Phases for this New Invention? 
Other ways you can Help? 
My Detour, Inventing Process & my Philosophy?  
SUMMARY? 

PERKS & Name Submission Policy?           


Risk and Challenges? 



1. Here are my reasons for creating this Indiegogo Crowdfunding profile?  
I decided to come to this Worldwide Indiegogo Crowdfunding Site to seek your generous Help to complete my patent applications process! I need to hire a good patent attorney to file a Non-Provisional Patent Application for the USA and a PCT International Patent Application with the US Patent and Trademark Office by May 2016! A PCT Patent Application will allow me about 30 months to file a National Patent Application in many other countries worldwide. I am going to choose 10 major countries that have the most dog owners per household. 
I need assistance to hire an attorney to file these important applications! With 'God & Jesus Christ' by my side and enough Funds raised from my 'Future Backers' on this Indiegogo crowdfunding site, I will be able to succeed and be successful!  



2. My Plans, Goals & Phases for this New Invention? 

... PHASE #1 ...  This Phase must be done First!
My Main Goal is to raise funds using this Indiegogo Crowdfunding Site to hire a good patent attorney!  With the help from all of you (my Backers) the funds will be raised 'successfully into existence'... Then, we'll be going to PHASE #2!  To fulfill my 2 patenting process? I need to raise $17,000! I have learned that the cost to file for a USA Non-Provisional Patent Application can cost from $7,000 to $10,000. Due to the makeup of my invention, I need $9,000 to cover that? 
AND, a PCT International Patent Application can cost from $5,000 to $9,000! I need about $8,000. This application will allow me about 30 months to choose what foreign countries that I wish to file a National Patent Application In!     
SOME OF THE TOP 10 FOREIGN COUNTRIES ARE:   Brazil, China, Russia, Japan, Philippines, India, Argentina, France, Romania & Norway! This list may change!!!  


NOTE!  ((( I will be seeking advice from my patent attorney on the right time to proceed with a FULL Disclosure of this Invention ))) 

... PHASE #2...   
NOW, this phase will be for funding that will take my prototype from it's Infancy Stage to a manufacturer to produce a Finished Product! For this phase, I will need to raise more funds?  BUT, if enough funds are raised beyond my attorney fees, I will go straight to a manufacturer that I have decided on contracting/hiring!   I have researched and learned that at least a minimum of $20,000 should be enough to take a prototype for a new invention, to a manufacturer, to have a finished product produced! It all depends on the makeup and complexity of the invention at hand, and, what type of molds will need to be made, if any?  AFTER, the completion of PHASE #1 & 2, I will have a better idea of what it will Look Like and Cost?  And then, I will be Free to disclose the first manufacturing process of this product to all of my early Backers FIRST! This will be a privilege that you will be entitled to as my Backers who assist me in the completion of my full patenting process and the first manufacturing of this product!!! 

During 2016, I will be able to show and provide personal emailed pictures and videos of it's manufacturing process to all of my Backers...  Backers, you will be a part of this 'New Invention' as it comes to life and into existence on Planet Earth! I will keep all of my Backers up to date on my hiring of a patent attorney, their name and what is being done on a weekly or bi-weekly basis. Also, you will know when these (2) patents will be filed and, the dates that they are/were filed. Also, you will know what manufacturer I will be using and all forward progress of this New Invention...  Only you will be the one to know this information when it is being done and after it has been done... YOUR Privilege as my early Backers!  

... PHASE #3 ...   
This PHASE will be added later during 2016... THANK YOU!

>>>>>PATENT PENDING<<<<< GOING WORLDWIDE!       
3. Other ways you can Help?       
PLEASE "Spread the Word" about this Fantastic Indiegogo New Invention Campaign!  You can use the Indiegogo share tools if you like! You can also do this by telling everyone who you know and even don't know!            
Example:  Start by telling your Family, Friends, Neighbors, Church Members, Teachers>Your Students, Sports Team Members, People In The Park, Band Members, Local News Media, Local Newspaper Columnist, People You See With A Dog and so forth & so forth... 
To all of my Future Backers! I am not seeking much, but I am hopeful in acquiring volume!  
 
Copy & Paste and send this Link to people that you Know! 
 https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/360-degree-hands-free-dog-leash-attachment-unit    

NOTE!  You can donate more if you like too, and/or, you can use your ability & skills to Broadcast what I am doing by 'Word of Mouth'! You can tell everyone that you know to support this infancy invention project. Just send them to my Indiegogo profile page to read my info and, try to inspire them to choose one of my little Perks if you can?  Thanks!!!  




4. My Detour, Inventing Process & my Philosophy!
Before I started to create drawings of my visions of prototypes for this invention, I was in the process of working on the full details needed to file a 'Provisional Patent Application' for a prior invention that I had been working on for over 7 years. But, when I had told my oldest daughter about my new invention idea, she told me to stop on the 7 years invention and start the new invention idea Right Now. So, I took her advice and that is just what I did. 
First, I drew design after design to find out what may work, and, what would not work 'while looking for' the 'perfect design & operational/mechanical function'... Then, I use my own creative mind that 'God & Jesus Christ' instilled in me to en-vision a futuristic device that people all over the World could & would use. My design sketches can easily climb up to about several hundred typing paper sheets. Once, I feel that I have enough drawings to start with, then I start to focus on what materials that I can use that is already out there. The main stores that I used were: Lowes Hardware, Walmart, Academy Sporting Goods and Home Depot.   
My Philosophy on Creating an Invention Is?  It takes Quality Time, Futuristic Thoughts, a Progressive Effort and, a Never-Giving-Up-Mentality.  

5. SUMMARY? 

My name is Andrew Jasmine Sr.  I am a father of 4 wonderful adult children and, a Paw-Paw to 4 Grandboys! I am a inventor. For now, (my Focus is on) I have Invented a '360 DEGREE HANDS-FREE DOG LEASH ATTACHMENT UNIT' for the Future of walking, jogging and being out-&-about with your Dog!
ALSO, I decided to come to this crowdfunding site, because I cannot afford the expense to hire an attorney to file a full 'Non-Provisional & a PCT International Patent Application' for my Invention!  So, I am seeking funding from Backers to do just that. 'IF' enough Funds are Raised, I will also be able to take my homemade prototype to a manufacturer to have it manufactured into a Finished Product! Once this is done, I will have a better idea of what it will look like and have full details, pictures and videos of this invention to present to all of my Backers First! Which includes all Backers of [ALL 4 PERKS]... Then, I will present my full disclosure of this finished product to the World thereafter?  
((( This New Invention will bring JOY, FUN, LESS STRESS & HAPPINESS TO A PUP/DOG AND THEIR OWNERS ALIKE. )))      
To all of my Backers: You will be helping & assisting me to take my first ever Invention out to The World. You will help me to give pet/dog owners and their pup/dog lots more Freedom & Love for each other, when they are out taking a walk or jogging... All ladies would appreciate it too!


6. PERKS & Name Submission Policy?   
ATTENTION! ONCE ALL IS DONE, EVERY BACKER WHO SELECTS MY $25 PERK WILL  HAVE A CHANCE TO GIVE THIS AMAZING NEW INVENTION IT'S LIFETIME NAME?    If your name is chosen, you could win a Prize? More Details to come!  

$1 Backers?  You will get a "Big THANK YOU"!  Thank you very much for giving a Helping Hand and, becoming a contributor in supporting this New 'Infant' Invention!
$5 Backers?  You will get A "Very BIG THANK YOU" for giving a Helping Hand! and, becoming a contributor in showing support for this New Invention! Plus, you will be helping  me to get this "INFANT INVENTION a LOT OF ATTENTION"!   Sound's like a song to me! Hey "INFANT INVENTION a LOT OF ATTENTION" Hey!   Sing It when you Feel It! You have earned the right to do It!  By me The INVENTOR!
$15 Backers?  You get Both Perks above and a Cool BONUS! You will have Your Name or Nickname & your residing City & State (for the US) added in alphabetical order, to my Facebook Page Timeline (or in a Photo?) as my "GENEROUS Patent Attorney & Manufacturing BACKERS"! If the manufacturing cost is also accomplished? 

NOTE! For Foreign Country BACKERS?  I will need your Name or Nickname & your residing Town & Country's Name to be added (in alphabetical order with The US) to my Facebook Page Timeline as my "GENEROUS Patent Attorney BACKERS" too!  I may build a website?

$25 Backers?  You get what's in  the 3 Perks above & a Lifetime BONUS?  You will have an opportunity to Create & Submit a Name for my Invention to be chosen down to the "Top 3"!  All Names must be in the English Language!
If your Name is chosen, you will have a 'Lifetime Credit' in all written info as the person who created it's name! The "Top 3" will receive a Nice FREE Gift for their entry? I'll add more details about that Later! 


NAME SUBMISSION POLICY?  NOTE!  The submission of names by all Backers at the $25 PERK level for this Invention will start after both patents have been filed & I have given the public a FULL Disclosure of this invention... ALSO, your submission must be in the English Language!  And, to save yourself an instant rejection you must do your very best to research your-created-name to be sure that it is not already taken and/or Trademarked! This will also have to be done by my attorney. You can simply GOOGLE your name of choice to see if it comes up in a listing! You can also do a full search on the United States Patent & Trademark Office website.  
 NOTE!  A word of advice! Take Pride in the name that you create before submitting that name as one to be chosen. This is something that will last for your Lifetime and the Lifetime of this new product!

7. Risks & Challenges? 
As for any Risk! I hope to raise enough funds to file both patents! Just raising enough funds to cover the territories of the U.S.A. will complete only 1/2 of my Goals! I want to protect my 'UNITED STATES OF AMERICA' American Citizen Invention from being taken and manufactured by other's in other Major Countries around This World. This Invention was born on US Soil and, it needs PROTECTION! I will pursue a National Patent in the 10 most dog owners per household countries out THERE!   
AGAIN, SOME OF THESE TOP 10 FOREIGN COUNTRIES ARE:   Brazil, China, Russia, Japan, Philippines, India, Argentina, France, Romania & Norway! This list may change!!!  

...There are NO Challenges at this early stage for this Invention at this moment?... 


The magnitude of what Backers at the $25 Perk level will achieve is astounding and 4Life!

Andrew Jasmine Sr.  
'360 DEGREE HANDS FREE DOG LEASH ATTACHMENT UNIT'! 


Follow me on Facebook:   Andrew Jasmine Sr.  &   Andrew.Jasmine.Sr.Songs 
 My twitter account:   @andrewjasminesr. 
Thank You & Peace OUT!

story:
Presenting The Alpha.  Join the journey to Omega!  After reading, the video above will visually guide the way.

How do I start this?  Let me see..... In the beginning there was..?  No! Once upon a time there was..?  Nooo!  I got it!!!!  It twas the night before..? No and absolutely not.  Scratch that......

How about I just start at the beginning?  That sounds much better! 

In my own words here's my story.....

In 2008 a retired Maryland State Trooper and now Director of Security at a major hospital took me off to the side and said "Vince you gotta do something" to help me protect all these sliding doors (there were many)! If the hospital has a major panic due to an outside public event (terrorism, fire, hazmat issue, natural disaster, airborne disease, etc.) and people rush the hospital, what can we do?  I [Vince] searched my trade magazines and wholesale catalogs for a product that may work, and reported back.  I'm sorry sir but there is nothing on the market that I can use to help you overcome this critical dilemma.  With great disappointment, he [The Director of Security] walked away.  Do understand, I [Vince] do not like to fail or disappoint a customer, especially when it comes to security and life safety.  Later that night, [personal initiative is always in full effect] I drove back to the hospital to examine his double sliding doors to come up with a solution.  After working into the night sketching and rendering out a new idea.  I made initial success on paper, at the moment!  But would my idea survive my brutally honest and merciless Patent Agent, and the professionals at the PTO who will do a worldwide historical search? I'm sorry, failure is not an option, so I played by all the rules and remained optimistic.  Four (4) long years later, after filing in 2009, the United States Patent and Trademark Office determined, this is indeed a new, novel, and beneficial solution. The birth of US Patent http://www.google.com/patents/US8585105 . Something never thought of in the history of the world. [Huge celebration!!!] Please continue to follow this from conception to near reality.  [Many thanks!]

As you are aware. After the events of 9-11, the world as we used to know it was forever changed. All security measures have increased beyond the stratospheres. Vigilance, advanced planning, and locking people in and out is the main safety direction around the world.  This statement includes a desire for faster and more efficient locking mechanisms. There is a constant, well hidden scenario the general public is not aware of. That secret is, not all doors can be locked immediately in the event of an emergency. Imagine visiting one of the following: A hospital, especially schools, shopping mall, local drug store, large hardware store, hotel, large department store, government building, or any large or small private sector building.  Basically, any building with one, or more particular, multiple entrances.  In the wake of recent random shootings and other attacks, public  word comes across of an incident near your location. In a panic, one of reasonable sense would want to lock out any potential violence before it moves inside a building, or maybe isolate it if it's already in a building. If a hospital or mall had 37 double sliding doors to be locked, what would security do?  Let's try this one more time!  From the conception of sliding double doors (invented 60 years ago in 1954) up to the current year 2014. What would, could, should, security personnel do?????  The answer is RUN!!! Run to use a key, to lock all 37 sliding double doors. Imagine the time and panic in concluding this process. Did you know historically and at present, the only way to lock a double sliding door is to use an old fashioned hook latch and key? Yes, it's true!  Still the slow poke method.

One can remotely kill power to a double door but it can still be forced open.  There is NOTHING else on the market that can lock these type doors remotely - UNTIL NOW. After hearing so many complaints about this from Directors of Security in various buildings, a new idea and patented product was born. US Patent 8.585,105 discloses the solution. The MoveNetic Magnetic Lock has the ability to lock double sliding doors at the push of one button. Meaning, instead of running to lock 37 sliding doors as previously mentioned, one can do so instantly!  What makes this product work so efficiently? Simply, all magnetic locks are designed to be mounted to a stable, non-movable surface. Because all double sliding doors move away from each other. It is physically impossible to use this type lock or anything similar on these doors. [Curtain call for the MoveNetic Magnetic Lock]  Existing magnetic locking technologies will work on a single sliding door because the door slides towards the frame holding the door.  Not double sliding doors.   The MoveNetic lock allows both the magnetic lock (which in the past had to be mounted on a stable frame) and the strike plate to both move. Thus allowing remote locking of both doors immediately. Here's a fair question. So both doors are locked at the press of a button? What if the lock loses power? Answer - it won't. The lock is connected to a power supply with battery backup. Thus, if the primary power is loss, the batteries will keep the door(s) locked for many hours to come depending on the batteries installed. So Vince, how big is the market for this product?  Close your eyes and try to count how many sliding doors there are in every city in the United States.  How about, how many double sliding doors are on the planet? Good luck with that thought!!!!  I'm truly sorry to blow your mind with the thought [let's both reach for the Excedrin together] but let's agree it's a huge market.  Let's give some fair estimates. There may be approximately 400+ million doors [low estimate] of this type just in this country alone, and zero devices [official] to protect them instantly except this one product. Let's say it out loud together.  THAT'S A WHOLE LOT OF DOORS!!!! Imagine the possibilities. 

.....Keeping People In Is My Next Important Topic

Two more thoughts to consider.  I have discussed keeping people out but how about me explaining more real time scenarios?  Scenario 1 revolves around child theft.  What if someone tried to steal a baby from the same hospital as mentioned earlier?  Typically, are new born's are kept well inside the hospital.  If a situation arises where a child may be missing, one can instantly lock down the entire facility until the child is recovered. Thus, stopping the exit and passage of everyone in the building. 

Scenario 2 might be a shopping store or similar and a child is suddenly missing. Or the potential for an abduction comes to the forefront.  The child does not respond to repeated pages on the store's intercom and the parents are going crazy searching!!!  Once again, instantly lock the store down to keep all parties in until the search is completed, and the child is found. This is a must have to match the type world we now live in. 

The goal is to finish the prototyping development phase and travel to different companies in a similar industry to offer licensing rights.  If this does not go as planned then seek out a manufacturing partnership.  To keep moving forward with the project and not hold my breath waiting on others. I would be interested in forming a company and going into full development and manufacturing, setting up distribution, exciting those at trade shows, selling to the government and any other positive means to get this into the marketplace.  Review and enjoy the video for a complete understanding of this dynamic new product and its current direction. Let's be safer together!  Your consideration is truly appreciated and honored.

The patented linear power strip is the key that makes this work: https://www.dropbox.com/s/nynro9hq40nt83p/E_shaped_Mechanism_Previz_vr01.mp4?dl=0


ABOUT ME

My background is the service, design, engineering, installation and inspection of fire, access control, security, and CCTV systems. Also, analog, digital, IP and Mega Pixel cameras.  Excellent work ethic. 29 years industry experience. Accomplishments shown below:

1981 Graduate West End High School

Alumni - Alabama A&M University Architectural  Engineering Major & Computer Science Minor 1985

The University of Alabama Birmingham 1986

National Deans List, Presidents List Alabama A&M University - Engineering

Society of Distinguished American High School Students Award - 1981

International Award Winning Inventor

Wells Fargo Employee of the 4th Quarter 1992

CEO Recognition Award Alert Centre Inc.

International Award Winning Patent Owner

National Inventors Club Award 1986 - Atlanta, Georgia

Owner of 3 United States Utility Patents

Owner 1 US Provisional Patent - Cell Phone Security Application 

Owner of 1 United States Service Mark

Experienced fire alarm project manager (contractor supervision) following local fire codes and NFPA regulations, etc. 

Own Official County Certification (Montgomery County Maryland & Fire Alarm License

Small Business Owner - Fire Alarm Systems, CFi Fire Pro

Certified on Bosch/Radionics 7024 Fire Panel, Bosch/Radionics G & GV Security Controls, EAS, Silent Knight Fire, Honeywell-Northern Computers Access Systems Pro 2200, Win Pak PE, SE, CS, Net AXS, Networking, System Integration. Notifier Fire Systems Factory Trained, NICET ID 116187

Simply, all magnetic locks are designed to be mounted to a stable, non-movable surface. Because all double sliding doors move away from each other. It is physically impossible to use this type lock or anything similar on these doors. [Curtain call for the MoveNetic Magnetic Lock]  Existing magnetic locking technologies will work on a single sliding door because the door slides towards the frame holding the door.  Not double sliding doors.   The MoveNetic lock allows both the magnetic lock (which in the past had to be mounted on a stable frame) and the strike plate to both move. Thus allowing remote locking of both doors immediately. Here's a fair question. So both doors are locked at the press of a button? What if the lock loses power? Answer - it won't. The lock is connected to a power supply with battery backup. Thus, if the primary power is loss, the batteries will keep the door(s) locked for many hours to come depending on the batteries installed. So Vince, how big is the market for this product?  Close your eyes and try to count how many sliding doors there are in every city in the United States.  How about, how many double sliding doors are on the planet? Good luck with that thought!!!!  I'm truly sorry to blow your mind with the thought [let's both reach for the Excedrin together] but let's agree it's a huge market.  Let's give some fair estimates. There may be approximately 400+ million doors [low estimate] of this type just in this country alone, and zero devices [official] to protect them instantly except this one product. Let's say it out loud together.  THAT'S A WHOLE LOT OF DOORS!!!! Imagine the possibilities. .....Keeping People In Is My Next Important TopicTwo more thoughts to consider.  I have discussed keeping people out but how about me explaining more real time scenarios?  Scenario 1 revolves around child theft.  What if someone tried to steal a baby from the same hospital as mentioned earlier?  Typically, are new born's are kept well inside the hospital.  If a situation arises where a child may be missing, one can instantly lock down the entire facility until the child is recovered. Thus, stopping the exit and passage of everyone in the building. Scenario 2 might be a shopping store or similar and a child is suddenly missing. Or the potential for an abduction comes to the forefront.  The child does not respond to repeated pages on the store's intercom and the parents are going crazy searching!!!  Once again, instantly lock the store down to keep all parties in until the search is completed, and the child is found. This is a must have to match the type world we now live in. The goal is to finish the prototyping development phase and travel to different companies in a similar industry to offer licensing rights.  If this does not go as planned then seek out a manufacturing partnership.  To keep moving forward with the project and not hold my breath waiting on others. I would be interested in forming a company and going into full development and manufacturing, setting up distribution, exciting those at trade shows, selling to the government and any other positive means to get this into the marketplace.  Review and enjoy the video for a complete understanding of this dynamic new product and its current direction. Let's be safer together!  Your consideration is truly appreciated and honored.The patented linear power strip is the key that makes this work: https://www.dropbox.com/s/nynro9hq40nt83p/E_shaped_Mechanism_Previz_vr01.mp4?dl=0

ABOUT ME
My background is the service, design, engineering, installation and inspection of fire, access control, security, and CCTV systems. Also, analog, digital, IP and Mega Pixel cameras.  Excellent work ethic. 29 years industry experience. Accomplishments shown below:
1981 Graduate West End High School
Alumni - Alabama A&M University Architectural  Engineering Major & Computer Science Minor 1985
The University of Alabama Birmingham 1986
National Deans List, Presidents List Alabama A&M University - Engineering
Society of Distinguished American High School Students Award - 1981
International Award Winning Inventor
Wells Fargo Employee of the 4th Quarter 1992
CEO Recognition Award Alert Centre Inc.
International Award Winning Patent Owner
National Inventors Club Award 1986 - Atlanta, Georgia
Owner of 3 United States Utility Patents
Owner 1 US Provisional Patent - Cell Phone Security Application 
Owner of 1 United States Service Mark
Experienced fire alarm project manager (contractor supervision) following local fire codes and NFPA regulations, etc. 
Own Official County Certification (Montgomery County Maryland & Fire Alarm License
Small Business Owner - Fire Alarm Systems, CFi Fire Pro
Certified on Bosch/Radionics 7024 Fire Panel, Bosch/Radionics G & GV Security Controls, EAS, Silent Knight Fire, Honeywell-Northern Computers Access Systems Pro 2200, Win Pak PE, SE, CS, Net AXS, Networking, System Integration. Notifier Fire Systems Factory Trained, NICET ID 116187

story:
Gold Mine Trading Co.

Gold Mine Trading Co. is a clothing brand based out of San Francisco. Our goal is to not only use American made goods, but to print and make everything ourselves locally. 

  • Gold Mine is a company that has a vintage Americana feel with a modern twist and we are based around making old things new.
  • We have been hard at work for close to 8 months designing, printing samples, and exploring new ideas to bring to the proverbial table that is the modern clothing company, and find we are ready to deliver our products to the public. 
  • With the help of our contributors we will be able to finally launch and breathe life into Gold Mine Trading Co. 

Our Goals is $2000

This will pay for:

  • Blank garments and goods to print and make along with necessary equipment like leather working tools, sewing supplies, and printing supplies. 
  • Our goals will also help us pay for the business side of this venture like allowing us to build and launch our website, register our name, and copyright our work. 
  • We have a number of perks and rewards for our contributors ranging from a tee shirt to other made-to-order goods including - an array of tee shirts and designs, tote bags, a leather keychain, and a custom poster design printed on recycled paper. On top of all these perks, we will also be handwriting thank you letters that will be sent out to all those who donate!

We realize that not everyone can contribute

Any and all help would be greatly appreciated and can include:

  • Following our instagram @goldminetradingco
  • Telling your friends and family about our company and what we are trying to do
  • And of course sharing our indiegogo link in hopes that other interest will be sparked and we may gain more contributors

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is John Harris and I am the creator of H.E.A.R.T Athletics LLC.  I am a Military Veteran who was fortunate enough to complete two degrees while serving on Active Duty.  A B.A. in Business Administration and an M.B.A. in Finance.  I have played sports all of my life and now coach High School football.  The acronym for my company breaks down the fundamental apsects of playing sports (which also translate into real life): H(ave) E(enough) A(ttitude) R(esilience) & T(oughness).  I believe these three core elements determine who we face adversity.
  • My campaign is designed to fund my project which I have been working on for several years.  It is the H.E.A.R.T Helmet Hoody.  The hoody is a sublimated sweatshirt with a unique design.  The sweatshirt has a specific team's jersey, name, number and helmet sublimated onto it.  The zipper, when pulled all the way up, stops at the nose.  This gives the appearance of wearing not only the football team jersey, but the helmet as well.  This project is important to me because I wanted to create something that the everyday sports fan can wear, that is cool, unique and affordable.  While I can make these products for Pop Warner and High School football teams, I need this funding to pay for an NCAA and NFL license. 
  • I truly believe that this product is ground breaking and unconventional.  This funding will allow me to not only create something different, but to give back as well.  By giving back, I mean that H.E.A.R.T Athletics LLC will continue to donate 10% of all purchased items for Non-Professional teams (Little League, Pop Warner, High School sports).  This idea is my baby and all I want to do is get it off the ground.  Any donation you seem fit to provide will be greatly appreciated.

What We Need & What You Get

  • All of the funding will be deposited into the H.E.A.R.T Athletics LLC PayPal account.  The funds will be used for licensing and registration for the NCAA and NFL.  They will also be used for the day to day operation of H.E.A.R.T Athletics LLC.  This will include rental space, website maintenance, permits and legal paperwork.  Our goal of 4,500.00 is actually only 30% of our intended goal of 15,000.00. 
  • Our biggest perk comes in two different forms.  This first awesome perk is that a donation of 100.00 will allow the donator to purchase goods from H.E.A.R.T Athletics LLC (any product, any quantity) at a 10% discount for an entire calendar year.  The second perk is that we donate 10% of every item purchased back to every amateur teams who purchase our products.  It is just like fundraising but without all of the hassle.
  • If for some reason we don not meet our goal for fundraising, we will attempt to use the funds we have received to accomplish our goals.  It will not be easy without the funding, but hey, we Have Enough Attitude Resilience & Toughness to make it happen!

The Impact

  • I believe that this product will 1.) Create a sense of self-pride in the ametuer athlete who wears this product. 2.)  Generate a secondary source of income for amateur sports teams. 3.)   Completely change the way people look at fan gear.
  • Our track record spans over a year.  We started out with our H.E.A.R.T Athletics Player Card and Player Outline shirts, which have sold consistently.  You can see all of our products at www.hearthelmethoody.com
  • This company is about the customer.  Everything we create is for the benefit of the athlete and his or her institution.  It is about how much H.E.A.R.T do you have?  Because what is good enough for you, may not be good enough for the next person.  If you have any questions that i have not answered, please feel free to email me at iplaywithheart@gmail.com or if possible, you can call me (410) 937-2371.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can not donate funds, that is OK.  But I please ask you to help spread the word about this campaing and the H.E.A.R.T Helmet Hoody.  Any little bit of help helps.  And I will be eternally grateful for any help you can provide!
  • Feel free to share this campaign page through you social media sites (Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, etc.) and also with the Indiegogo share tools!

THANK YOU for you support!!!!!

If you can not donate funds, that is OK.  But I please ask you to help spread the word about this campaing and the H.E.A.R.T Helmet Hoody.  Any little bit of help helps.  And I will be eternally grateful for any help you can provide!
Feel free to share this campaign page through you social media sites (Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, etc.) and also with the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
See Time in a Whole New Way

The Cognitime Classics...

Cognitime originally brought you the DØGN in 2011– but since then the company has gone through some big changes and now we are back and better than ever.

Our first release, the Cognitime Classics are built around our patented figure 8 time telling concept.  The combination of our lcd watch face with high grade materials and sleek design result in a quality looking, quality feeling, very unique wrist watch.  

But before we can do anything...we need your support! Now we are so close, our prototypes are ready to go, we just need to raise enough capital to make our first production...

Help us get to 55k!

 

Patented Time Telling Concept...

Conceptualized in Norway we have our very own way of telling time, the system uses a 24-segmented figure 8 to display the hours and 60-segmented outer circle to display the minutes and seconds.  Our concept truly captures the never-ending cycle that is "time".  See our video and learn more about how to tell time our way!

 

Watch Features...

Apart from telling time, the Cognitime Classics have three main functions: 5atm Water Resistant, Invert Colors (with LED backlight), and Alarm Capabilites - keeping you functional AND stylish.

 

Watch Specs...

The Cognitime Classics consists of 4 models all of which use the highest grade materials:

  • Brushed Stainless Steel - Blue Face
  • Brushed Stainless Steel - Green Face
  • IP Black - Blue Face
  • IP Black - Green Face

Perk Levels...

Check out our special indiegogo prices - get yours now!

**For shipping please remember to add the required amount for your location ontop of the perk price as unfortunately indiegogo doesn't automatically calculate it for us! In all of our perks shipping to the US is free, Canada is $15 and Intl is $30.  Thank you very much!

If you've already purchased a watch and forgot to add shipping please simply click on "contribute" and type in the shipping amount but select no perk.  We can then match the contributions.

** Just to clarify as well: Early Bird (Blue) is the blue face, Early bird (green) is the green face - Titles state it as it is, we had a bit of a technical difficulty when posting the perks!! Thanks~

 

Where we’re at….

We’ve worked tirelessly for months, refining the design and materials to finally achieve a product that we’re proud to put on our wrists. We have worked alongside a reputable manufacturer and now have 100% fully working prototypes.

 

Why and How the funds will be used…

We have funded the project ourselves to date but need your help to take it to the next level.  With your support we can have the production tools completed within two months of campaign completion and the first production run a month later. 

We need your support to purchase tooling for the straps, case back, and module case as well as films for packaging/manual and of course purchase of the first production run of 2000pcs.

 

Lead-time...

As soon as our target is reached we will order production molds and long lead-time components such as our custom MCU’s.  The total lead-time for production including molds, procurement and assembly is approximately 3 months. 

We hope to meet our goal as early as possible as we’d like to get these watches to you guys by Christmas! However, it is a busy time for the mail service – so if we reach our target at the very end of the campaign, then we may not make it before the 25th but will certainly try our best to do so.

With that being said the sooner we can get funded the better!

Scandinavian Design…

The Classics were designed in Oslo, Norway in collaboration with 360 Design.  Designer and partner at 360, Magnus Anderssen took the lead and combined Cognitime’s style with his design integrity, to come up with this stunning line of watches.

 

About Us…

Cognitime is an international collective of designers and production specialists who’s sole purpose is changing the way you see your time and making sure that you look damn good doing it.

Established in 2005, our core is the patented time telling concept from which all of our designs begin. We take that ticking heart and sculpt around it, painstakingly testing materials and checking that every line and curve is sexy and ergonomically perfect for your wrist.

 

Special Thanks...

A project like this does not happen without a little help from your friends, we would like to thank a few of ours:

Ulises, for his awesome work on our video and Chani for letting Barrett crash at her house during shooting.

Pat Hull, for letting us use his song “so far gone” in our videos.

Linz and Reg of Hedon Helmets, for letting us use their equipment (and apartment) for our photo shoot.

Nicky C. for the use of his sexy tattooed leg.

Everyone who has followed our project, given us words of inspiration, liked us on facebook or suggested us to a friend.  Without you none of this would be possible!

story:
Who is this girl??

My name is Liesl Geneva and I make clothing... magical clothing.  Everything I make adjusts to fit a range of sizes and shapes from a zero (aka teensy tiny creature) to a voluptuous 18/20.  Not only does it alter itself to fit your size, but it adjusts to honor your shape.  Whether you are big and busty with an itsy bitsy waist or small and square shouldered, high waisted or low, big hipped or have a concave booty you will find something that makes you feel as fabulous as you are.

 

Why should I give her my money?

The past couple of months have been kind of rough on me.  I made a major investment into my retail space and things haven't gone as smoothly as I'd hoped.  Sales are down and I'm struggling to make ends meet, much less make more magical things.  What I need from you is just a little kick in the rear to get things going again.

Here is where the money will go:

If I raise...

  • $100 - I get to pay my videographer, Chris Penney, for all of his hard work

  • $300 - I can pay my credit card bill!!! (woooooooo)

  • $500 - I get to make some needed updates to the website like adding sections for new designs as well as some general tweaking to the site.

  • $800 - Do some more work with Chris; we have some really cool ideas for promo videos

  • $1,500 - I get to attend this year's Michigan Womyn's Music Festival, providing they have space left. My ticket price (~$800) covers my mini-boutique inside of the Craft Bazaar as well as food and lodging for the week.

  • $2,500 - Not only can I pay Chris, update the website and attend Fest, but I'll also get to bring a helper with me and afford enough fabric to have stuff to sell!!! (that's usually a good idea, right??) ;)
  • $10,000+ - That would erase my credit card debt which would be kind of fantastic

 

Here is what you get out of it...

  • $1-24 - my undying love and affection
  • $25+  - my undying love and affection (and a free t-shirt!!)

Plus, your choice of repayment plan... 

  • 100% cash back (after Fest) -or-
  • Double Your Money in store credit (donate $10 get $20, donate $42 get $84, donate $1,000 get $2,000... you get the idea)

 

What this means for me...

Every person who donates/shares/likes/posts/tweets this campaign gets my undying love and affection. I've taken a blow not only financially but emotionally as well.  It's been kind of hard to keep the dream alive lately, but I'm not ready to give up quite yet... What can I say? I'm kind of stubborn like that.

In a culture like ours that determines a woman's worth by the size of her waist, it can be difficult to love yourself and your body.  That's why I do what I do - I help women love who they are, the size that they are, in the shape that they are in.  Whether that be hourglass or pear, we all deserve to feel beautiful.

If you believe as I do, here is how you can help...

 

SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

If you can't donate your money, donate your time by helping to spread the word.  

 

Tell your mom

Tell your dad

Tell your friends

Tell your enemies (they need love too)

 

Got skills? Hit me up on Facebook or Twitter and let me know what you can do to help.
