story:
Independent Design Meets Ethical Childrenswear


The T-Shirts

We have seven designs of t-shirt available. Jelly Loves Ice Cream, Treehouse, Supersaurus, Lions, I Love Puddles, Puffer and Winter of Our Discount Tents.

We will be adding some more t-shirts to our collection as the campaign progresses. Follow our campaign to be kept up to date, or check the updates tab for details.



You can also check the updates tab or the gallery tab, above, for close-up images of the shirts. 

How do I order a t-shirt?

You can order one, two, three, or four t-shirts in any size or combination. Just click the number that you want. Towards the end of the campaign, we'll send you a link to tell us your design and size preferences. Postage is included in the United Kingdom.

I live outside the United Kingdom- can I still order?

Yes. Please just add the interntational shipping option.

What if I want five t-shirts, or more?

If you want a t-shirts in a quantity we're not offering, please let us know. We can add that option to the rewards.  If you are looking for a wholesale catalogue and pricing, we can provide this on request.

You haven't answered my question here/ I want to know more

Please get in touch if there's anything you'd like to know. You can do this through the comments tab, above, or visit our website, mimiandwill.com, or find us on facebook or  twitter. 


Our aim is to produce high quality, ethically produced t-shirts for children, printed in the United Kingdom and featuring images produced by independent designers and artists.

The inspiration for the Mimi and Will project came when we tried to buy a t-shirt by designer Neil Slorance in a child's size. They weren't available - the range of sizes needed for childrenswear meant that it was often not financially viable for small, independent designers and artists to get them produced. So we thought we'd do it ourselves...


For our first collection, we have seven designers on board: Neil Slorance, Emma Henderson of Showpony, Laura Donald, Julia Smith, Jolly and Hodie, Lucy Farfort and Kim Gurney of Poosac. We have been in talks with some other designers, and hope to add a couple of more designs to the collection throughout our campaign. Keep following our progress for updates!

The image above shows the first printed samples from our collection. We'll be posting updates of final designs as soon as we approve them. 

We're aiming to get all t-shirts printed and delivered to you by early December- perfect for Christmas presents!



The T-Shirts
Our t-shirts are available for children from 2-12 - we'll provide detailed sizing information when it's time for you to give us your choices of t-shirt.

Our commitment to design, quality and responsible sourcing runs throughout Mimi and Will. That's why the t-shirts we use reflect our values, and aren't only our blank canvas, but the building blocks to our whole collection. We've sourced and made samples of all our t-shirts before they go into production.

So that we can bring you a range of colours and finishes, we work with two leading manufacturers, both of whom reflect our aspirations in terms of labour conditions, eco-credentials and sticking with standards that reflect their quality.  All the organic t-shirts we source meet the Global Organic Textile Standard, and everyone we work with either complies with international standards to protect the rights and livelihoods of workers, or is signed up to the Fair Wear Foundation.  Our suppliers are working to reduce their carbon footprints, and they comply with EU safety legislation.

Our printers use traditional processes and inks which are kind to the environment, they are based in the UK and are a small independent business, just like us.


What We're Asking For & What You Get

  • We felt that pre-ordering was the best way to accurately judge demand across sizes and designs, and that Indiegogo was a safe, trustworthy platform to do that.
  • The level of funding we're asking for allows us to produce our first collection. After the designers receive their payment, any profit we make will be re-invested to allow us to produce further collections
  • We're not asking for money for nothing- we're using Indiegogo as a way for you to pre-order t-shirts. We'll also be offering a discount on future collections for anyone who buys from us.
  • If we don't reach the full goal, we'll still be able to produce our first collection- just on a smaller scale and with less potential for re-investment in a second collection. But you'll still get your t-shirts!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't want to buy a t-shirt but would still like to help, you can:

  • Help us get the word out about our campaign. Feel free to blog/ tweet about us, share our campaign or just tell your friends!
  •  Spread the word using the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Independent Design Meets Ethical Childrenswear


The T-ShirtsWe have seven designs of t-shirt available. Jelly Loves Ice Cream, Treehouse, Supersaurus, Lions, I Love Puddles, Puffer and Winter of Our Discount Tents. We will be adding some more t-shirts to our collection as the campaign progresses. Follow our campaign to be kept up to date, or check the updates tab for details.







You can also check the updates tab or the gallery tab, above, for close-up images of the shirts. How do I order a t-shirt?You can order one, two, three, or four t-shirts in any size or combination. Just click the number that you want. Towards the end of the campaign, we'll send you a link to tell us your design and size preferences. Postage is included in the United Kingdom.I live outside the United Kingdom- can I still order?Yes. Please just add the interntational shipping option.What if I want five t-shirts, or more?If you want a t-shirts in a quantity we're not offering, please let us know. We can add that option to the rewards.  If you are looking for a wholesale catalogue and pricing, we can provide this on request.You haven't answered my question here/ I want to know morePlease get in touch if there's anything you'd like to know. You can do this through the comments tab, above, or visit our website, mimiandwill.com, or find us on facebook or  twitter. 
Our aim is to produce high quality, ethically produced t-shirts for children, printed in the United Kingdom and featuring images produced by independent designers and artists.The inspiration for the Mimi and Will project came when we tried to buy a t-shirt by designer Neil Slorance in a child's size. They weren't available - the range of sizes needed for childrenswear meant that it was often not financially viable for small, independent designers and artists to get them produced. So we thought we'd do it ourselves...


For our first collection, we have seven designers on board: Neil Slorance, Emma Henderson of Showpony, Laura Donald, Julia Smith, Jolly and Hodie, Lucy Farfort and Kim Gurney of Poosac. We have been in talks with some other designers, and hope to add a couple of more designs to the collection throughout our campaign. Keep following our progress for updates!The image above shows the first printed samples from our collection. We'll be posting updates of final designs as soon as we approve them. We're aiming to get all t-shirts printed and delivered to you by early December- perfect for Christmas presents!The T-ShirtsOur t-shirts are available for children from 2-12 - we'll provide detailed sizing information when it's time for you to give us your choices of t-shirt.Our commitment to design, quality and responsible sourcing runs throughout Mimi and Will. That's why the t-shirts we use reflect our values, and aren't only our blank canvas, but the building blocks to our whole collection. We've sourced and made samples of all our t-shirts before they go into production. So that we can bring you a range of colours and finishes, we work with two leading manufacturers, both of whom reflect our aspirations in terms of labour conditions, eco-credentials and sticking with standards that reflect their quality.  All the organic t-shirts we source meet the Global Organic Textile Standard, and everyone we work with either complies with international standards to protect the rights and livelihoods of workers, or is signed up to the Fair Wear Foundation.  Our suppliers are working to reduce their carbon footprints, and they comply with EU safety legislation.
Our printers use traditional processes and inks which are kind to the environment, they are based in the UK and are a small independent business, just like us.


What We're Asking For & What You Get


We felt that pre-ordering was the best way to accurately judge demand across sizes and designs, and that Indiegogo was a safe, trustworthy platform to do that.
The level of funding we're asking for allows us to produce our first collection. After the designers receive their payment, any profit we make will be re-invested to allow us to produce further collections
We're not asking for money for nothing- we're using Indiegogo as a way for you to pre-order t-shirts. We'll also be offering a discount on future collections for anyone who buys from us.
If we don't reach the full goal, we'll still be able to produce our first collection- just on a smaller scale and with less potential for re-investment in a second collection. But you'll still get your t-shirts!


Other Ways You Can HelpIf you don't want to buy a t-shirt but would still like to help, you can:

Help us get the word out about our campaign. Feel free to blog/ tweet about us, share our campaign or just tell your friends!
 Spread the word using the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Our Story

Our company Teres Kids is a breakthrough children's clothing line focused on optimal comfort. Teres Kids clothes are great for all children. They are also a much needed solution for millions of children suffering from tactile sensitivities.  This includes children with autism, sensory processing disorder and eczema.  More children are simply uncomfortable in their clothes.  For many parents, dressing their children is the hardest part of their day. Teres Kids provides a unique solution for millions of families in America, Canada, Europe and Japan.


All Teres Kids clothes are made in America. To make our premium clothing we start with the softest organic cotton available. We then eliminate all things that make kids uncomfortable such as tags, scratchy seams and rough edges. We create a super soft internal body - the part of the clothing that touches a child's skin. We believe it's the most comfortable product on the market.


We are growing rapidly. We need your help!.  Our order volume is growing so quickly, we are having trouble keeping up. When we manufacture each collection we pay months in advance for the materials and labor. We need additional funding to keep up with the increased demand.

The Impact

This project is about getting our organic, super comfortable clothes to as many kids as we can. The impact will be measured one family at a time. For example:


"Just wanted to let you know we love the clothes and we will buy more as soon as they are available.  Thank you! Aloha"   Princeville, Kauai, Hawaii


"I just purchased an indigo blue dress from my six year-old daughter who has Sensory Integration Disorder and tactile defensiveness.  I'm so grateful to Teres Kids. This is the first dress she wears joyfully." Estes Park, Colorado


"I really love your line. It makes me happy!"  Boston, Massachusetts


"Thanks again for all the magic Teres Kids creates to make this a saner, peaceful and beautiful world for all our kids!!!:)"  Los Angeles, California


" Jacob raved about his new clothes.  he said they were super soft inside and the most comfortable clothes ever!" New York, New York



What We Need & What You Get

We need $25,000 to meet the demands of our Winter 2011 collection, so we can get Teres Kids clothes to all the kids who want them.   All these funds will go to production of clothing including: fabric, dyeing, cutting, sewing and  printing. Our order volume is growing so quickly we are having trouble keeping up.  Instead of getting a bank loan we thought it would be better to engage people who believe in what we are doing and want to help! All other funding comes from Marianne and I, as well as friends and family.

We've put together some sweet perks for you and the children in your lives (ages 2-8). Here are photos of a few of our perks.


Organic Cotton Jersey Double Sided Scarf - awesome for kids and adults!



Teres Kids T-Shirts (specify size 2t - 8, we will send you color options)






Om - for girls (specify size 2t - 8, we will send you color options)

 



Warm Up - for boys (specify size 2t - 8, we will send you color and t-shirt design options)



Other Ways You Can Help


If you believe in what we're doing and you like what you see, help us spread the word and share us with your friends! The IndieGoGo share tools are a great way to do this.

Our over arching goal is to get all kids in healthy, comfortable clothes so they and their families can be active and happy.

story:
edlee Designs is the culmination of two friends working together to create a great product to SHOW THE WORLD the Southern California beach culture.  What better way to represent beach culture than with custom sunglasses.   Made from Bamboo and Wood, these high quality polarized sunglasses are both fashionable and sustainable.


After surveys are completed and manufacturing is done, we will ship your edlee Design Sunglasses by the end of September!





A lot of hard work has been done over the past year but none more than preparing for this Campaign. It is incredible to see the outcome of what happens when everyone sees an amazing vision and works towards a common goal.  What you see is the hard work of a lot of amazingly talented and passionate people who we are grateful to be surrounded by and we couldn't be more thankful for all of you!

Carissa Catalina: Graphic Design and photography (www.carissacatalina.com)

Mike Bagood: Director and Producer (mikebagood@gmail.com)

Tyler Haines: Director of Photography (www.tyhaines.com)

Trevor Pregler: Camera

Will Parry: Music, "Show The World"

Mark Perez: Voice Over (markDJMPperez.com)

Kua Wittman: Actor

Devan Cameron: Actor

Jessica Gagnon: Actor

Thank you all so much from Joe and Garrett!


Get Your Project Funded Today!

F.A.Q.

What comes with each pair of sunglasses?

Standard Line - We will send you your choice of Wave Series Sunglasses with fabric cloth bag and eldee sticker!

Premium and Executive line - For every pair of sunglasses you order, we will send you a pair in a bamboo protective box, fabric bag and edlee sticker!

Do all your sunglasses float?

All of our Premium and Executive Line sunglasses float!  The Wave Series (Standard Line) only float with the croakies attached to them.

When will I get my sunglasses?

We are scheduled to have your sunglasses shipped by mid May in time for Memorial Day.  We don't anticipate any delivery issues since we are working very closely with our manufacturer to ensure we stay on schedule.

How do I choose my styles and colors?

After we are fully funded and the campaign is over, we will send out a survey to all of our backers.  Here you will simply fill out a survey with all needed information for us to fulfill your order.

story:
A cute little handmade acorn cap lantern to add some color and fun to your miniature garden, fairy garden, or you could use it as a decor.

I add a little wire loop to the top of the real acorn cap and it's ready to be hung from the decorative wire hook.


Amazing Lantern For Your Garden:

  • Lantern globe is approximately 3/4 inches wide.
  • Stake is approximately 8 inches tall.

Because this is made from natural products no two are exactly alike. Acorn cap may vary.



Decorative use only. Does not light up.

Items are not intended for small children. They contain small parts.

We Need Your Support!

Your Help would bring in employment for 2 people

  • Will hire 2 people to work on this project. We will need to pay them monthly wages.
  • And need to build an online store for our handmade items, to reach people around the world.

story:
Updated 5.6.12

What This Product Is

The product is simply modified AO Legacy Glass.  The designs that may be created on it are limitless.

Where This Product Fits In

The next time you walk into a Starbucks for a cup of coffee, a corporate office building that has a grand entrance, or your at the Fort Clatsop Visitor Center learning about Lewis & Clark, you may notice the glass tile accents sending you a message. That message may be visual, such as a Starbucks logo, it may be a Nike Swoosh with a founders name under it, or it may be a short paragraph about historical facts.  Whatever it may be, take notice, customization of this beauty, price, and durability is not on the market yet, but it will be soon!  

 

What We Need

The machinery and process have already been purchased and created. It is the business peripherals and the sales generators that are keeping the business from advancing.

The items listed below in ranked order are where the funding will go:

1) $2000 for a Direct Marketing/Mailing Program to Architect/Design Group Firms.  These would be simple hardbound bifold binders with a few samples on one of the inside covers with the other inside cover being information on usage and design.

2) $2000 for a Advertising in trade magazines such as Tile Magazine.
Small ads with high resolution images.

3) $3000 for Website Development.  Quite simple- in need of a profesionally done website.

4) $3000 for Display Development (Displays that go into flooring stores)

5) $2000 for Trademark Registration


Other Ways You Can Help

Are you a designer? Do you own a flooring store that sells tile?  You can help simply by spreading the word that Aspire Tile Enhancement is here and wants to add fine details to glass accents for your projects.

story:
Want to pre-order? Visit our website here: cortez-outerwear.com

Questions? Just drop us a line at support@cortez-outerwear.com

Want to follow our journey and be informed about new products and campaigns? Check Facebook or Instagram. 

Or just read our story below.  

-----

INTRODUCING OUR JACKET 

         


OUTSTANDING DESIGN & SMART DETAILS 

We used our love for skiing, passion for the outdoors, and 40+ years of experience in outerwear production to create the perfect jacket for all your adventures. 

After 12 months in development, we're proud to introduce our first collection, containing 20+ features all in one jacket. Check it out below.

Keeps you warm - whenever, wherever.

Especially for the Indiegogo community, all backers receive a beautifully designed mid-layer jacket for free (€100 value). 

We care about the environment and our animal friends. That's why all Cortèz mid-layer jackets come with the revolutionary 3M™ Thinsulate™ Insulation.

3M developed this innovative insulation to make living life in every season more enjoyable, while at the same time replacing natural down.

The mid-layer is highly breathable and warm, perfect for layering in colder conditions or just as a standalone piece. 


THE CORTÈZ JACKET VS. ARC'TERYX AND NORTH FACE

A picture is worth a thousand words. Let us show you why we believe the Cortèz jacket can easily compete with the best in the industry.  

By using a disruptive direct-to-consumer model, and cutting out the middlemen, we can offer our jackets for an exceptionally reduced price while maintaining the same high-quality standards as leading industry brands.

As a result, we can offer our high-performance jacket for €319 (Indiegogo price) + a mid-layer jacket for free ( + mid-layer (€100 value). 


OUR DESIGN PROCESS

For the past 12+ months we've been working together with world-renowned manufacturers on multiple prototypes to finalise our very first collection. It all started with an idea. 

Together with our supplier Vert Company - a true pioneer in the field of sustainable production - we're now ready to start production of the Cortèz jacket and mid-layer. 


OUR REVOLUTIONARY FABRIC

Dermizax®EV - The perfect membrane that redefines comfort and protection for high-performance fabrics.


WHY THIS FABRIC?

Dermizax®EV is a 100% waterproof, windproof and breathable membrane (fabric). Specifically developed to provide maximum protection against all kinds of demanding activities and weather conditions. 

It's a durable and lightweight 3-layer fabric that can be washed like any other textiles. The perfect fabric for our collection of High-Performance jackets.

Besides waterproofness, we highly value a fabric's breathability. 

See below how the Dermizax membrane compares to other high-performance fabrics. 


THE JACKET IN ACTION


FOR MEN AND WOMEN 

Our first collection is available in three colors, both for men and women.

*** Want to pre-order? Visit our website here: cortez-outerwear.com

** Questions? Just drop us a line at support@cortez-outerwear.com

* Want to follow our journey and be informed about new products and campaigns? Check Facebook or Instagram. 


WE ALREADY GOT SOME FIRST USERS!

Our products were tested in the French Alps, see some of the first reviews below. 


A JACKET TO USE ON THE SLOPES... 

 

...IN THE MOUNTAINS... 

 

REWARDS 

Especially for our early backers on Indiegogo, the Cortèz jackets will be delivered including a warm mid-layer jacket for free (€100 value). See our packages below to find out more. 

*** Want to pre-order? Visit our website here: cortez-outerwear.com

** Questions? Just drop us a line at support@cortez-outerwear.com

* Want to follow our journey and be informed about new products and campaigns? Check Facebook or Instagram. 


WHEN TO EXPECT YOUR JACKET?
​

SIZE CHART
We'll contact you as soon as possible to help you select the right size and color. 

Nevertheless, below you can find our size chart to already measure your chest, waist, hips and sleeve length. This will help you to choose that one size that fits you best.   

UPDATE: New size XS is added to our collection! 

 

OUR TEAM

This is us, rocking the Cortèz jacket! We are passionate skiers with an extensive background in clothing production, fashion and entrepreneurship. 

As the founders of Sqetch.co Wiebe and Wouter have helped hundreds of fashion brands and clothing suppliers to grow their business. 

Herman has been working in the field of clothing production for 40+ years and is the owner of Vert Company, a true pioneer in sustainable production.

--------------

*** Want to pre-order one of the jackets? Visit our website here: cortez-outerwear.com

** Questions? Just drop us a line at support@cortez-outerwear.com

* Want to follow our journey and be informed about new products and campaigns? Check Facebook or Instagram. 

 

SPECIAL THANKS

Video credits: Matemade - Creative Film Company

Photography credits: Thomas van Schaik - Still Life & Product Photography

Design: Ivan Pashchenko

Intern Superstars: Nathan Liao and Ioanna Zygogianni

Icons: https://ineedicons.com/

 

AND OF COURSE..

We would love to thank our family and friends for their support during the Cortèz journey so far, we couldn't have done it without you!

Let's hope together we can make this a huge success!

Visit our website here: cortez-outerwear.com** Questions? Just drop us a line at support@cortez-outerwear.com* Want to follow our journey and be informed about new products and campaigns? Check Facebook or Instagram.  SPECIAL THANKSVideo credits: Matemade - Creative Film CompanyPhotography credits: Thomas van Schaik - Still Life & Product PhotographyDesign: Ivan PashchenkoIntern Superstars: Nathan Liao and Ioanna ZygogianniIcons: https://ineedicons.com/ AND OF COURSE..We would love to thank our family and friends for their support during the Cortèz journey so far, we couldn't have done it without you!Let's hope together we can make this a huge success!

story:
After desperately look for the wallet with an easy and quick access, I have never found, I decided to create my own wallet that combined all these features with an appealing design. Here's how Corkaw was born. To highlight these qualities and to give it the longest possible duration of life I have decided to use quality materials such as thick fabric resistant to water. Cork or Vegan Leather for its chic and its strength allows it to be both durable and stylish.

AS FAST AS YOUR THUMB

Corkaw Studio created the first cascading wallet that works with only the thumb (see my last Kickstarter campaign here).
Press with your thumb on the cards and made a movement up and down until the cards appear in cascading. This is really cool !

FOLD IT OR NOT

The first wallet that fits your needs. You can fold it in one direction or the other, as it matters to you.

You go on a trip, just open it and slip your passport, tickets and anything else.

 

THE DESIGN

 

MULTITUDE OF COLORS

The FOLD is available in two colors and materials. One for everybody.


 Natural Cork 

Black Celestial

GALLERY

REWARDS

TIMELINE

THANK YOU

Thank you everyone who has helped me along the way! If you have any queries, you can contact me by private message.

STAY TUNED AND SPREAD THE WORD
story_txt: After desperately look for the wallet with an easy and quick access, I have never found, I decided to create my own wallet that combined all these features with an appealing design. Here's how Corkaw was born. To highlight these qualities and to give it the longest possible duration of life I have decided to use quality materials such as thick fabric resistant to water. Cork or Vegan Leather for its chic and its strength allows it to be both durable and stylish.AS FAST AS YOUR THUMBCorkaw Studio created the first cascading wallet that works with only the thumb (see my last Kickstarter campaign here).Press with your thumb on the cards and made a movement up and down until the cards appear in cascading. This is really cool !FOLD IT OR NOTThe first wallet that fits your needs. You can fold it in one direction or the other, as it matters to you.You go on a trip, just open it and slip your passport, tickets and anything else. THE DESIGN MULTITUDE OF COLORSThe FOLD is available in two colors and materials. One for everybody. Natural Cork Black CelestialGALLERYREWARDSTIMELINETHANK YOUThank you everyone who has helped me along the way! If you have any queries, you can contact me by private message.STAY TUNED AND SPREAD THE WORD

story:
Hi! I'm Elio, an illustrator based in Sarawak, Malaysia. I can usually be found online as @heliosdraws on Tumblr, Twitter and Instagram. This is my first crowdfunding campaign and my first time making enamel pins, and my goal is to design and create bespoke pins with beautiful designs for the quirky, the unique and the fashion-forward!

INTRODUCTION:

I created this campaign based on the positive feedback from friends and fans alike on both Tumblr and Twitter, and I've decided to design my pins based on the Unions present in the mobile game, Kingdom Hearts Union X, as tribute to the game and the series in general. I tried to keep the designs as general as possible, so that it attracts those who don't know the game or the series, but would like unique pins based on mythological or existing animals to add to their collection. 

The pins available are as follows:

  • Unicornis/Unicorn
  • Vulpes/Fox
  • Ursus/Bear
  • Anguis/Cobra
  • Leopardos/Leopard

FUND BREAKDOWN:

For this campaign, 75% of the funds will go towards manufacturing and shipping of the pins, and 5% will go towards Indiegogo fees, while the remaining 25% will go towards packaging and manufacturing of other perks available in this campaign. 

RISKS:

This is my first venture into making enamel pins, so possible risks include longer production time than estimated (in order to correct any errors and making changes). I have however made contact with and learned about the process of making pins from more experienced friends, so I will ensure that these errors are minimal and do not require significant changes. 

Other risks include:

Delays in shipping: I will be using Pos Malaysia's Flexipack International to ship all pins worldwide, including an international tracking number. While deliveries with this service is expected to arrive within two weeks, sometimes shipping delays and lost packages may occur during delivery. 

Campaign nature: Bear in mind that this is a fixed campaign. If the goal of $500 is not met within the stipulated timeline, there will be no rewards and the money will be returned to you.

The specifications of each pin is as follows:

At the beginning of this campaign, two pins will be available. The initial goal for this campaign will cover manufacturing costs and shipping for both of these:

Upon reaching the goal, three other milestone goals will be available, as follows:

More will be added if the intial+bonus goals are achieved!

Several goodies will be made available according to the amount you backed! Please see the perks section on the right for details. Here's an overview of them:

story:
13-ONE,

is named after the length of a half-marathon. 13-ONE is an innovative  business founded by entrepreneur, and  runner, Hema Nambiar. At 13-ONE we believe "Everyday Is A Marathon".

Our one of a kind Everest collection utilizes NASA space technology to retain body heat by 90%, making it ideal sports wear that gives athletes faster recovery after an intense activity. With a self-storing pocket, it’s easy to keep on hand, making it ideal for athletes, outdoor enthusiasts, travelers or just everyday people on the go. The Everest is warm and water-repellent, shielding you from cold, wet and windy days. Whether you are going to the gym, work, night out or looking for adventure, our jackets have you covered.

Why support 13-ONE?

  • Every jacket that is ordered on Indiegogo helps us with our production cost.
  • Fully funded on Kickstarter in December 2016 for initial production cost.

Support a community of like-minded outdoor enthusiast looking for a lightweight sportswear solutions. 

Unisex Full Zip Jacket:

Unisex Half Zip Windbreaker Jacket:

Women's Trench:

Amazing Technology In A Small Package 

13-One Sportswear isn’t simply a fashion-forward statement of style. The jackets are a technological leap incorporating NASA space technology to retain body heat by an astonishing 90%. Every 13-One jacket uses proprietary Silver Lining® Technology, a radiant barrier developed by scientists at NASA for astronauts. Known as “Heatsheets®”, this technology allows our jackets to harness natural energy sources, like body and solar heat, to protect against heat, wind, rain and cold by reflecting up to 90% of your body heat back to you. This makes 13-One the ideal choice for athletes who want a quicker recovery time after an intense workout. But these jackets aren’t just for jocks. They’re for kids who like to play in the rain. Working Moms who like to work out. And on-the-go Dads who like to travel lightly. Best of all, everyone will stay warm, dry and look very, very cool in our silver-piped sportswear.

 

THREE AMAZING JACKETS:  

Perfect for the office and a night out!

 

Weekend Warriors like to travel light!

Ideal for Pre/Post Workout!

 

What you get:

  • Impeccably designed one of a kind unisex windbreaker, full zip-up and/or women's trench. Designed with love for over a year and making sure we got it just right.
  • An eye for detail: silver piping, Velcro wrist straps, reflective logo and sewn in pocket for portability.
  • Quality over all else. Our jackets are produced with silver piping, made from ultra lightweight polyester woven fabric with reflective insulated lining, making our jackets soft, durable, and stylish to wear for any weather conditions. We believe in ultimate comfort.
  • Supporting a brand that spends 365 days perfecting sportswear jackets for outdoor lovers like us.

​

Perfect For Outdoor Lovers:

 

Laundry Instructions:

:

Hand Wash In Cold Water, No Bleach, Hang Dry, Low Heat Iron

 

REVIEWS TO RAVE ABOUT

How One Mylar Inspired a NASA-Technology Jacket

Indian American-run Firm Seeks Funding for NASA Technology-enabled Sports Jacket

Westchesterites Raising Money on Kickstarter Contributors

 

Sizing Chart:

 
 
​

Production Timeline:

Thank you for your support in our Everest jackets. We are thrilled to be in production. Our sizes tend to run a bit big because the Windbreaker and Full Zip Up are Unisex. Make sure to use the size chart we have included in our campaign to make sure the jacket fits. For example, Men's Small is Women's Medium.

Jackets start shipping the first week of May 15th. We will do our best to make sure production stays on schedule and will keep you updated with developments.

If your jacket comes damaged, you will have 30 days to return and/or exchange it at no shipping cost. If you would like to exchange your jacket for a different size, there will be $25 flat rate, excluding international. We would love to hear your feedback and answer any questions you may have. We have spent 365 days perfecting the Everest Jacket and can't wait for you to experinece it.

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? You can still help!

  • Share this page on your social media or at your next get together with your friends & family!

story:
I am Eda Aguilar and I have been nominated as a finalist of the Independent Handbag Designer Awards in New York City.

I have over 18 years of business experience (14 years in finance & investments + 5 years in the fashion industry). In 2014, I launched my line of fashion accessories, Eda Lourdes, and I am now introducing a line of handbags. I need your support to make this dream come true! 

La Coucou is a micro crossbody that can be worn as a neck piece, a belt bag, a clutch or a shoulder bag.  It has beautiful and carefully selected materials such as quality leather and rose gold metal hardware, which makes it LUXURIOUS but AFFORDABLE. Our handbag is fun and practical; it was inspired by Self-Love and the road to get there. Your support will help Eda Lourdes (EL) cover the costs to complete EL's participation in the competition, continue R&D for manufacturing and start the production and promotion of the first "Coucou" bags for marketing and publicity. Detailed report available upon request.

I have been working in Paris with fashion wholesale brands and I now understand what are the steps to start commercial sales in Europe & America, the markets to reach and the key people needed to make that happen. In May 2019, my design, “Coucou”, was selected as finalist of the Independent Handbag Designer Awards, a reputable designers competition in New York City that has launched the careers of past winners like Aimee Kestenberg. This experience has provided my brand an incredible exposure and I’m overwhelmed by all the requests I’ve received of women who want to actually buy the handbag. 

Your contribution will not only be used to support Eda Lourdes' brand but also 6.5% of the money raised will be donated to non-profit association Amor Sana TCR.  Amor Sana TCR was founded by my dear friend and cancer survivor Tania Cristina Robles and is dedicated to help people heal their body and emotions off from chronic diseases. The organization designed the "First Aid Cancer Kit" and the proceeds will be used to continue their efforts to provide kits to cancer patients in Puerto Rico. To find out more please visit https://www.facebook.com/amorsanaTCR/

                  *We will be able to send the donation after surpassing $10,000.

 

We will keep an open channel with you, our backers, by sharing our production process through Indiegogo updates and comments to ensure you're always in the loop. Thank you for your support!

Please check out the perks section as I have some goodies for you as well!

All backers immediately become part of the Eda Lourdes VIP (first in line for a bag! with a 15% discount)!

Materials 

  • 100% Leather 
  • Satin linning 
  • Rose Gold Hardware

Main Features

  • Crossbody: brunch with the girls or date night!
  • Necklace style: Coachella or San Sebastian Festival (close to the heart & secure from pickpockets)
  • Belt (fanny pack): On the go! Travel! 
  • It has the new measurements (6.76”X4.5”X 1”), required recently by concert halls and sport venues.

Color Options

  • Black Black 
  • Bronze Black 

 

Spread the Word!

If you think of a friend or loved one who could be interested in the "Coucou" bag, please share this campaign with them! Use the links below.

https://thehandbagawards.com/year/2019/finalist/Eda%20Aguilar

http://www.edaaguilar.com/​

 

EDA LOURDES PRESS RELEASE

Please read below for more details of the competition and how I got there! 

Fashion accessory designer based in Paris is selected as finalist in prestigious New York fashion accessories competition.

Eda Aguilar, fashion designer from Puerto Rico based in Paris has been selected as finalist of the prestigious handbag design competition, “The Independent Handbag Design Awards” (IHDA), to be held on June 12th, 2019 at the SVA Theater of New  York.

Eda produces her line of fashion accessories between Paris, New York and San Juan (Puerto Rico) and is one out of five finalist in the category “The Aimee Kestenberg “Self Love” Inspired Handbag”. Her proposal named “Coucou” was inspire on her own journey of self love and personal empowerment, under the known English phrase “ME, MYSELF & I… and my essentials”.

“Carrying the "Coucou" bag is synonymous to freedom and versatility. To go where you want to go, to do what truly makes you feel happy and filled with self love. Considering that you don’t have to carry the old lady bag of “Petunia” like we say in Puerto Rico” said Eda about her last design.

The “Coucou” micro can be worn as a necklace, crossbody or also as the very “en vogue” belt bag or “fanny pack”. The bag also has the new measurements 6.76”X4.5”X 1”, required recently by concert halls and sport venues.

If Eda is selected as the winner, she could potentially collaborate with the design team of Aimee Kestenberg to make a bag inspired on Eda’s design. She could also meet with Aimee's CEO & Creative Director to discuss strategies and guidelines on how to improve Eda’s fashion brand, Eda Lourdes. Finally she could be considered for an apprenticeship with the Affordable Luxury Group in New York City among other rewards.

Eda Aguilar, born and raised in Puerto Rico, was drawn to the creative world at a very young age through her involvement with dancing, modeling, television, and theater. Her professional career was in banking where she excelled in finance and investments for 15 years in Puerto Rico New York City. In 2014, she decided to reconnect with her true passion for accessories design and launches her line “Eda Lourdes”. The brand is inspired on the lifestyle and fashion of her favorite cities of San Juan, New York, and Paris.

“Even though I now live in Paris, Puerto Rico is still an essential part of my designs. My mom and my aunts together with other seamstress in the island make by hand important pieces of the line such as capes, gloves, hats, sashs, and lace jewelry.”

The brand tries to complement the life of a modern woman, which is nowday’s quite active, stylish but busy. “Our accessories are sophisticated, elegant and feminine. They give the perfect last touch to any attire and promise to give new life to the classic “little black dress”, regardless if the dress was inherited from your mother or you have used it on a few occasions”.

Eda Lourdes'  accessories have been sold in the boutiques such as Madonna & Co. in New York City and Escarcha Guaynabo, PR. Although her first collection was only accessories, Eda always dreamed of creating a line of handbags. Since her teenage years she would entertain herself decomposing jewelry from handbags and adding other elements to then create a new bag design. When she was living in New York she made over 30 bags for her girlfriends incorporating fashion trends like lace and Swarovski crystal. In 2017, Eda submitted her first design to the IHDA with an innovative design that had different straps, but it was not until this year when her third submission caught the attention of the judges.

“Is this for real? This is the third time I send a handbag design”. That was Eda’s reaction to the unexpected news. It was Emily Bluenthal, the founder and creator of the IHDA who called her to inform that her design had been selected among thousands of competitors.

The Independent Handbag Designer Awards were created in 2007 to recognize the creativity in handbag designs in the United States and across the world. Now in its 13th edition, the awards are now a staple on the fashion industry given that is the only international design competition that discovers, recognize and create brand awareness for independent handbag designers. Annually about 2000 submissions are sent from designers from 5 continents and 28 countries compete on this prestigious event.

With the objective of formalizing her passion, Eda took courses of business and design from the Parsons The New School for Design” and worked for the blog Rue de Rogues. She has also worked various fashion houses in Paris like IRO, APPARIS, MIRIAM BUDET & LEMLOREN.

Eda hopes to use this experience and exposure to launch her line of handbags and expand her accessories production. Her experience on the European fashion market has taught her that it takes much more than a good product to make a sale and she hopes to be able to continue developing her brand so that it is attractive to romantic women that have some rock & roll in their lives, like she does.

In addition to winning on her category she also has the opportunity to win the Fan Favorite award which is being held by Bella NY Magazine. You can vote for Eda Aguilar on the following link: 

https://bellanyc.com/bella-audience-fan-favorite/ You can vote everyday until June 11th 2019.

story:
SCROLL DOWN TO DISCOVER

Our Story/Testimonials/Our Downloadable Colour Chart
Size Chart/How We Give Back/Our Team/FAQs

 

 

Our Story

Since forever, women of colour have had to make do with beige lingerie. Beige is not nude. It’s not my nude. Is it your nude?

Fed up by the lack of available fashions, our founder, stylist Chantal Carter Taylor, would hand dye bras and panties to match her skin tone. It was a messy waste of time. As women of colour we should be able to buy everyday products that match our skin tone. 

Introducing Love & Nudes: wire-free bras & panties designed to match your skin tone, be invisible under your clothing, and be so comfortable you could sleep in them. Because we have better things to do than worry about bunching panty lines, poking under-wires and bras that shine through our tops.

 

Our Bras

Available in 4 skin tone shades and designed to disappear under your clothing, your Love & Nudes wire-free bra replaces a drawer full of specialty bras. It's a T-shirt, Sport, Sexy, Racerback, Everyday bra that will never steal the spotlight from you.

Our wire-free bra features a thicker band & lightly contoured cup to give you support without bunching or poking, and a built-in racerback hook for those sexy styles & increased support during light workouts. Guaranteed No Slip Straps! 

 

Indulge in our sumptuous Brazilian panties. Elastic-free edges make our panties super comfy and almost invisible. Available in 4 skin tone shades. 

 

 

Click here to download your printable colour chart

Our 4 colours blend perfectly with your skin tone and have been named to celebrate you! Use our colour tones chart above to find your perfect tone. Alternatively, you can use our foundation guide below as a reference also.

Sizing

While the bras were being developed, we quickly realized it would be hard to be everything to everybody. Our diverse bras are special. Eventually, we would like to offer endless sizes for every beautiful woman of colour. At this time, we offer S, M, L, XL in both the bras and the panties. We believe you have to walk before you run. Please see the sizing chart below for reference.

 

By taking part in this campaign you will  be helping to grow a community of empowered women of colour. Your contributions will help us fund our first production run at our factory in Colombia. Chantal was a single mom and was thrilled to find out that our manufacturer focuses on employing single mothers.

How We Give Back

.

Our community is vital to us and we believe charity begins at home. Which is why a percentage of the contributions will go towards the Caribbean Women’s Society (CWS) a non-profit organization with a mission to connect and enable Caribbean Women. We support you CWS!

What We Need & What You Get

We've been super cautious with funds to develop this line thus far. We've bootstrapped research and development of our prototypes, and the custom dyeing of fabric and materials for production.

We need to hit our goal of $20,000 to produce our first factory production run.

Our Team

 

The Mission

My mission to uplift women of colour through fashion drove me to launch this brand Love & Nudes, a social movement to celebrate, connect and empower women of colour to cherish the skin they’re in. This intimates line is a vehicle to achieve this mission.

The Impact

Our goal is to create a global community designed to celebrate, connect and share one another’s individuality and showcase the beauty of difference through social media and events. This intimates line is a vehicle to promote these goals.

The reality is, diverse skin colours are not accurately reflected in the media, fashion or cosmetics industries. These barriers often cause women of colour to feel inferior and less beautiful than women with lighter skin – driving the skin bleaching industry to a staggering ten billion dollars 

Risks & Challenges

Love & Nudes has been an active project for the last 19 months. During this time we have ironed out a lot of challenges and this allows us to be confident in delivering a superb line of intimates to our fabulous customers. We do not anticipate any major problems in production or being able to deliver your intimates on time. If any major concerns regarding production come up, we will be sure to address it as necessary.

Shipping Date

Estimated shipping date is April 2017.

FAQs

What if I want to donate but don't want a perk?  No problem! Indiegogo provides the ability to donate any amount while opting out of a perk. Simply click on the “Back It” button and you can select what you would like to contribute

How do I specify the colour and size of my reward? After the campaign ends, we will reach out to you via email asking for your preferred colour, size, and style. 

What if my perk doesn't fit or match my skin tone?  We have included a colour and foundation chart as a guideline to select your perfect tone. We are confident that you will love the tone you select. Unfortunately, because we are selling intimate products, for hygienic reasons, we will be unable to accept returns.

What if I don’t see my size in the options above? We will be offering size extensions in the future. If you would like to be notified when we do, join our mailing list here.

How long will it take to ship the perks? Our anticipated shipping date is April 2017.

Do you ship worldwide? Yes!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Sharing is caring! We would love for you to share the Love & Nudes story and campaign with others to promote a movement of diversity, equality, and self-confidence so that we can continue to inspire women of colour to embrace the skin they're in. Forward our campaign link to others who you believe would appreciate this and make some noise about our campaign!

Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Our Sponsors

We would like to thank our sponsors for helping us provide awesome rewards for this campaign:

The Curl Ambassadors 

MIYU Teas & Beauty

story:
At Barner we bring you the coolest eyewear together with premium anti-blue light protection thanks to our collaboration with an international leader in the fields of optics. Since spending extended periods of time in front of electronic devices can harm your eyes, we have designed and created Barner eyewear. A product that will help you:

  • Sleep better
  • Improve your comfort and focus when using digital devices
  • Provide better health & well-being
  • Always maintain a stylish look

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

All these digital devices are emitting harmful blue light and our eyes are not prepared to the overexposure that we are suffering these days. Because of that, a new Digital Sickness called Computer Vision Syndrome (CVS) is emerging.

 

Some of the symptoms of this overexposure to blue light are: 

  • Eyestrain, dry eyes, red eyes, eye fatigue
  • Headaches, neck pain
  • Double vision, vertigo/dizziness, difficulty refocusing the eyes
  • Reduction of melatonin production
  • Change of sleeping cycles (circadian rhythms)
  • Macular degeneration

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We bring you  3 different models inspired by the coolest neighbourhoods of  New York, London and Berlin. You have 3 different colours to choose from each model making a total of 9 different designs available on Indiegogo.

 

Williamsburg is the epicentre of Brooklyn as a fashionable worldwide brand, the quaint streets are lined with inventive New York restaurants, rooftop bars and eclectic shops, and throngs of people flock to the waterfront for flea markets and giant food bazaars during the summer.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Shoreditch is considered the creative hub of London’s trendy East End. Shoreditch is a goldmine for one-of-a-kind clothes and accessories, with more independent boutiques and vintage shops than you can shake a stick at. 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kreuzberg is one of Berlin’s quintessential hipster neighbourhoods. The locals call it X-Berg, which sounds like Marvel scraping the barrel for hero names, but the area actually delivers on its promise of finding hidden treasures wherever you look.

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With this accessory you will now be able to use your Barners in front of the screens but also on the street, relaxing at your favourite beach or breathing some fresh air in the mountains.  

For only 39€ more, your Barners will become 2 products in one. You won’t need to spend more money in sunglasses and won’t have to be carrying 2 set of glasses all day long.  

 

At Barner Brand we are in love with our product and we want you to feel the same. That is why we are taking care of every single detail and want to give you more than just a pair of glasses to protect against the harmful blue light. 

We have been working really hard during the last few months, to bring to the market an eyewear with the highest quality materials available.

 

We are partnering with an international leader in the fields of optics who has been contributing to technological optical progress for more than 50 years.

Barner's lenses, have a coating specially developed for people who spend a lot of their time indoors and are exposed to blue-violet light from LEDs as well as smartphones, TV, tablet or computer screens.

 

How it works

Our lenses reflect parts of the blue-violet light emitted by digital devices, thereby avoiding the retina. Our treatment reduces the transmission drastically between 380 - 455 nm (450 being the most dangerous wavelength), while allowing the healthier blue-turquoise light (>460 nm) to increase our melatonin production, letting us sleep well and improving our circadian rhythm.

  

 

 

Other great features offered by Barner lenses

Our lenses have seven ultra-thin layers for incredibly hard lenses with the following characteristics:

 

Video showing our whole manufacturing process

 

Mazzucchelli 1849, an Italian company based in Castiglione Olona, is a worldwide leader in the manufacturing and distribution of sheets made of Cellulose Acetate, a polymer of natural origin, traditionally used in the production of optical and sunglass frames.

 

Frames

Every pair of Barner frames are handmade. Each front shape is cut from a unique flat sheet of 8mm Italian Mazzucchelli acetate, making every pair of frames exclusive. Acetate eyewear require more than 20 different handcrafting processes, making of every eyewear a masterpiece.

 

  

  

 

 

Temples

Temples are cut from another sheet of 6mm thickness, heated and molded to reach their standard position. This is a great characteristic of handmade acetate glasses that can be adjusted to achieve the optimum fit for every user.

The Barner logo is lasered and then filled with a special liquified metal paint, to make sure it will never be erased.

 

  

 

 

Wire core & hinges

Together with our eyewear artisan, and based on his experience, we have selected a wire core from a German company that is embedded in every temple. Using this, we reinforce the temples and by mounting the hinge directly to this hardware we get a more solid construction and an excellent movement of the temple. A product that will be with you for a long time.

 

 

 

 

 

We are a very user centric company and we want our users to have the greatest experience since the beginning. This is why we have developed a package with an amazing quality, a great design and filled with great surprises. 

 

 

We have developed 2 different cases for every different moment. The "Travel case" is a harder case, perfect to put in your luggage or backpack when travelling in order to avoid big damages on the lenses and frames.

We also have the "everyday case", a case to use on a daily basis to carry your glasses around the office and from your home to the bar. Is very light and it will avoid your lenses to scratch.

 

 

These glasses are suitable for any kind of situation. You can use them any time you are in front of your laptop at the office, while using your device in bed before going to sleep, in a meeting room, using your laptop in your favourite bar, reading or watching your favourite series on the sofa and anytime you are moving around using your smartphone. Remember that we have plain & prescription lenses available.

 

 

 

  • Watch the video, check the content and once you know how you would like to support us, choose one of the pledges from the right column.
  • You won't pay or choose any model at this point, you are only allowing Indiegogo to charge you the import of the pledge at the end of the campaign if we succeed with it.
  • Next to the pledge name, you can see the minimum amount you have to donate to get that pack.
  • In 7 to 10 days, you will receive a survey to tell us your favorited model, colour, and prescription information if needed. 
  • Remember! You are not only making a pledge for a pair of glasses, you are helping 3 guys to achieve their dreams.

Yes, we are prepared to provide our backers with their specific prescriptions lenses requirements (only monofocal)! 

Special Indiegogo offer for prescription lenses just €25!

It’s easy, once the campaign ends, we will send you a survey so you can choose your favourite model, colour and whether you need prescription lenses or not. We will also need your pupillary distance (PD), so if you don't have it yet, please check with your optometrist.

If you want prescription lenses, just add €25 to your pledge (for a pledge of multiple eyewear add €25 for every eyewear that needs prescription)

IMPORTANT NOTE: Stock range for prescription is

  • Astigmatism (Cylinder): +4.00, -4.00
  • Myopia & farsightedness (Sphere): +6.00, -8.00

Note: You will be able to choose your Prescription details on the Crowdox survey we will send once we proceed your payment.

Based in Barcelona, Barner was founded in early 2017 by three friends, who after living a life totally immersed in the digital world, have identified a problem that is not only affecting themselves but millions of people all around the globe: the overexposure to harmful blue light.  

To solve this problem, we have decided to use a disruptive direct-to-consumer model where, by cutting out various middlemen, we will be able to produce the highest quality eyewear at a price that will be affordable to every single pocket.

 

We three share a common way of looking into the world and this is what we want to bring to life. We are not only producing a great product for your eyes’ health, but a brand for people with common values.

We believe in 2 things:  

  • For many years we have been using sunglasses to protect our eyes from the sunlight. Nowadays digital screens are surrounding us emitting a new type of light which is very harmful for our health, we should protect from it. 
  • Glasses are cool! You look good with them. 

Barner is not only an eyewear company, it is a brand for people with a purpose.

 

Edu has been working in the digital space for many years. He built his first start-up 7 years ago and has also been working in companies like Samsung and Google for the past 4 years. The inspiration for Barner came up a couple of years ago, when after 1 week of long hours in front of his computer he was feeling fatigue, for the 1st time had some issue falling asleep and of course felt serious dryness in the eyes. Then he started investigating about the harmful effects of blue light and how we could protect from it.

Ramon founded his first start-up 2 years ago while he was working at Accenture as a Management Consultant. Working all day surrounded by digital devices and the blue light emitted by them, he felt his eyes were red and itchy, and had problems sleeping too. Tired of using eye drops, and as soon as Edu contacted him with the idea of Barner, he didn’t hesitate to join them in order to create a brand that will defend people’s health and wellbeing, and promote those values that define him: friendship, family, healthy life and to never stop learning.

Christopher started his career as an early Export Area Manager. After working for more than 5 years opening new markets for an architectural solutions company, he felt he needed to do something else with his life - start his own adventure. Edu contacted him with his great idea, just what he felt he wanted to do: starting from 0 - their own project, about an accessory he’s always been obsessed with but with a totally new concept with a benefit for everyone and with a brand he couldn’t feel more engaged too, he just couldn’t refuse it… Let’s Barner!

For the time being, Barner is just our dream, an idea in our heads that we would love to materialize and make it become a great company that people will be identified with. During the last few months we have worked together with different eyewear experts, developing multiple prototypes with the greatest materials to produce the eyewear you see today.  

 

In the current stage, we have registered the brand and produced a number of finalized units, but in order to make enough units to share with all of you, we need to place a substantial minimum order for the factory to start our first production. This is why we are offering you our product in this amazing platform before anywhere else. Your support is essential and highly appreciated.

 

 

 

 

 

 

20 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the Barner community. Click one of the buttons below and tag a friend or co-worker who spends all day in front of digital devices!

After working for more than 5 years opening new markets for an architectural solutions company, he felt he needed to do something else with his life - start his own adventure. Edu contacted him with his great idea, just what he felt he wanted to do: starting from 0 - their own project, about an accessory he’s always been obsessed with but with a totally new concept with a benefit for everyone and with a brand he couldn’t feel more engaged too, he just couldn’t refuse it… Let’s Barner!

For the time being, Barner is just our dream, an idea in our heads that we would love to materialize and make it become a great company that people will be identified with. During the last few months we have worked together with different eyewear experts, developing multiple prototypes with the greatest materials to produce the eyewear you see today.  

The Barner Team reviewing the eyewear's technical drawings
 
In the current stage, we have registered the brand and produced a number of finalized units, but in order to make enough units to share with all of you, we need to place a substantial minimum order for the factory to start our first production. This is why we are offering you our product in this amazing platform before anywhere else. Your support is essential and highly appreciated.
 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
20 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the Barner community. Click one of the buttons below and tag a friend or co-worker who spends all day in front of digital devices!

story:
How often do you find yourself at war with your headphones? We are talking about that moment of ultimate frustration. The moment when, you reach into your bag to grab your headphones, only to find them in knots, lots of knots. With loopit those days are over.

Loopit is a practical & stylish solution to the tangled headphone problem we all have. They are headphones that almost never tangle when clasped and can be worn as a stylish necklace or stuffed in a bag or pocket if jewelry isn't your thing. With the clasp formed, the headphones are not likely to tangle.

Wear loopit as a necklace or pull it from your pocket/purse and give it a shake. When you need your headphones, simply pull the magnets apart and plug into your device. When you are done using them, unplug loopit and connect the magnets near the earbuds to the magnets near the audiojack, to form a clasp.

1. 3 seconds for tangle free earbuds

By using magnets, the clasp takes only seconds to form.  It's scientifically proven that connecting the earbuds to the audiojack makes it difficult to make knots.  Once you make the clasp, wear as a necklace/bracelet or put them in your bag/pocket.  The less often they are knotted, the less likely they are to break!

2. Stylish but understated

loopit comes in two designs:  

1.  A wired cable threaded through a light weight aluminum chain.  This design can be worn as a fashionable yet understated necklace and we plan to offer it in the following colors:

2. A high quality stitched leather-like cord in black for those not into metallic jewelry.


Each set will also come with three different sized earbud tips since every person’s ear is shaped a little bit differently.

3. Sublime audio

We tested dozens of prototypes to find ones that sound great. The speaker has an impressive frequency response, sensitivity and input power. The shape of the earbuds also help with blocking out background noise. Not only is the sound clear to you but with the built in microphone you can be sure your voice is heard clearly.


                 Loopit in detail 

Our process is simple, yet thorough. We start with an everyday problem and end up with a solution that’s better and funner. (That’s right – we said “funner.”)

Vanessa Chan was a partner at McKinsey & Company, but decided to walk away from what was comfortable to start re.design. A trained engineer and mom, Vanessa knew how to solve problems and saw them all around her in everyday products that had become more frustrating than useful. 

Like ear buds – the first problem she tackled. 

By mashing up her MIT training and inherent creativity, Vanessa conceived a versatile solution to those pesky ear buds that combines fashion and function. 

​It turns out that, if you’ve got the engineering chops to sketch out a prototype, there’s a thriving maker community in the Philadelphia area that you can work at to crank out prototypes - places like NextFab and BeadWorks. 

An inveterate networker, Vanessa supports women professionals as co-president of the Philadelphia Chapter of the Ellevate Network. She also helps K-12 students bring their ideas to market as an advisor for Springside Chestnut Hill Academy's Venture Incubator and as a member of their board of trustees

Vanessa has a Ph.D. from MIT in Materials Science & Engineering and a B.S.E. from University of Pennsylvania. She is married to Mark van der Helm.


Kelly Cozzi has been helping people and companies find solutions to their challenges throughout her career. She has a wide range of experience in sales and marketing for industries ranging from industrial products to HR services.

At re.design she runs the day-to-day operations which have ranged from bookkeeping to co-directing crowdfunding videos.

Most recently, Kelly held the role of Director of Sales for a staffing agency where she worked closely with companies to help them find the talent to realize their vision. Kelly has also held marketing positions at Benetrends and CareerUSA, and she began her career as a sales representative for a large industrial supplier company.

Kelly has a B.A. in Communications with a focus on Public Relations from Rowan University. She also is a licensed sales associate for Berkshire Hathaway of Cherry Hill, NJ.

If we meet our goal in 30 days, you will receive a survey asking you for mailing address as well a color preferences. Once we receive those surveys we can place our order from our supplier and start our fulfillment process. We expect to have that order placed by March, but have left some padding for time in case there are issues.

After all of this preparation and time perfecting loopit, its hard to express how much our backers and supporters mean to us. It has been less than a year since we started this journey and with your help and support we are so close to making this dream come to life.  So THANK YOU for spreading the word and for your contributions!

Are you a writer looking to share our story? Check out our press page for high resolution images and more information.

story:
LooBlade: a toilet cleaning revolution!


Germ-killing, quick-drying, easy-clean: this reinvention of the toilet brush has an 8-blade helix head to enhance cleaning power. 

LooBlade follows the toilet contours. It reaches under the rim with ease, and contains an anti-microbial that's laboratory tested and certified to kill 99.9% of germs, both during and after cleaning.

LooBlade does not get clogged up like the bristles of a brush. Its specially-designed hydrophobic materials shed water and dry quickly. 

The ‘hollow-point’ head feature helps act as a plunger to clear blockages, and the unique holder design allows free air flow to ensure no residual water collects.

LooBlade® is patented in the UK and has patents pending worldwide.

LooBlade is far ahead of traditional toilet brushes - lasting up to ten years, and guaranteed for three years. Spare heads and handles will be available in the future for all LooBlades. Alternative designs of holder will also become available so in future you can mix and match and never need to buy a whole new toilet brush ever again.


Toilet brushes: a flawed design

The classic toilet brush design has remained unchanged for years and is extremely poor at toilet-cleaning for several reasons:

LooBlade outperforms the toilet brush

The bristles of a toilet brush quickly become clogged with paper and other things...hard to keep clean. LooBlade, has smooth, flat repellent surfaces...easily kept clean and clear with just a gentle shake, or rinse. 

After use a traditional brush traps a significant amount of germ-filled, smelly water– even after shaking! With hydrophobic plastics, LooBlade ensures that water is easily removed. 

A bristle brush only touches part of the surface, meaning you need to scrub back and forth to ensure you get cleaning coverage. LooBlade maintains continuous contact with the toilet bowl, meaning that its blades swipe the surface clean in a single pass, (as a spatula does). The shape of the blades and their firm, flexible material also lets LooBlade to clean  under the rim, where brushes struggle. 

If all households used LooBlade instead of conventional toilet brushes, then the reductions in water and bleach usage would be significant.

The certified anti-microbial properties of LooBlade mean that germs are killed outright, so there is no need to use bleach to disinfect it. A hot rinse with detergent occasionally is all the cleaning it requires.

In addition the clog-free nature of LooBlade means that the multiple flushes used to attempt to clean a brush are no longer necessary. 

And the disposable attitude towards toilet brushes means that they are typically replaced up to once a year creating unnecessary land-fill. LooBlade solves that!


LooBlade in detail


LooBlade is the creation of inventor Garry Stewart. Garry is an award-winning innovator, and  multi patent-holding designer of Chop-Cloc, an award-winning energy efficiency product.


Manufacturing and delivery

Manufacturing of the classic LooBlade is assured, with delivery of the first batch of products expected by April 2016. 


Guarantee

Each LooBlade comes with a 3-year domestic guarantee, which covers faults in the product construction, material and assembly if used according to instructions. 

FAQs

How do I get the versions I want in my perk?

We'll follow up once production begins to survey for specific choices.

How safe is Looblade for children?

Very much safer than a conventional toilet brush. The unit and holder are made from materials that have a thru-structure antimicrobial to International Standards Organisation certification, ISO22196:2011. LooBlade is safer than the toilet floor surfaces surrounding it, except when they've just been antiseptically cleaned, then comparably safe. But floors will quickly build up bacteria again. LooBlade goes on neutralising germs 24/7.

Are the antimicrobial and hydrophobic elements just a coating?

No, both of these properties are designed into LooBlade. They are added to the liquid plastics before manufacture so they are through the entire product and holder.

How hygienic are the materials?

The plastics are the standard that food and medical products need to be. We certify this to ISO22196:2011, using the world respected German TüV laboratories.

How sustainable are the materials?

We worked hard to identify and source the most sustainable materials we can for LooBlade. We opted for the newest technologies in plastics that are completely recyclable, phthalate and bisphenol-A free, durable and long lasting. Totally safe to use.

What about mold build-up or lime that requires scrubbing?

Brushes tend to leave more than you think on a porcelain surface. The remaining bacterial film then spreads and acts as an adhesive for other nasties. Brushes also carry a ‘charge’ of germs incubated in the holder which increases the problem. Even when you immerse a brush in bleach, the deep crevices within the bristles means that they always retain a significant  'starter' load of bacteria ready to breed and be reintroduced to the toilet. 

LooBlades elastomer vanes are far more effective on matter on a smooth porcelain surface and promote less build up. When it's easy, nothing should be left to accumulate! You might say, LooBlade takes a disruptive view of the culture of toilet cleaning! Because brushes are so awful and ineffective we have a bad regime of cleaning...because it's nasty and not easy. We subconsciously hate the way brushes function. We know that even to bring them from their holder to the toilet is a nasty process. LooBlade changes all that...

Is it safe to use the the Looblade with toilet cleaners that contain chlorine bleach or ammonia?

Yes, absolutely safe. LooBlade is inert to household chemicals. 

(N.B. Remember never to mix bleach and ammonia together as highly toxic chlorine can be released!)

story:
The Porunga Pocket Tee is cut, stitched, and sewn using sheets of flannel from actual vintage button-downs.

Can't find the tag?

Tags can be annoying and sometimes hard to remove; so we did away with them all together. Our custom designed tag-less logo was the better option and drastically improved the comfortability of the shirt. 

Our Story

Any Flannel is a new clothing company, launching into business by selling its Porunga Pocket Tee – a cotton T-shirt with a pocket made of recycled flannel.

Any Flannel’s tee shirt is made of soft American cotton, so it’s comfortable to wear. The pocket is assembled out of cut up and recycled flannel (giving the company a few extra power cords worth of sustainability). Plus, these tees are fun – each one bears a different pocket design and is shipped out randomly. If you want to create a unique wardrobe, look no further.

If you’re looking for comfort, you’re covered. If you want eye-catching yet modest apparel — score! If you just love plaid and want a tasteful way to incorporate it into your wardrobe? Done.

Why are we different?

Recycled Material 
All of our pockets are made from repurposed fabric that come in a variety of colors and patterns.

American Made
Once the flannels have been cut and prepped, they are shipped off to Southern California where a very talented group of sewers turn the raw materials into a final good.

Made in Downtown Los Angeles by 

Vintage Flannel
Rest assured, all of our flannels come from vintage stock that we sort through ourselves. Sometimes, the occasion arises where we have to toss a few into the "DO NOT USE" pile. But don't worry! This just goes to show that our quality standards are high; we want you to enjoy our shirt just as much as we do. 

Perfectly Paired
We took the time to travel down to Los Angeles in search for a shirt that would go well with the heavier flannel material. Luckily, we stopped by our friends at American Apparel who had just the right garment for the job. The American Apparel Hammer Tee, a fabric weight of 5.8 oz/yd², is a shirt built to last and a shirt that feels so darn good to wear. 

Random Selection
We can't make two of the same shirt because no two flannels are exactly identical. Therefore, this has allowed us to blend the shopping experience of both an online retailer and subscription box service. When you purchase from us, you don't know what you're getting...period! However, I can almost guarantee that you won't be disappointed with what you've received because what is sent out is just 1 of 1. That's right! It's your shirt and nobody else in the world is wearing it at the exact same time as you are. Hypothetically, let's say we did have a subscription service option in the future. Who wouldn't love getting a shirt every month not knowing what color and pattern may arrive at their doorstep. It could possibly be the color of your favorite sports team! How about a color that matches the time of the season. The possibilities are endless.

Dimension and Sizing

The Advocates of Any Flannel

So this is where all of you faithful supporters come into play. We need your help to raise the funds for the first purchase of pocket tees. Those who donate will be rewarded with some of the first Any Flannel shirts to appear on the market. Your generous gratitude will jump start the business and get people involved and aware of the Any Flannel brand. Also, there are plans to reveal more product lines in the near future and your contributions will promote those as well.

FULFILLMENT: Unexpected things can happen at any moment in time: a supplier misses a deadline, a machine breaks down, or a shipment goes missing. These factors can cause a delay in the business cycle. We maintain a constant rapport with our manufacturer to ensure that everything goes as smoothly as possible. Our manufacturer has years of experience delivering high quality clothing in large quantities. Although there will be some surprises down the road, discrepancies will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with our external expertise. As you know, our overall goal is making the best possible product for you!
